berita: This one food is certainly popular because of its savory taste that often tempts our tongue. Many think that catfish are cultivated in unsuitable waters, in fact catfish is possibleness a formidable fish species because it is equipped with an additional respiratory apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, so that catfish are able to survive. live in muddy waters or waters contaminated with sewage and eat everything that is in these waters. This is the possibility of public opinion that catfish contains cancer cells because of these wastes. But we redline, indeed in consuming catfish we must pay attention to its cultivation. You need to know that the omega content in catfish is not inferior to salmon. according to research, catfish has the best source of vitamin D which is beneficial for bone health, catfish also contains protein and folic acid which are needed for pregnant women. Why do many people think of catfish as a source of cancer cells? Actually it's not the catfish, but the cooking oil that is used many times until it turns black in every frying dish. This is the source of free radicals, the source of the creator of cancer cells in our bodies. So it's not the catfish. Even the luxurious salmon, if it is processed with cooking oil that is used many times, could be salmon as a source of cancer cells as well.
berita_id: Makanan yang satu ini tentu saja populer karena rasanya gurih yang sering menggoda lidah kita.Banyak yang berpikir bahwa ikan lele dibudidayakan di perairan yang tidak cocok, bahkan ikan lele adalah kemungkinan spesies ikan yang tangguh karena dilengkapi dengan peralatan pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, sehingga ikan lele mampu bertahan hidup.Tinggal di perairan berlumpur atau perairan yang terkontaminasi dengan limbah dan makan semua yang ada di perairan ini.Ini adalah kemungkinan opini publik bahwa ikan lele mengandung sel kanker karena limbah ini.Tapi kami mengulangi, memang dalam mengonsumsi ikan lele, kita harus memperhatikan penanamannya.Anda perlu tahu bahwa konten omega dalam lele tidak lebih rendah daripada salmon.Menurut penelitian, ikan lele memiliki sumber vitamin D terbaik yang bermanfaat untuk kesehatan tulang, ikan lele juga mengandung protein dan asam folat yang diperlukan untuk wanita hamil.Mengapa banyak orang menganggap ikan lele sebagai sumber sel kanker?Sebenarnya itu bukan ikan lele, tetapi minyak goreng yang digunakan berkali -kali sampai menjadi hitam di setiap hidangan penggorengan.Ini adalah sumber radikal bebas, sumber pencipta sel kanker dalam tubuh kita.Jadi bukan ikan lele.Bahkan salmon mewah, jika diproses dengan minyak goreng yang digunakan berkali -kali, bisa menjadi salmon sebagai sumber sel kanker juga.

berita: News Social media this morning was enlivened by the circulation of photos of participants from the 212th volume 2 action unable to enter the Istiqlal Mosque. In the photo that spreads, it can be seen that a group is queuing in front of the Istiqlal entrance gate. The Head of Protocol and Public Relations of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam said that the news of the mass 212 volume 2 being stuck at the gate was a hoax. "The news that there are 212 mass demonstrations unable to enter Istiqlal is a thousand percent hoax," said Abu when he was confirmed on Tuesday (21/2/2017). According to Abu, indeed on Monday night, after Isha there were three group buses that entered the Istiqlal Mosque. They claimed to be a group from Madura Island. Mosque administrators, said Abu, invited them to worship and clean themselves. The Istiqlal Mosque administrator then coordinated with the group leader accompanied by the police. "After speaking they then voluntarily left Istiqlal," said Abu. Then according to the procedure, the Istiqlal mosque, outside the month of Ramadan, is closed at 21.30 WIB. "Just according to the SOP, the Istiqlal Mosque is closed daily at 09.30 WIB and reopens one hour before the dawn prayer, approximately 3.45 WIB," said Abu. Regarding the photo that there was a queue of worshipers at the Istiqlal gate, Abu said it was a group of pilgrims from outside the city who would enter Istiqlal. The manager also apologizes if they queue in front of the gate, because the door was only opened at 03.45 WIB or one hour before the Fajr prayer. "In the morning before dawn, Tuesday, February 21 2017, there were many pilgrims from outside the city who would enter the Istiqlal Mosque and they arrived before the door of the Istiqlal Mosque opened at 3.45 WIB. We apologize for this, ' said Abu. The Fajr prayer process at the Istiqlal mosque Mosque today, said Abu, went well, with the imam, Mr. Ust. Salim Ghazali. The number of worshipers is approximately 240 people, consisting of 170 men and 70 women.
berita_id: Berita Media Sosial Pagi ini dimeriahkan oleh sirkulasi foto peserta dari aksi Volume 2 ke -212 yang tidak dapat memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Dalam foto yang menyebar, dapat dilihat bahwa suatu kelompok mengantri di depan gerbang masuk Istiqlal.Kepala protokol dan hubungan masyarakat dari masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abd Salam mengatakan bahwa berita tentang massa 212 Volume 2 terjebak di gerbang adalah tipuan."Berita bahwa ada 212 demonstrasi massa yang tidak dapat memasuki Istiqlal adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata Abu ketika ia dikonfirmasi pada hari Selasa (21/2/2017).Menurut Abu, memang pada Senin malam, setelah Isha ada tiga bus kelompok yang memasuki masjid Istiqlal.Mereka mengaku sebagai kelompok dari Pulau Madura.Administrator masjid, kata Abu, mengundang mereka untuk beribadah dan membersihkan diri.Administrator Masjid Istiqlal kemudian berkoordinasi dengan pemimpin kelompok yang disertai oleh polisi."Setelah berbicara, mereka kemudian secara sukarela meninggalkan Istiqlal," kata Abu.Kemudian menurut prosedur, masjid Istiqlal, di luar bulan Ramadhan, ditutup pada 21.30 WIB."Hanya menurut SOP, masjid Istiqlal ditutup setiap hari pada pukul 09.30 WIB dan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar, sekitar 3,45 WIB," kata Abu.Mengenai foto bahwa ada antrian penyembah di gerbang Istiqlal, Abu mengatakan itu adalah sekelompok peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki Istiqlal.Manajer juga meminta maaf jika mereka mengantri di depan gerbang, karena pintunya hanya dibuka pada 03.45 WIB atau satu jam sebelum doa Fajr."Di pagi hari sebelum fajar, Selasa, 21 Februari 2017, ada banyak peziarah dari luar kota yang akan memasuki masjid Istiqlal dan mereka tiba di depan pintu masjid Istiqlal dibuka pada 3,45 wib. Kami meminta maaf untuk ini, kata Abu, dengan sumur faU, dengan sumur m -mosque.Ghazali.

berita: The Brimob Police Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok, was hit by riots all day yesterday. The National Police Headquarters officially stated that the riots started with cell phone raids. However, a video circulated on Youtube that recorded the riot, in which the residents stated that they did not want their religion to be harassed, so they had to fight back. This was immediately denied by the Police Headquarters. "It's not true about the Qur'an. This is purely a matter of raids on cellphones (cell phones) by officers. The occupants didn't accept it, then they took it," said Karo Penmas, Police Public Relations Division, Brigadier General Rikwanto, to reporters last night. It is said, the commotion occurred at 16.00 WIB. Rikwanto said the riots caused a number of facilities in the detention center to be damaged. "There was a riot of terrorist prisoners at the Korbrimob Rutan Salemba branch of the detention center carried out by terrorist prisoners which resulted in the destruction of prison facilities, such as the prison's cell door being broken down, the gate of the block hallway, the window panes (in Block C and Block B)," explained Rikwanto. The commotion occurred after Friday prayers, when the prisoners were put into their respective cells. After entering the cell, the Densus picket member released the keys in rooms A5 and C5 (RB). "Because there is a key slot from the inside, for security and to make it easier for the picket officers to open the cell door," added Rikwanto. After that, members of the Densus picket conducted a search of the detention cell. The search results found 4 cellphones belonging to detainees Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam, and Jumali. "It is not true that there was throwing of the Koran," said Rikwanto repeatedly. Chaos ensued after the inspection was over. Detainees who did not accept the search provoked the officers, so that some officers were provoked by the words of the prisoners. On the other hand, the prisoners continued to scream while shouting takbir so as to provoke the prisoners of the next block. "Members of the picket from Unit III Pioneers took action by shooting upwards to signal chaos and to warn the prisoners," added Rikwanto. The commotion was then successfully overcome. Currently the situation is reported to be conducive. INDOPOS reporters who monitored the Mobile Brigade Headquarters reported that the atmosphere was conducive. There is no meaningful activity on the officers. The situation seemed calm and guarded as usual. A number of journalists were in the vicinity of the headquarters of the elite police force. Several guards continued to patrol the outside and inside of the Kelapa Dua Mobile Brigade Corps building, Depok City. No personnel from Densus 88 were seen coming to the location. Separately, the Head of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Headquarters Inspector General Pol Setyo Wasisto explained that prior to the Salemba Rutan riot in Kelapa Dua, riots had also occurred in Class II A Prison Permisan Nusakambangan Island, Cilacap, Central Java. This incident took place on Tuesday (7/11) at around 07.50 WIB. The attack was carried out by terrorists targeting the John Refra group aka John Kei. It was found that three people were injured and one colleague of John Kei died. Setyo Wasisto revealed that this commotion began with an attack carried out by an inmate with the initials WBP, a terrorist from a block of residents incarcerated from room 3 to room 1 inhabited by John Kei. This attack uses wooden blocks and stones that are around the block room. "This made the inmate outside the room to go to John Kei's room and intend to help him attack another inmate with the initials T. However, because of the outnumbered numbers, prisoner T went back into the cell room and locked him from the inside," he said. Finally, at around 10.00 WIB, the prison situation was brought under control after prison officers intervened and re-entered the prisoners into their respective cell rooms. However, at around 12.30 WIB, there was a beating in room block C number 20. This location is the room for the assistant prison officer. This incident left several victims injured, including John Kei. This man received a wound on his left temple and a torn left palm. Then, another victim was Webrianto Warta Bone, a general convict who suffered injuries to his upper left temple and right back shoulder and bruised legs. The third victim, Muhamad Asrul Sidik, suffered injuries to his left temple and bruised hands. "Meanwhile, one person died on behalf of Ondi bin Robert. The perpetrators in this incident amounted to 11 people who came from terrorist prisoners," he said. The perpetrators included Muhamad Ikhwan alias Abu Umar, Zainal Abidin, Zakaria alias Zack, Sultan Kolbi, Priyoutomo alias Iok, Ahmad Basuki bin Abdul Ghofur, Khairul Rizal, Mansur bin Saribin, M Ali, M Aris Raharjo alias Alif, and M Basri. . The evidence that was secured by the lesion Nusakambangan Sub-Sector Police were kitchen knives, stones, broken glass, pieces of wood blocks. Furthermore, there is a white shirt belonging to the victim on behalf of Asrul who was hit by a blood rickshaw and a white shirt belonging to the victim on behalf of John Kei who was hit by a blood rickshaw. "In the report we received, it was not caused by the cause of the attack. I also do not dare to assume because the report (cause) does not exist," he explained. Asked whether the riots in these two locations were related, Setyo did not answer

Alumni of the 212 action plan to hold activities at the Istiqlal Mosque, afternoon and evening. The plan, they will hold tarawih in Istiqlal to the streets. The event was also the event for the 212 grand reunion, the consolidation of the people and the launching of the national committee to welcome the return of Habib Rizieq Syihab. "The biggest Tarawih prayer in history (7 million congregations). Let's fill the Istiqlal Mosque and all the surrounding roads up to Tugu Tani, Pasar Senen," reads the agenda for the activity. However, the Istiqlal Mosque apparently did not allow the event to be held. Istiqlal Mosque management sent a letter numbered 259/BPPMI/VI/2017 on Tuesday (6/6) to the Presidium of the alumni of the 212 action, Ustaz Ansufri Idrus Sambo. In the letter, the Istiqlal Mosque management responded to a letter sent by the Presidium alumni of the 212 action with letter number 06/I/PA212-Ext/VI/2017 which was sent on June 4, 2017. "Regarding your request, we apologize that it cannot be considered because that day and date is used for routine activities of the Istiqlal Mosque after Friday," said the Istiqlal Mosque administrator's letter which was signed by A.N. Deputy Head of Public Relations of Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah confirmed the contents of the letter. Because, after Friday prayers, the Istiqlal Mosque will be used for studies with the high priest of the Istiqlal Mosque. "It's true, there is a study by post the high priest (Istiqlal Mosque) after Friday," he said when confirmed by merdeka.com, Friday (9/6).
berita_id: Alumni Rencana Aksi 212 untuk mengadakan kegiatan di Masjid Istiqlal, sore dan malam.Rencananya, mereka akan mengadakan Tarawih di Istiqlal ke jalanan.Acara ini juga merupakan acara untuk 212 Grand Reunion, konsolidasi rakyat dan peluncuran Komite Nasional untuk menyambut kembalinya Habib Rizieq Syihab."Doa Tarawih terbesar dalam sejarah (7 juta sidang). Mari kita isi masjid Istiqlal dan semua jalan di sekitarnya hingga Tugu Tani, Pasar Senen," membaca agenda untuk kegiatan tersebut.Namun, masjid Istiqlal tampaknya tidak mengizinkan acara diadakan.Manajemen Masjid ISTIQLAL mengirim surat nomor 259/bppmi/vi/2017 pada hari Selasa (6/6) ke presidium alumni dari aksi 212, Ustaz Ansufri Idrus Sambo.Dalam surat itu, manajemen masjid ISTiqlal menanggapi surat yang dikirim oleh alumni presidium dari 212 tindakan dengan nomor surat 06/i/pa212-ext/vi/2017 yang dikirim pada 4 Juni 2017. "Mengenai permintaan Anda, kami tidak dapat dipertimbangkan karena hari dan tanggal itu digunakan untuk kegiatan rutin dari mosik mosik.ditandatangani oleh A.N.Wakil Kepala Hubungan Masyarakat Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah mengkonfirmasi isi surat itu.Karena, setelah doa Jumat, masjid Istiqlal akan digunakan untuk studi dengan imam besar masjid Istiqlal."Memang benar, ada penelitian melalui pasca High Priest (Masjid Istiqlal) setelah Jumat," katanya ketika dikonfirmasi oleh Merdeka.com, Jumat (9/6).

berita: After a hearing (RDP) meeting with Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives in Senayan, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (17/4/2018), it was rumored that Facebook Indonesia would be closed. It is planned that the closing will be held on April 24, 2018. A few days before the news of the closure occurred, Netizens, especially Facebook users, posted the status "Facebook will be closed", some also uploaded "before Facebook is closed, post a status or photo first." The news that Facebook will be closed is of course a pro and contra among netizens. Even so, the rumors that went viral and circulated widely on social media, especially Facebook, were certainly not true or hoaxes. The government can indeed give strict sanctions to block Facebook, because the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Cambridge Analytica (CA) scandal. However, there is no certainty that on April 24, Facebook will actually be blocked in Indonesia. Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara on various occasions never mentioned blocking Facebook. In fact, Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communications and Informatics did not hesitate to block Facebook, but must follow procedures so that the steps are not rash. Rudiantara's only firm statement about blocking Facebook as well is if there is evidence that Facebook is used as a means of inciting or fighting. Rudiantara ensured that if investigators found an element of criminal suspicion in the leak of Facebook user data in Indonesia, the chances of blocking Facebook would be even greater. Meanwhile, these two things have not been proven yet, are still under investigation and awaiting the results of the audit. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, like what happened in Myanmar. I have no qualms about blocking it," said Rudiantara, a few days ago. The Minister of Communication and Information has asked Facebook to conduct an audit, and submitted the results of the audit since a week after the announcement that data on Facebook users in Indonesia had been leaked in the CA scandal. The request was included in the first Warning Letter (SP) sent by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics. However, after the specified deadline arrived, Facebook has not yet submitted the results of the audit. Kominfo also issued a second warning letter. "Currently, it is SP II. We are waiting, later after SP II it can be upgraded to a temporary service termination if needed," said Rudiantara again. If the audit results are known later, the government can assess the potential problems that could arise from this data leak and take steps to address them. Meanwhile, Head of Public Policy for Facebook Indonesia, Ruben Hattari, emphasized that the recent data leaks from users were not in the form of breaching the security system of Facebook users. In front of the leadership of the House of Representatives Commission I, Ruben explained that the data leak was caused by the abuse of authority given by Facebook to application providers or so-called third parties.
berita_id: Setelah pertemuan sidang (RDP) dengan Komisi I Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia di Senayan, Jakarta Tengah, Selasa (17/4/2018), dikabarkan bahwa Facebook Indonesia akan ditutup.Direncanakan bahwa penutupan akan diadakan pada 24 April 2018. Beberapa hari sebelum berita penutupan terjadi, netizen, terutama pengguna Facebook, memposting status "Facebook akan ditutup", beberapa juga diunggah "sebelum Facebook ditutup, memposting status atau foto terlebih dahulu."Berita bahwa Facebook akan ditutup tentu saja merupakan pro dan kontra di antara netizen.Meski begitu, rumor yang menjadi viral dan beredar secara luas di media sosial, terutama Facebook, tentu saja tidak benar atau tipuan.Pemerintah memang dapat memberikan sanksi ketat untuk memblokir Facebook, karena data satu juta pengguna Indonesia juga bocor dalam skandal Cambridge Analytica (CA).Namun, tidak ada kepastian bahwa pada 24 April, Facebook sebenarnya akan diblokir di Indonesia.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara pada berbagai kesempatan tidak pernah disebutkan memblokir Facebook.Faktanya, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook, tetapi harus mengikuti prosedur sehingga langkah -langkahnya tidak terburu -buru.Satu -satunya pernyataan perusahaan Rudiantara tentang memblokir Facebook juga adalah jika ada bukti bahwa Facebook digunakan sebagai cara menghasut atau berkelahi.Rudiantara memastikan bahwa jika penyelidik menemukan unsur kecurigaan kriminal dalam kebocoran data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia, peluang memblokir Facebook akan lebih besar.Sementara itu, kedua hal ini belum terbukti, masih dalam penyelidikan dan menunggu hasil audit."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti apa yang terjadi di Myanmar. Saya tidak ragu -ragu memblokirnya," kata Rudiiantara, beberapa hari yang lalu.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi telah meminta Facebook untuk melakukan audit, dan mengirimkan hasil audit sejak seminggu setelah pengumuman bahwa data di pengguna Facebook di Indonesia telah bocor dalam skandal CA.Permintaan tersebut dimasukkan dalam surat peringatan pertama (SP) yang dikirim oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika.Namun, setelah tenggat waktu yang ditentukan tiba, Facebook belum mengirimkan hasil audit.Kominfo juga mengeluarkan surat peringatan kedua."Saat ini, ini adalah SP II. Kami sedang menunggu, nanti setelah SP II dapat ditingkatkan ke penghentian layanan sementara jika diperlukan," kata Rudiantara lagi.Jika hasil audit diketahui kemudian, pemerintah dapat menilai potensi masalah yang dapat timbul dari kebocoran data ini dan mengambil langkah -langkah untuk mengatasinya.Sementara itu, Kepala Kebijakan Publik untuk Facebook Indonesia, Ruben Hattari, menekankan bahwa data baru -baru ini kebocoran dari pengguna tidak dalam bentuk melanggar sistem keamanan pengguna Facebook.Di depan kepemimpinan Komisi Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat I, Ruben menjelaskan bahwa kebocoran data disebabkan oleh penyalahgunaan wewenang yang diberikan oleh Facebook kepada penyedia aplikasi atau yang disebut pihak ketiga.

berita: The Istiqlal Mosque Management closed in Agency (BPPMI) stated that it is not true that the Istiqlal Mosque has closed its doors to worshipers who will stay overnight on Monday (20/2) night, and they are not allowed to pray at dawn. "Since 2002, the Istiqlal Mosque has enforced rules to close the gate every 21.30 WIB and reopen it at 03.40 WIB before the dawn prayer," said BPPMI Secretary Rusli Efendi who was met at the Istiqlal Anniversary celebration in Jakarta, Tuesday (21/2). Clarifying the news circulating on social media regarding this matter. According to Rusli, all worshipers are not allowed to stay in the mosque area except under certain conditions and with the permission of the security forces and the leadership of BPPMI. This has also been explained to the worshipers who gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque about these rules and they understand and are willing to leave the mosque area. "Besides, BPPMI did not receive notification from any party regarding the plans for the pilgrims to stay overnight as in the previous conditions when Muslims held 411, 212 or 112 actions. In addition, there was no special communication from the authorities regarding this matter," said Rusli. BPPMI said negative news about the Istiqlal Mosque being locked and allowing the Islamic Community Forum (FUI) to be outside did not match reality and tended to be provocation. "All Muslims are asked not to be influenced by news that cannot be accounted for," he appealed. Rusli also said, at dawn, the dawn prayer was going well, led by Imam Salim Ghazali and attended by 170 male and 70 female worshipers. "The Istiqlal Mosque calls on the people to strive for national unity and unity and always maintain the comfort of worship," said Rusli.
berita_id: Manajemen Masjid Istiqlal ditutup di Agency (BPPMI) menyatakan bahwa tidak benar bahwa masjid Istiqlal telah menutup pintunya untuk para penyembah yang akan menginap pada hari Senin (20/2) malam, dan mereka tidak diizinkan untuk berdoa saat fajar."Sejak tahun 2002, masjid ISTIQLAL telah menegakkan aturan untuk menutup gerbang setiap 21.30 WIB dan membukanya kembali pada 03.40 WIB sebelum doa fajar,” kata Sekretaris BPPMI Rusli Efendi yang bertemu di Perayaan Ulang Tahun Istiqlal di Jakarta, Selasa (21/2).Mengklarifikasi berita yang beredar di media sosial mengenai masalah ini.Menurut Rusli, semua jamaah tidak diizinkan untuk tinggal di wilayah masjid kecuali dalam kondisi tertentu dan dengan izin pasukan keamanan dan kepemimpinan BPPMI.Ini juga telah dijelaskan kepada para penyembah yang berkumpul di halaman Masjid Istiqlal tentang aturan -aturan ini dan mereka memahami dan bersedia meninggalkan wilayah masjid."Selain itu, BPPMI tidak menerima pemberitahuan dari pihak mana pun mengenai rencana para peziarah untuk menginap seperti dalam kondisi sebelumnya ketika umat Islam diadakan 411, 212 atau 112 tindakan. Selain itu, tidak ada komunikasi khusus dari pihak berwenang mengenai masalah ini," kata Rusli.BPPMI mengatakan berita negatif tentang masjid Istiqlal yang terkunci dan memungkinkan Forum Komunitas Islam (FUI) berada di luar tidak cocok dengan kenyataan dan cenderung menjadi provokasi."Semua Muslim diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh berita yang tidak dapat diperhitungkan," ia mengajukan banding.Rusli juga mengatakan, saat fajar, doa fajar berjalan dengan baik, dipimpin oleh Imam Salim Ghazali dan dihadiri oleh 170 jantan dan 70 penyembah wanita."Masjid Istiqlal menyerukan kepada orang -orang untuk berjuang untuk persatuan dan persatuan nasional dan selalu mempertahankan kenyamanan ibadah," kata Rusli.

berita: Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives finally reacted to the data jurisprudence leak of one million Facebook users in Indonesia. Facebook is considered to have violated applicable laws. Meutya Hafid, deputy chairman of the Golkar faction in Commission I, saw that Facebook had committed serious violations. Meutya cited Article 32 of the ITE Law as a rule that Facebook violated. "As a sovereign country, the law in Indonesia must be complied with and anyone who violates it will be subject to sanctions in accordance with the applicable laws ...," wrote Meutya when contacted via WhatsApp, Thursday (5/4). In addition, Meutya stated that the government could sue, impose sanctions, and close access to Facebook. He is worried that if the social network is not given any punishment, it will set a bad precedent for other internet companies in Indonesia. "Please the government can choose an option from the three." Meanwhile, Hanafi Rais from the PAN faction has proposed that Commission I of the DPR immediately summon Facebook Indonesia regarding the findings of the leaked data.
berita_id: Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia akhirnya bereaksi terhadap kebocoran yurisprudensi data satu juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia.Facebook dianggap telah melanggar hukum yang berlaku.Meutya Hafid, wakil ketua faksi Golkar di Komisi I, melihat bahwa Facebook telah melakukan pelanggaran serius.Meutya mengutip Pasal 32 Hukum ITE sebagai aturan yang dilanggar Facebook."Sebagai negara yang berdaulat, undang -undang di Indonesia harus dipenuhi dan siapa pun yang melanggar itu akan dikenakan sanksi sesuai dengan hukum yang berlaku ...," tulis Meutya ketika dihubungi melalui WhatsApp, Kamis (5/4).Selain itu, Meutya menyatakan bahwa pemerintah dapat menuntut, menjatuhkan sanksi, dan mengakses akses dekat ke Facebook.Dia khawatir bahwa jika jejaring sosial tidak diberi hukuman apa pun, itu akan menetapkan preseden yang buruk untuk perusahaan internet lain di Indonesia."Tolong pemerintah dapat memilih opsi dari ketiganya."Sementara itu, Hanafi Rais dari faksi Pan telah mengusulkan agar Komisi I dari DPR segera memanggil Facebook Indonesia mengenai temuan data yang bocor.

berita: Finance Minister Sri Mulyani Indrawati immediately denied the news that was recently discussed by the media, including by netizens on social media. The news is about the increase in the salary of President Joko Widodo (Jokowi) which is said to be up to IDR 553 million per month. After accompanying President Joko Widodo to receive the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, Monday (12/3/2018), the Minister of Finance said the news was not true or a hoax. "Currently, a lot of information is produced, and the documents that are made are similar to those officially made by the government and then published. We did not discuss it at all. Absolutely nothing," he said at the Bogor Palace. He added that the salary design for civil servants next year will only be discussed with Parliament when the 2019 State Budget Draft is discussed after reading the 2019 Financial Note. Previously, a Government Regulation Draft concerning State Civil Apparatus was circulated which stated that the President's salary had increased from the current position of Rp. 62 million to Rp. 553 million. Citing detikcom on Friday (9/3/2018) reported an exposition of material related to the proposed new structure for the salary of Civil Servants (PNS) in circulation. In the explanation, one of them was stated about the simulation of the income of state officials from the president to the leadership of the DPR which consists of salaries and allowances. It is stated that the president's income is simulated at Rp. 553422694 per month, then the vice president is Rp. 368948462 per month. Still from the same explanation, the simulation of the amount of income for ministerial level officials, attorney general, Commander of the TNI, Chief of Police, Chair of the MPR, Chairman of the DPR to Chairman of the Constitutional Court has an income of Rp. 92237116 per month. A simulation of the calculation of the income of officials starting from the level of deputy heads of the MPR, DPR, DPD, KPK and MK is also described, which is Rp. 88393902 million per month. Then the income of the governor and member judges of the Supreme Court is Rp. 76864263 million per month. In the presentation  material, the title "RPP on Salaries, Benefits and Facilities for Civil Servants" was written with the logo of the Ministry of Administrative Reform and Bureaucratic Reform (PAN-RB) written on it. When confirmed, the Ministry of PAN-RB explained that the exposure material was not official information. "This is only a discussion material for 2016, not official information," explained the Head of the Legal, Communication and Public Information Bureau of the PAN-RB Ministry, Herman Suryatman when contacted by detikFinance.
berita_id: Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani Indrawati segera membantah berita yang baru -baru ini dibahas oleh media, termasuk oleh netizen di media sosial.Berita itu tentang peningkatan gaji Presiden Joko Widodo (Jokowi) yang dikatakan hingga IDR 553 juta per bulan.Setelah menemani Presiden Joko Widodo untuk menerima delegasi Bank Investasi Infrastruktur Asia (AIIB), Senin (12/3/2018), Menteri Keuangan mengatakan berita itu tidak benar atau tipuan."Saat ini, banyak informasi yang diproduksi, dan dokumen -dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan yang secara resmi dibuat oleh pemerintah dan kemudian diterbitkan. Kami tidak membahasnya sama sekali. Sama sekali tidak ada," katanya di Istana Bogor.Dia menambahkan bahwa desain gaji untuk pegawai negeri sipil tahun depan hanya akan dibahas dengan parlemen ketika draf anggaran negara 2019 dibahas setelah membaca Catatan Keuangan 2019.Sebelumnya, rancangan peraturan pemerintah tentang peralatan sipil negara diedarkan yang menyatakan bahwa gaji presiden telah meningkat dari posisi RP saat ini.62 juta hingga RP.553 juta.Mengutip Detikcom pada hari Jumat (9/3/2018) melaporkan eksposisi materi yang terkait dengan struktur baru yang diusulkan untuk gaji pegawai negeri sipil (PNS) yang beredar.Dalam penjelasannya, salah satunya dinyatakan tentang simulasi pendapatan pejabat negara dari presiden hingga kepemimpinan DPR yang terdiri dari gaji dan tunjangan.Dinyatakan bahwa pendapatan presiden disimulasikan di RP.553422694 per bulan, maka wakil presiden adalah RP.368948462 per bulan.Masih dari penjelasan yang sama, simulasi jumlah pendapatan untuk pejabat tingkat menteri, Jaksa Agung, Komandan TNI, Kepala Polisi, Ketua MPR, Ketua DPR kepada Ketua Pengadilan Konstitusi memiliki pendapatan RP.92237116 per bulan.Simulasi perhitungan pendapatan pejabat mulai dari tingkat wakil kepala MPR, DPR, DPD, KPK dan MK juga dijelaskan, yaitu RP.88393902 juta per bulan.Maka pendapatan Gubernur dan Hakim Anggota Mahkamah Agung adalah RP.76864263 juta per bulan.Dalam materi presentasi, judul "RPP tentang Gaji, Manfaat dan Fasilitas untuk Pegawai Negeri Sipil" ditulis dengan logo Kementerian Reformasi Administratif dan Reformasi Birokratis (PAN-RB) yang ditulis di atasnya.Ketika dikonfirmasi, Kementerian Pan-RB menjelaskan bahwa bahan paparan itu bukan informasi resmi."Ini hanya materi diskusi untuk 2016, bukan informasi resmi," jelas kepala Biro Informasi Hukum, Komunikasi dan Publik dari Kementerian PAN-RB, Herman Suryatman ketika dihubungi oleh DetikFinance.

berita: It went viral with the Call for Netizens to uninstall the Traveloka application. This invitation was observed milling about on social media sharing Tuesday (11/14/2017). This was apparently triggered by pianist Ananda Sukarlan's walk out when the Governor of DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan gave a speech. KepriNews.co.id was monitored on Tuesday (14/11/2017) on social media Twitter the hashtag #uninstalltraveloka was trending first on Twitter Indonesia. The walk out took place during the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College on Saturday (11/11), at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran. Ananda stood up enounce from his VIP seat and walked out when Anies gave his speech. The action was followed by a number of other alumni. Based on information circulating on the timeline, one of the founders and CTO of Traveloka, Derianto Kusuma, greeted and congratulated Ananda after the walk out and Anies' speech, which was considered as support for Ananda's action. I don't know who started it, this information then provoked some netizens to boycott Traveloka. The hashtags #BoikotTraveloka and #uninstalltraveloka have become one of Indonesia's trending Twitter topics. Derianto and Ananda are two of the five outstanding Kanisius College alumni who received awards at this event. Besides the two, there were Father Magnis Suseno (a Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (a Scout leader) and Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). As reported by KepriNews.co.id from the Detik.com page Tuesday (14/11/2017) When contacted, Traveloka PR Manager Busyra Oryza confirmed that Traveloka founder and CTO Derianto Kusuma was one of the award recipients at the event. But he was unable to attend. "Actually, Mr. Deri (Derianto) was not present. He was on a business trip that day. So if it is said that Mr. Deri is there and it is called to provide support (to Ananda), he is not there," said Busyra.
berita_id: Itu menjadi viral dengan panggilan netizens untuk menghapus aplikasi Traveloka.Undangan ini diamati penggilingan tentang pembagian media sosial Selasa (11/14/2017).Ini tampaknya dipicu oleh pianis Ananda Sukarlan keluar ketika gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato.Keprinews.co.id dipantau pada hari Selasa (14/11/2017) di media sosial Twitter Tagar #uninstalltraveloka tren pertama di Twitter Indonesia.Walk Out berlangsung selama peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College pada hari Sabtu (11/11), di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran.Ananda berdiri ENOUNCE dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar ketika Anies memberikan pidatonya.Tindakan itu diikuti oleh sejumlah alumni lain.Berdasarkan informasi yang beredar di timeline, salah satu pendiri dan CTO Traveloka, DeRianto Kusuma, menyambut dan memberi selamat kepada Ananda setelah pidato berjalan dan anies, yang dianggap sebagai dukungan untuk tindakan Ananda.Saya tidak tahu siapa yang memulainya, informasi ini kemudian memprovokasi beberapa netizen untuk memboikot Traveloka.Tagar #Boikottraveloka dan #uninstalltraveloka telah menjadi salah satu topik Twitter yang sedang tren di Indonesia.DeRianto dan Ananda adalah dua dari lima alumni Kanisius College yang luar biasa yang menerima penghargaan di acara ini.Selain keduanya, ada ayah Magnis Suseno (sosok Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (seorang pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr. Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farha).Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Keprinews.co.id dari halaman Detik.com Selasa (14/11/2017) ketika dihubungi, manajer PR Traveloka Busyra Oryza mengkonfirmasi bahwa pendiri Traveloka dan CTO DeRianto Kusuma adalah salah satu penerima penghargaan di acara tersebut.Tapi dia tidak bisa hadir."Sebenarnya, Tuan Deri (Derianto) tidak ada. Dia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis hari itu. Jadi jika dikatakan bahwa Tuan Deri ada di sana dan dipanggil untuk memberikan dukungan (kepada Ananda), dia tidak ada di sana," kata Busyra.

berita: Trending News – Who among you doesn't play Pokemon GO? This Nintendo game has managed to make every human being lower their head and focus their eyes on the smartphone they are holding while playing Pokemon GO. The Pokemon GO game does present a different experience and sensation compared to games that have existed before, so it's no wonder that this game is much loved even though it has not yet reached one month. Controversy regarding Pokemon GO is growing, especially in our own homeland, Indonesia. Yes, in this country, various controversies have occurred due to the presence of Pokemon GO in the world of mobile games. Not only civilians who spoke, even the vice president of Indonesia also voiced his opinion about Pokemon GO. In addition, recently there was news about the 'ban' Pokemon GO by MUI Indramayu. Curious? Is Pokemon GO Really Banned? The Indonesian Ulema Council or abbreviated as MUI is a non-governmental organization that accommodates ulama, zu'ama and Islamic scholars to guide Muslims in Indonesia. Well, it is reported that the MUI Indramayu, West Java Regency, has issued a fatwa that the Pokemon GO game is illegal. Wow, why is that so? Why is the Pokemon GO game banned? That's right, the MUI Indramayu has banned the Pokemon GO game. The reason is, playing Pokemon GO can indeed make you hypnotized. What does hypnotized mean? Yes, you can unknowingly trespass and break through a number of places just to look for Pokemon. Therefore, this is the reference for MUI Indramayu to forbid Pokemon GO. According to the deputy chairman of the MUI Indramayu, Sofyan Tsauri explained, "So the game is likened to a person who is drunk with alcohol so that he forgets his work and obligations." In addition, he also emphasized that it is not allowed to play Pokemon GO, even the game is forbidden. Because there have been many negative impacts, such as wasting time looking for Pokemon, even though there are many things that are more useful than hunting Pokemon. Sofyan gave a clear example, namely due to the Pokemon GO game, students are not studying and employees are not working even if they neglect to worship. Not only that, he also reiterated, "Allah SWT forbids wine because it is intoxicating like the Pokemon Go game, in the word of God in the letter Al Maidah verse 90 which reads, 'O you who believe, actually drinking wine (drunk) is an act of the devil'. ." It means, it can be concluded that according to Sofyan, playing Pokemon GO is an act of the devil, because the impact can be intoxicating. Some Say Pokemon Means "I'm Jewish", Really? Hearing the word Pokemon, right now your mindset will definitely run to the Pokemon GO game. Well, if you don't know, it turns out that there are rumors that reveal that the meaning of the word Pokemon is "I'm Jewish". This is interpreted through the Syriac language, or Syriac language which if translated will have such meaning. Wow, this can be proof that Pokemon GO is haram, right? There have been many incidents from Pokemon GO that ended up endangering lives Pokemon GO is a very popular game. However, because of the presence of Pokemon GO, many people are less aware of the surrounding situations and conditions. What is the impact? As previously discussed, the writer from JalanTikus himself had an unpleasant experience as a result of playing Pokemon GO, because the smartphone he used wanted to be snatched. The government is ready to block Pokemon GO if it proves to be unsafe A few days earlier, there was news that if it proved dangerous, the Pokemon GO game was ready to be blocked by the Ministry of Communication and Information The reason is, judging from standstill the fatwa of the MUI Indramayu and the events that have happened, it is possible that the government will actually block Pokemon GO from Indonesia. Things like this further support the banning of the game Pokemon GO. So, Playing Pokemon GO is Satanic and Haram? Actually, it depends on how you play Pokemon GO. According to the MUI Indramayu, they forbid it because Pokemon GO players neglect their duties and even forget to pray. In fact, if you can manage the time, you can finish your task first before playing Pokemon GO, complete your worship obligations first before playing Pokemon GO, maybe it won't be a problem. Thus, the government will not block access to Pokemon GO from Indonesia. In addition, Pokemon itself actually stands for Pocket Monsters which comes from Japanese ???????????? Poketto Monsuta. Then, Pokemon also refers to 721 fictional species that must appear in all Pokemon series. Therefore, there seems to be a misunderstanding in the meaning of the Syriac language. If it's true that Pokemon GO means "I'm Jewish" and should be left behind, will you also leave social media Facebook which in fact was created by Jews?

berita: The more rampant gamers play Pokemon Go, it turns out to cause pros and cons, especially in Indonesia. Moreover, recently heard the news that the game has an implied meaning that cannot be tolerated, especially for followers of the Islamic religion. From several links spread on social media, it is rearing discussed that Pokemon actually means "I am Jewish" in Syriac, while Pikachu is referred to as "Be Jewish" and Charmander means "God is Weak". That's where this problem started, some people immediately believed and redistributed the link to invite others to avoid Pokemon Go. There are also those who do not believe and think it is something made up. So, are these rumors true or not? It turns out that Nintendo denied it and the LA Times noted it, you could say all this is just a rumor that is not proven at all. Pokemon in English is an abbreviation of two words, namely Pocket Monster which means pocket monster. You could say, these monsters called Pokemon have a small size and can be stored in the trainer's pocket. While Pikachu which is known as the icon of Pokemon is also formed from two words, namely Pika (shining) and Chu (rat). From its shape alone it is clear that Pikachu is a mouse that glows or is armed with electric shocks. Finally, Charmander also has the meaning of burning fire, like the appearance of Charmander himself in the anime and Pokemon games.
berita_id: Gamer yang lebih merajalela memainkan Pokemon Go, ternyata menyebabkan pro dan kontra, terutama di Indonesia.Selain itu, baru -baru ini mendengar berita bahwa permainan memiliki makna tersirat yang tidak dapat ditoleransi, terutama bagi pengikut agama Islam.Dari beberapa tautan yang tersebar di media sosial, dibesarkan dibahas bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya berarti "Saya Yahudi" di Syria, sementara Pikachu disebut sebagai "menjadi Yahudi" dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Di situlah masalah ini dimulai, beberapa orang segera percaya dan mendistribusikan kembali tautan untuk mengundang orang lain untuk menghindari Pokemon Go.Ada juga orang -orang yang tidak percaya dan berpikir itu adalah sesuatu yang dibuat -buat.Jadi, apakah rumor ini benar atau tidak?Ternyata Nintendo membantahnya dan LA Times mencatatnya, Anda bisa mengatakan semua ini hanyalah rumor yang tidak terbukti sama sekali.Pokemon dalam bahasa Inggris adalah singkatan dari dua kata, yaitu monster saku yang berarti monster saku.Bisa dibilang, monster -monster yang disebut Pokemon ini memiliki ukuran kecil dan dapat disimpan di saku pelatih.Sementara Pikachu yang dikenal sebagai ikon Pokemon juga dibentuk dari dua kata, yaitu pika (bersinar) dan Chu (tikus).Dari bentuknya saja jelas bahwa Pikachu adalah tikus yang bersinar atau dipersenjatai dengan sengatan listrik.Akhirnya, Charmander juga memiliki arti membakar api, seperti penampilan Charmander sendiri di game anime dan pokemon.

berita: Warganet is still confused about the unclear information regarding the fate of Facebook in Indonesia. They also wonder, whether Facebook will be closed in Indonesia or not? Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara said that he would not block (close) Facebook permanently, but only temporarily. That is if the situation gets worse. "We will see this situation first. If it gets worse, then we will temporarily close (block it)," said Minister of Communication and Information Rudiantara. Rudiantara was reluctant to talk about closing Facebook's operations permanently. He is more focused on monitoring Facebook to create data security and prevent the spread of hate speech. The House of Representatives also had asked Kominfo to be more strict with Facebook. "We and the government - the Ministry of Communication and Information - will talk again regarding the follow-up to Facebook's mistake. Personally, I'm still open to sanctions, it's also possible to suggest a Facebook service moratorium," said Meutya Hafid, Member of Commission I DPR RI. Meutya estimates that the DPR RI will wait for the results of Facebook's internal investigation for the next month. "We are waiting, I think a month should be enough time. We hope that the results of this investigation will not only blame who, but also spring up there should be information, where this misused data went and what it was used for," he said. Case Beginning The controversy arose from the Cambridge Analytica scandal, which accused Facebook of leaking data. After being investigated, it turns out that "leak" is not the right term. The data was not leaked, but rather misused by Cambridge Analytica, allegedly for political purposes. The data taken is also not the content of the message, but data that is publicly listed on a person's profile. Unfortunately, the rice has become porridge. There has been confusion about this, to the point that the DPR also summoned Facebook to ask for an explanation. As a result, the discourse of blocking Facebook arises. "That Facebook data is not leaked. If it leaks, the term is like a pipe with water, you don't know where the leak is, this data is compromised," said Rudiantara. Facebook has been given SP 2 The Ministry of Communication and Information has sent SP 2 to Facebook, but there is no information about SP 3 which means closing. When asked about the validity period of SP 2 to the next SP, Rudiantara has not yet given a definitive answer. "Yes, it could be a day, a month, see the situation first," concluded Rudiantara. He claimed to have received an explanation from the Irish Facebook office which manages Facebook in Indonesia. In a statement by Facebook Ireland to Rudiantara, they provided information on numbers related to misuse of data that afflicted users. Rudiantara also continues to monitor the development of Indonesian user data on Facebook.
berita_id: Warganet masih bingung tentang informasi yang tidak jelas mengenai nasib Facebook di Indonesia.Mereka juga bertanya -tanya, apakah Facebook akan ditutup di Indonesia atau tidak?Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa ia tidak akan memblokir (menutup) Facebook secara permanen, tetapi hanya sementara.Itu jika situasinya semakin buruk."Kami akan melihat situasi ini terlebih dahulu. Jika menjadi lebih buruk, maka kami akan untuk sementara waktu akan menutup (memblokirnya)," kata Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi Rudiantara.Rudiantara enggan berbicara tentang menutup operasi Facebook secara permanen.Dia lebih fokus pada pemantauan Facebook untuk menciptakan keamanan data dan mencegah penyebaran pidato kebencian.Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat juga telah meminta Kominfo untuk lebih ketat dengan Facebook."Kami dan pemerintah - Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi - akan berbicara lagi mengenai tindak lanjut kesalahan Facebook. Secara pribadi, saya masih terbuka untuk sanksi, juga mungkin untuk menyarankan moratorium layanan Facebook," kata Meutya Hafid, anggota Komisi I DPR RI.Meutya memperkirakan bahwa DPR RI akan menunggu hasil penyelidikan internal Facebook untuk bulan berikutnya."Kami sedang menunggu, saya pikir sebulan harus ada waktu yang cukup. Kami berharap bahwa hasil penyelidikan ini tidak hanya akan menyalahkan siapa, tetapi juga muncul di atas harus ada informasi, di mana data yang disalahgunakan ini pergi dan untuk apa itu digunakan," katanya.Kasus yang memulai kontroversi muncul dari skandal Cambridge Analytica, yang menuduh Facebook bocor data.Setelah diselidiki, ternyata "bocor" bukanlah istilah yang tepat.Data itu tidak bocor, melainkan disalahgunakan oleh Cambridge Analytica, yang diduga untuk tujuan politik.Data yang diambil juga bukan konten pesan, tetapi data yang terdaftar di depan umum pada profil seseorang.Sayangnya, nasi telah menjadi bubur.Telah ada kebingungan tentang hal ini, sampai -sampai DPR juga memanggil Facebook untuk meminta penjelasan.Akibatnya, wacana memblokir Facebook muncul."Data Facebook itu tidak bocor. Jika bocor, istilahnya seperti pipa dengan air, Anda tidak tahu di mana bocornya, data ini dikompromikan," kata Rudiantara.Facebook telah diberikan SP 2 Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informasi telah mengirim SP 2 ke Facebook, tetapi tidak ada informasi tentang SP 3 yang berarti penutupan.Ketika ditanya tentang periode validitas SP 2 ke SP berikutnya, Rudiantara belum memberikan jawaban yang pasti."Ya, itu bisa jadi sehari, sebulan, melihat situasinya terlebih dahulu," pungkas Rudiantara.Dia mengaku telah menerima penjelasan dari kantor Facebook Irlandia yang mengelola Facebook di Indonesia.Dalam sebuah pernyataan oleh Facebook Irlandia ke Rudiantara, mereka memberikan informasi tentang angka -angka yang terkait dengan penyalahgunaan data yang pengguna yang menderita.Rudiantara juga terus memantau pengembangan data pengguna Indonesia di Facebook.

berita: A news that Facebook will be blocked on April 24, 2018 is viral on social media. It is known, the info was first posted by an account called "Rudi Salam", then many netizens participated in reposting the post. A post from Rudi Salam's account posted on Saturday (14/4). Get tens of thousands of shares with various comments. In the description of his upload, Rudi wrote: “Starting April 24, Facebook Indonesia will be closed. Welcome back to the stone age. Say goodbye stay for friends on your Facebook before it closes,” he wrote This information is confirmed to be untrue or a hoax. Minister of Communications and Informatics (Menkominfo) Rudiantara on various occasions never said it would block Facebook. udiantara had previously stated will block Facebook if it is proven that there is a violation of the applicable rules, but there has been no decision to block Facebook to date. The Minister of Communication and Information also stated that he would not hesitate to block Facebook if the captured data is used to incite or spread hate. Minister of Communication and Information also ensure that investigators find elements of criminal allegations in user data leaks Facebook in Indonesia. Meanwhile, these two things have not been proven. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, as harlan f stone happened in Myanmar, I have no qualms about blocking." said Rudiantara, Wednesday (11/4/2018), at the Kominfo Building, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta, as reported from Kompas.com
berita_id: Sebuah berita bahwa Facebook akan diblokir pada 24 April 2018 adalah viral di media sosial.Diketahui, info pertama kali diposting oleh akun yang disebut "Rudi Salam", kemudian banyak netizen berpartisipasi dalam memposting ulang pos.Posting dari akun Rudi Salam diposting pada hari Sabtu (14/4).Dapatkan puluhan ribu saham dengan berbagai komentar.Dalam deskripsi unggahannya, Rudi menulis: "Mulai 24 April, Facebook Indonesia akan ditutup. Selamat datang kembali ke Zaman Batu. Ucapkan selamat tinggal pada teman -teman di Facebook Anda sebelum ditutup," ia menulis informasi ini dikonfirmasi tidak benar atau tipuan.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informatika (Menkominfo) Rudiantara pada berbagai kesempatan tidak pernah mengatakan itu akan memblokir Facebook.Udiantara sebelumnya menyatakan akan memblokir Facebook jika terbukti bahwa ada pelanggaran terhadap aturan yang berlaku, tetapi belum ada keputusan untuk memblokir Facebook hingga saat ini.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi juga menyatakan bahwa ia tidak akan ragu untuk memblokir Facebook jika data yang ditangkap digunakan untuk menghasut atau menyebarkan kebencian.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi juga memastikan bahwa penyelidik menemukan unsur -unsur tuduhan kriminal dalam data pengguna bocor Facebook di Indonesia.Sementara itu, kedua hal ini belum terbukti."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti yang terjadi di Harlan F Stone di Myanmar, saya tidak punya keraguan tentang pemblokiran."kata Rudiantara, Rabu (11/4/2018), di gedung Kominfo, Medan Merdeka, Jakarta, seperti yang dilaporkan dari Kompas.com

berita: A commotion reportedly occurred at the Brimob Corps Terrorist Detention Center, Salemba Rutan Branch, Friday (10/11) afternoon at around 16.00 WIB. The uproar was carried out by terrorist prisoners which resulted in the destruction of a number of prison facilities. A message spread in the media said that the trigger for the riot was caused by officers throwing the holy Koran. Through his written statement, the Head of the Public Information Bureau of the Police Brigadier General Rikwanto said the chain message was a hoax. The hoax message reads: There has been a riot at the Headquarters of Brimob Kelapa Dua, two depots where the terrorist prisoners burned and destroyed the room because the guard Ahmad and his team threw the Koran and caused the prisoners to go berserk. Until now, the rioting at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters is still continuing. 3 blocks burned and the door was destroyed. Everyone, pray for our brothers and sisters who are being held at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters. Rikwanto also denied the message. Meanwhile, through his written statement, Rikwanto explained that after Friday prayers, the prisoners were put into their respective cells. After entering, the Densus picket removed the key in rooms A5 and C5 (RB) because there was a key slot from the inside. "For security purposes and to make it easier for the picket officer to open the cell door," explained Rikwanto in his written statement, Friday (11/10). While carrying out these activities, the Densus picket conducted a search in the room and found 4 cell phones. The cellphones belonged to Juhanda, Saulihun, Kairul Anam and Jumali. Because of the investigation, one of the detainees felt disapproved and provoked the officers with various kinds of words. "Then there are  members who are provoked by their words and there are prisoners who while takbir loudly so that they provoke prisoners from the block next to them," explained Rikwanto. The picket members also took action by shooting upwards to signal a commotion and warn the inmates. At this time, the atmosphere can be appeased by the picket members. "After that, members were on standby in picket while waiting for developments, but the prisoners still had takbir takbir, triggering others," he continued.
berita_id: Keributan dilaporkan terjadi di Pusat Penahanan Teroris Korps Brimob, Cabang Salemba Rutan, Jumat (10/11) sore sekitar pukul 16.00 WIB.Keributan itu dilakukan oleh para tahanan teroris yang pesan itu.Sementara itu, melalui pernyataan tertulisnya, Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa setelah doa Jumat, para tahanan dimasukkan ke dalam sel masing -masing.Setelah masuk, piket densus melepas kunci di suasananya dapat ditenangkan oleh anggota piket."Setelah itu, anggota siaga di piket sambil menunggu perkembangan, tetapi para tahanan masih memiliki Takbir Takbir, memicu orang lain," lanjutnya.

berita: Toothbrush is the most important bath tool to remove dirt around the teeth so that dental health is maintained. However, using a toothbrush should not be careless, especially in choosing the toothbrush you use. And when you want to buy a toothbrush, you should pay attention to the code behind the packaging, don't let your toothbrush be made of pig bristles Currently, a number of people are shocked by a toothbrush product that uses pig bristles. The use of the product refers to the writing in English, namely bristles on the packaging There is one secret code which means your toothbrush is made of boar bristles. The Or** * brand toothbrush is clearly made of bristles. The product packaging clearly describes the product. Responding to this case, the Chairman of the Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta said, if it is true that the toothbrush is made of pig bristles, the toothbrush is haram. In Al Surah Al Maidah verse 3 it is explained that derivatives from pigs are haram. We will investigate this prohibition, research lab really from sea urchins or not," said Muhammad Hatta However, the Medan City Health Service through the Secretary of the North Sumatra Health Office, Afwan Lubis, is not sure about the existence of a toothbrush made of pig bristles. He added that laboratory tests were carried out if there were reports from the public regarding the boar bristle toothbrush. If it really contains sea urchins, then it should not be circulated because there are elements that are not halal I don't think it's possible. But how are you? We can comment if there is a laboratory test first. Currently there is no laboratory test," said Afwan, as quoted from Tribunnews.com (8/3)
berita_id: Sikat gigi adalah alat mandi paling penting untuk menghilangkan kotoran di sekitar gigi sehingga kesehatan gigi dipertahankan.Namun, menggunakan sikat gigi tidak boleh ceroboh, terutama dalam memilih sikat gigi yang Anda gunakan.Dan ketika Anda ingin membeli sikat gigi, Anda harus memperhatikan kode di balik kemasannya, jangan biarkan sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi saat ini, sejumlah orang terkejut oleh produk sikat gigi yang menggunakan bulu babi.Penggunaan produk mengacu pada tulisan dalam bahasa Inggris, yaitu bulu pada kemasan ada satu kode rahasia yang berarti sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari bulu babi.Sikat gigi merek atau *** jelas terbuat dari bulu.Kemasan produk dengan jelas menggambarkan produk.Menanggapi kasus ini, ketua Medan City MUI, Muhammad Hatta berkata, jika benar bahwa sikat gigi terbuat dari bulu babi, sikat gigi adalah haram.Dalam Al Surah Al Maidah ayat 3 dijelaskan bahwa turunan dari babi adalah haram.Kami akan menyelidiki larangan ini, laboratorium penelitian yang benar -benar dari bulu babi atau tidak, ”kata Muhammad Hatta, namun, Layanan Kesehatan Kota Medan melalui Sekretaris Kantor Kesehatan Sumatra Utara, Afwan Lubis, tidak yakin tentang keberadaan sikat gigi yang tidak ada di bawah tanah yang tidak ada yang tidak ada di bawah.Diedarkan karena ada elemen yang tidak halal saya tidak berpikir itu mungkin.

berita: Recently, the city of Surabaya was shocked by the discovery of pacifiers in bottles suspected of containing drugs. With this discovery information, the Civil Service Police Unit (Satpol PP) of Surabaya City conducted raids in 14 sub-districts and confiscated hundreds of these candy pacifiers. "The raid was held for two days, March 6 to 7. On the first day, 345 bottles of candy suspected of containing drugs were confiscated," said Head of Surabaya City Satpol PP, Irvan Widiyanto, Wednesday (8/3/2017). The 14 sub-districts that were targeted for the raid were the sub-districts of Gunung Anyar, Simokerto, Gubeng, Bulak, Tandes, Jambangan, Tenggilis Mejoyo, Tambak sari, Sukolilo, Sambi Kerep, Sawahan, Karang Pilang, Wiyung, and Pabean Cantikan. is still being tested in the laboratory. "A total of 345 bottles were obtained and laboratory tests are still being carried out," said Irvan. The locations targeted for the raids were hawkers and grocery stores near the elementary school (SD). The raid was carried out after it was found that students skipped school examine in the East Surabaya area last week. The elementary school student felt dizzy after consuming pacifiers. "Satpol PP also cooperates with Pusksemas in each sub-district. So that testing can be carried out immediately when the candy is found," he explained. Meanwhile, the Head of the Surabaya City National Narcotics Agency (BNNK), AKBP Suparti, asked the public to calm down and not panic over the incident. His party has also dispatched a team after receiving information on the pacifier candy which is suspected to contain the drug. "This is still a guess. It will be confirmed later after the Lab test. At the earliest, this test can be known in the next three days," he said briefly.
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, kota Surabaya terkejut dengan penemuan dot dalam botol yang diduga mengandung obat -obatan.Dengan informasi penemuan ini, Unit Kepolisian Dinas Sipil (SATPOL PP) dari Kota Surabaya melakukan penggerebekan di 14 sub-distrik dan menyita ratusan dot permen ini."Serangan itu diadakan selama dua hari, 6 hingga 7 Maret. Ini akan dikonfirmasi nanti setelah tes laboratorium. Paling awal, tes ini dapat diketahui dalam tiga hari ke depan," katanya sebentar.

berita: Riots broke out at the Salemba detention center branch of the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters, Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, which housed terrorism convicts. However, the police confirmed that there was no throwing of the Koran in the incident. The incident atomic number  occurred because of the prisoner's reaction when officers confiscated his cell phone in Block C detention. He emphasized that there was no throwing of the Koran by the guard. However, the officers did check the books belonging to the cell occupants. According to him, terrorist prisoners damaged a number of prison facilities during the riots. For example, the prison cell door, the gate of the hallway block, and the window pane.
