berita: Dozens of terrorism detainees at the Salemba detention center branch of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Kelapa Dua went on a rampage Friday (10/11). This is call thought to have occurred because of the mobile phone raid on terrorism detainees. However, there is information circulating that there is a throwing of the Koran in the prison. There is a video circulating in the video that shows dozens of prisoners screaming. They came out of the holding cell. Several prisoners were seen clenching their fists. Screams were heard. In another video, several prisoners can be seen kicking at the cell door, some are carrying a wooden door that has been released. Some of the prisoners wore t-shirts. From outside the cell, a number of police officers were seen trying to calm the angry prisoners. It is possible that the video came from the prisoners' cellphones. Because, the angle of the video is in the detention cell. Not from outside the cell at the Mobile Brigade Command Headquarters. Head of the General Information Section (Kabagpenum) of the National Police Divhumas Kombespol Martinus Sitompul said that the issue of the throwing of the Koran in the detention center was not true. "However, the cause of the riot was only the raid on cellphones owned by prisoners of terrorism cases," he explained. Initially, the officers examined the objects and books that were in the detention cell. That's when the prisoners went on a rampage because some of them had cellphones. During the rampage, the cell door was damaged, the turmoil was only in Blocks B and C," he explained. According to him, the current condition of the prison is conducive. The prisoners are already in a calm condition. "It doesn't continue, everything is safe," explained the former Head of the Polda Metro Jaya Head of Public Relations. It should be noted that most of the detainees in terrorism cases are being held at the Salemba Rutan at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters branch, Kelapa Dua. In fact, there is Amir Jamaah Ansharut Daulah (JAD) Aman Abdurrahman, who some time ago was immediately picked up by the Anti-Terror Detachment 88 when he was released from the Nusakambangan White Sand Prison.
berita_id: Lusinan tahanan terorisme di Cabang Pusat Penahanan Salemba dari Markas Besar Brigade Mobile Kelapa Dua mengamuk Jumat (10/11).Ini adalah panggilan yang dianggap terjadi karena serangan ponsel pada tahanan terorisme.Namun, ada informasi yang beredar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran di penjara.Ada video yang beredar dalam video yang menunjukkan lusinan tahanan berteriak.Mereka keluar dari sel penahan.Beberapa tahanan terlihat mengepal tinju mereka.Jeritan terdengar.Dalam video lain, beberapa tahanan terlihat menendang di pintu sel, beberapa membawa pintu kayu yang telah dilepaskan.Beberapa tahanan mengenakan t-shirt.Dari luar sel, sejumlah petugas polisi terlihat berusaha menenangkan para tahanan yang marah.Mungkin saja video itu berasal dari ponsel tahanan.Karena, sudut video ada di sel penahanan.Bukan dari luar sel di markas perintah brigade seluler.Kepala Bagian Informasi Umum (Kabagpenum) dari Kepolisian Nasional divhumas Kombespol Martinus Sitompul mengatakan bahwa masalah pelemparan Alquran di pusat penahanan tidak benar."Namun, penyebab kerusuhan hanyalah serangan di ponsel yang dimiliki oleh para tahanan kasus terorisme," jelasnya.Awalnya, para petugas memeriksa benda dan buku yang ada di sel penahanan.Saat itulah para tahanan mengamuk karena beberapa dari mereka memiliki ponsel.Selama mengamuk, pintu sel rusak, kekacauan itu hanya di blok B dan C, "jelasnya. Menurutnya, kondisi penjara saat ini kondusif. Para tahanan sudah dalam kondisi yang tenang." Tidak berlanjut, semuanya aman, "jelas mantan Kepala Polda yang di dalamnya, kepala detor di atas raih di atas.Cabang Markas Besar Brigade, Kelapa Dua.

berita: The Minister of Communication and Information, Rudiantara, said that currently there is a lot of negative content circulating on social media. According to him, the steps currently being taken by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics to overcome this are closing the accounts that spread the content. “Yesterday I met with Commission I, and the current content is a lot of negative things, damaging the relationship with one another. There is something bad on social media that gives us the authority, of course closing the account," he said at a press conference in Jakarta, yesterday. However, if negative content and accounts spreading bad content cannot be controlled, Facebook will be closed (blocked, ed). Rudy unfold assessed that the action was in accordance with the law. “But if necessary, Kominfo will close the organizers. If we now do account restrictions, it is possible that Facebook is closed. If it is needed later, yes, it must be," he added. Rudy added, his party will establish a relationship with the Indonesian Ulema Council (MUI) regarding the recently issued social media fatwa. Because, the one who knows in detail about the fatwa is MUI. "God willing, I will return to MUI to jointly follow up on this fatwa," he concluded.
berita_id: Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi, Rudiantara, mengatakan bahwa saat ini ada banyak konten negatif yang beredar di media sosial.Menurutnya, langkah -langkah yang saat ini diambil oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika untuk mengatasi hal ini menutup akun yang menyebarkan konten."Kemarin saya bertemu dengan Komisi I, dan konten saat ini adalah banyak hal negatif, merusak hubungan satu sama lain. Ada sesuatu yang buruk di media sosial yang memberi kita otoritas, tentu saja menutup akun," katanya pada konferensi pers di Jakarta, kemarin.Namun, jika konten negatif dan akun yang menyebarkan konten yang buruk tidak dapat dikendalikan, Facebook akan ditutup (diblokir, ed).Rudy terungkap menilai bahwa tindakan itu sesuai dengan hukum."Tetapi jika perlu, Kominfo akan menutup penyelenggara. Jika kita sekarang melakukan pembatasan akun, ada kemungkinan bahwa Facebook ditutup. Jika diperlukan nanti, ya, itu pasti," tambahnya.Rudy menambahkan, partainya akan menjalin hubungan dengan Dewan Ulama Indonesia (MUI) mengenai fatwa media sosial yang baru -baru ini dikeluarkan.Karena, orang yang tahu secara rinci tentang Fatwa adalah MUI."Bersedia Tuhan, aku akan kembali ke MUI untuk bersama -sama menindaklanjuti fatwa ini," pungkasnya.

berita: Now the world is addicted to the Pokemon Go game that uses characters from the Pokemon movies and Pokemon video games. And, apparently the Pokemon Go game phenomenon makes a lot of information circulating if Pokemon is related to Jews. pokemon go controversy One of them is through a broadcast that is widely circulated and states that Pokemon comes from the Syriac language which means "I am Jewish". Also the naming of Pikachu mentioned means "Be Jewish". And Charmender means "God is weak". So are these analyzes true? Pokemon itself was originally owned by the media franchise Pokemon Company, which is a consortium between Nintendo, Game Freak and Creatures. The company was originally created by Satoshi Tajiri in 1995. As written by Wikipedia, the name Pokemon actually fundamentally refers to the Japanese language which means Pocket Monsters or Poketto Monsuta. Tajiri himself has made the concept of Pokemon as a hobby to collect insects. How about the name Pikachu? The terms used in the name of the monsters in Pokemon are explained at length on the Pokemondb website. Pikachu itself consists of two syllables namely Pika which means little mouse and Chu which is the Japanese term for "squeak". The name Charmander comes from the word 'Char' which means 'to burn' and salamander is a lizard-like animal such as amphibians. In fact, Charmander's original name was hitokage, which was derived from the words 'hito' (person) and 'tokage' (lizard). Since its birth, long before Pokemon Go or the Pokemon mobile game was released, Pokemon has indeed reaped a lot of controversy. Especially regarding the symbols used. One of them who protested was the civic group Anti Defamation League which mentioned the existence of the opposite symbol of the swastika which was considered offensive to the Jewish people. As a result, the Pokemon trading cards with the logo were then withdrawn from the market. In 2001, Saudi Arabia banned Pokemon games and cards because of the star of David symbol which was said to promote Zionism. Besides, because trading cards are very close to gambling that violates Islamic law. At the time, a Nintendo spokesperson in Tokyo stated that Pokemon did not make Pokemon for religious purposes. Pokemon basically uses characters with geometric symbols according to the character. Apparently, with the presence of Pokemon Go, which is a version of the Pokemon mobile game, it does not escape controversies.
berita_id: Sekarang dunia kecanduan game Pokemon Go yang menggunakan karakter dari film Pokemon dan video game Pokemon.Dan, ternyata fenomena game Pokemon Go membuat banyak informasi yang beredar jika Pokemon terkait dengan orang Yahudi.Pokemon Go Controversy Salah satunya adalah melalui siaran yang secara luas diedarkan dan menyatakan bahwa Pokemon berasal dari bahasa Syria yang berarti "Saya Yahudi".Juga penamaan Pikachu yang disebutkan berarti "menjadi Yahudi".Dan pesona berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Jadi, apakah analisis ini benar?Pokemon sendiri awalnya dimiliki oleh perusahaan waralaba Pokemon, yang merupakan konsorsium antara Nintendo, Game Freak dan Creatures.Perusahaan ini awalnya diciptakan oleh Satoshi Tajiri pada tahun 1995. Sebagaimana ditulis oleh Wikipedia, nama Pokemon sebenarnya secara fundamental mengacu pada bahasa Jepang yang berarti monster saku atau poketto monsuta.Tajiri sendiri telah membuat konsep Pokemon sebagai hobi untuk mengumpulkan serangga.Bagaimana dengan nama Pikachu?Istilah yang digunakan atas nama monster di Pokemon dijelaskan panjang lebar di situs web PokemondB.Pikachu sendiri terdiri dari dua suku kata yaitu Pika yang berarti Little Mouse dan Chu yang merupakan istilah Jepang untuk "mencicit".Nama Charmander berasal dari kata 'char' yang berarti 'membakar' dan salamander adalah hewan seperti kadal seperti amfibi.Faktanya, nama asli Charmander adalah Hitokage, yang berasal dari kata -kata 'Hito' (orang) dan 'Tokage' (kadal).Sejak kelahirannya, jauh sebelum Pokemon Go atau game mobile Pokemon dirilis, Pokemon memang telah menuai banyak kontroversi.Terutama mengenai simbol yang digunakan.Salah satu dari mereka yang memprotes adalah kelompok sipil anti pencemaran nama baik yang menyebutkan keberadaan simbol yang berlawanan dari swastika yang dianggap menyinggung orang -orang Yahudi.Akibatnya, kartu perdagangan Pokemon dengan logo kemudian ditarik dari pasar.Pada tahun 2001, Arab Saudi melarang permainan dan kartu Pokemon karena Simbol Bintang David yang dikatakan mempromosikan Zionisme.Selain itu, karena kartu perdagangan sangat dekat dengan judi yang melanggar hukum Islam.Pada saat itu, juru bicara Nintendo di Tokyo menyatakan bahwa Pokemon tidak membuat Pokemon untuk tujuan keagamaan.Pokemon pada dasarnya menggunakan karakter dengan simbol geometris sesuai dengan karakter.Rupanya, dengan kehadiran Pokemon Go, yang merupakan versi game mobile Pokemon, itu tidak luput dari kontroversi.

berita: The National Narcotics Agency (BNN) of Surabaya City asked the public not to panic about pacifier candy. The candy, which is suspected of containing hazardous materials and drugs, is now being raided by the Surabaya City Government. The head of the Surabaya City BNN, AKBP Suparti, asked the public not to be in a hurry to worry about pacifiers. "We ask the public not to panic. We will first test the pacifier candy," said Suparti, Tuesday (7/3/2017). Suparti said that until now there is no evidence that the candy is dangerous or contains narcotic substances. "There's no lab test yet, so it can't be determined whether the candy is dangerous or not," said Suparti. The former Head of Sub-Division of Public Relations of the Surabaya Police said that his party had also taken samples of pacifier candy in various places. Such as stalls, shops, and several markets. "We populace went down and took the pacifier candy. Later a lab test will be carried out to determine whether it is dangerous or contains narcotics," said Suparti. He emphasized that his party would soon conduct a lab test on the candy.
berita_id: Badan Narkotika Nasional (BNN) Kota Surabaya meminta publik untuk tidak panik tentang Permen Paten.Permen, yang diduga mengandung bahan dan obat -obatan berbahaya, sekarang sedang digerebek oleh pemerintah kota Surabaya.Kepala Bnn Kota Surabaya, AKBP Suparti, meminta publik untuk tidak terburu -buru untuk khawatir tentang dot."Kami meminta publik untuk tidak panik. Pertama -tama kami akan menguji permen dot," kata Suparti, Selasa (7/3/2017).Suparti mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada bukti bahwa permen itu berbahaya atau mengandung zat narkotika."Belum ada tes laboratorium, jadi tidak dapat ditentukan apakah permen itu berbahaya atau tidak," kata Suparti.Mantan kepala sub-divisi hubungan masyarakat dari polisi Surabaya mengatakan bahwa partainya juga telah mengambil sampel permen dot di berbagai tempat.Seperti kios, toko, dan beberapa pasar."Kami populasi turun dan mengambil permen dot. Kemudian tes laboratorium akan dilakukan untuk menentukan apakah itu berbahaya atau mengandung narkotika," kata Suparti.Dia menekankan bahwa partainya akan segera melakukan tes lab pada permen.

berita: Recently, there have been several reports of problems surrounding the iPhone 6 device which bends easily. This immediately became a very hot topic of discussion, even some parties mocked this latest Smartphone device from Apple with material various series of sentences and also meme images. Apple did not just stay silent, it immediately responded to the news very quickly. Apple representatives revealed that they had only received nine complaints about the problem. Every product launched by Apple is made with high quality materials and has also gone through various rigorous tests and very careful construction stages to continue to provide strength and durability to the device itself. Apple also provides rigorous tests such as bending, pressure, sitting, twisting, and user studies. All of these things have been passed by the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus, both of which have successfully passed all the high quality and wear resistance standards set by Apple. The curved case of the iPhone 6 is also actually rare and only a small part of the approximately 10 million units of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus that are distributed. Apple also advises users to immediately contact customer service if a problem like this occurs. Meanwhile, a separate report revealed that these curved or bent iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus devices can be replaced with new units for free if they are still within the warranty period and also meet the requirements and prior inspection. You can also directly contact the Genius team who are in the store, there is a test tool called Visual Mechanical Inspection there that must be passed by the curved device that you want to replace with a new device. If it is not qualified after the test then a replacement will be charged. Then Apple will replace it for free if this happens not by accident.
berita_id: Baru -baru ini, ada beberapa laporan masalah seputar perangkat iPhone 6 yang dengan mudah ditekuk.Ini segera menjadi topik diskusi yang sangat hangat, bahkan beberapa pihak mengejek perangkat smartphone terbaru ini dari Apple dengan berbagai rangkaian kalimat dan juga gambar meme.Apple tidak hanya diam, itu segera menanggapi berita dengan sangat cepat.Perwakilan Apple mengungkapkan bahwa mereka hanya menerima sembilan keluhan tentang masalah tersebut.Setiap produk yang diluncurkan oleh Apple dibuat dengan bahan berkualitas tinggi dan juga telah melalui berbagai tes ketat dan tahap konstruksi yang sangat hati -hati untuk terus memberikan kekuatan dan daya tahan pada perangkat itu sendiri.Apple juga menyediakan tes ketat seperti menekuk, tekanan, duduk, memutar, dan studi pengguna.Semua hal ini telah dilewati oleh iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus, yang keduanya telah berhasil melewati semua standar ketahanan berkualitas tinggi dan keausan yang ditetapkan oleh Apple.Kasing melengkung iPhone 6 juga sebenarnya jarang dan hanya sebagian kecil dari sekitar 10 juta unit iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang didistribusikan.Apple juga menyarankan pengguna untuk segera menghubungi layanan pelanggan jika masalah seperti ini terjadi.Sementara itu, laporan terpisah mengungkapkan bahwa perangkat iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang melengkung atau bengkok ini dapat diganti dengan unit baru secara gratis jika mereka masih dalam periode garansi dan juga memenuhi persyaratan dan inspeksi sebelumnya.Anda juga dapat secara langsung menghubungi tim jenius yang ada di toko, ada alat uji yang disebut inspeksi mekanis visual di sana yang harus dilewatkan oleh perangkat melengkung yang ingin Anda ganti dengan perangkat baru.Jika tidak memenuhi syarat setelah tes maka penggantian akan dibebankan.Maka Apple akan menggantinya secara gratis jika ini terjadi bukan secara tidak sengaja.

berita: This news may be very useful for Indonesian consumers who intend to buy the iPhone 6 Plus when it is released in the Indonesian market later. After a few days of being released in a number of countries, Apple's brand-new 5.5-inch jumbo smartphone began to reap protests from users. According to reports by some iPhone 6 Plus users, the iPhone with the largest sail turns out to be easy to bend if it's kept in a trouser pocket for too long. This incident was first reported by an iPhone 6 owner named Hanzon on the MacRumors forum site. He admitted that he kept the iPhone 6 Plus in his trouser pocket for approximately 4 hours, and carried out daily activities as usual. When taken out, Hanzon was surprised when he saw that the center of his iPhone 6 Plus was slightly 'bent', aka curved. Not only Hanzon, the MacRumors page launched, another user named Devin Pitcher also expressed a similar complaint on the forum. Devin admitted that he kept his new iPhone 6 Plus in his front trouser pocket. When removed, the center of the iPhone 6 Plus is curved like a tank that can withstand pressure. The use of a large 5.5-inch screen is indeed feared to interfere with user comfort. Apple has also anticipated by moving the Power button which is usually placed at the top to the right side to make it rectify easier to use with one hand. But the problem of large dimensions limiting user comfort when storing it in a trouser pocket does not seem to have occurred to Apple. In addition, Apple is also considered to have made a mistake by choosing a metal-aluminum mixture that is not too solid as the base material for the iPhone 6 Plus frame. Maybe the Iphone Frame has not passed the UTM (Universal Testing Machine) Test. The UTM test functions to test the iPhone 6 plus frame by pressing and pulling it to the maximum limit. If the force needed to bend the iPhone is small, it means it is easy to bend What is UTM? Universal Testing Machine is a testing machine to test tensile stress and compressive strength of materials or materials. Universal Testing Machine, usually also known as Universal Tester, Materials Testing Machine or Materials Test Frame. This testing machine has proven that it can perform many standard tensile and compression tests on materials, components and structures
berita_id: Berita ini mungkin sangat berguna bagi konsumen Indonesia yang berniat membeli iPhone 6 Plus ketika dirilis di pasar Indonesia nanti.Setelah beberapa hari dirilis di sejumlah negara, smartphone Jumbo 5,5 inci baru dari Apple mulai menuai protes dari pengguna.Menurut laporan oleh beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 Plus, iPhone dengan layar terbesar ternyata mudah ditekuk jika terlalu lama disimpan di saku celana panjang.Insiden ini pertama kali dilaporkan oleh pemilik iPhone 6 bernama Hanzon di situs Forum MacRumors.Dia mengakui bahwa dia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus di saku celana panjangnya selama sekitar 4 jam, dan melakukan kegiatan sehari -hari seperti biasa.Ketika dikeluarkan, Hanzon terkejut ketika dia melihat bahwa pusat iPhone 6 -nya sedikit 'bengkok', alias melengkung.Tidak hanya Hanzon, halaman MacRumors diluncurkan, pengguna lain bernama Devin Pitcher juga menyatakan keluhan serupa di forum tersebut.Devin mengakui bahwa ia menyimpan iPhone 6 Plus barunya di saku celana depannya.Saat dilepas, pusat iPhone 6 Plus melengkung seperti tangki yang dapat menahan tekanan.Penggunaan layar 5,5 inci besar memang ditakuti untuk mengganggu kenyamanan pengguna.Apple juga telah diantisipasi dengan memindahkan tombol daya yang biasanya ditempatkan di bagian atas ke sisi kanan untuk membuatnya lebih mudah digunakan dengan satu tangan.Tetapi masalah dimensi besar yang membatasi kenyamanan pengguna saat menyimpannya di saku celana tampaknya tidak terpikir oleh Apple.Selain itu, Apple juga dianggap telah membuat kesalahan dengan memilih campuran logam-aluminium yang tidak terlalu padat sebagai bahan dasar untuk bingkai iPhone 6 Plus.Mungkin bingkai iPhone belum lulus uji UTM (mesin pengujian universal).Uji UTM berfungsi untuk menguji bingkai iPhone 6 Plus dengan menekan dan menariknya ke batas maksimum.Jika kekuatan yang dibutuhkan untuk menekuk iPhone kecil, itu berarti mudah untuk menekuk apa itu UTM?Mesin pengujian universal adalah mesin pengujian untuk menguji tegangan tarik dan kekuatan tekan bahan atau bahan.Mesin pengujian universal, biasanya juga dikenal sebagai penguji universal, mesin pengujian bahan atau bingkai uji bahan.Mesin pengujian ini telah membuktikan bahwa ia dapat melakukan banyak tes tarik dan kompresi standar pada bahan, komponen dan struktur

berita: Finance Minister Sri Mulyani denied that the president's salary was proposed to increase to IDR 553 million per month as appeared in the draft government regulation (RPP) on the Salaries and Benefits of Civil Servants (PNS). "It doesn't exist and has never been discussed, and in my opinion, what the Menpan said was a hoax," Sri Mulyani said at the Bogor Palace, Monday (12/3). Currently, the president's basic salary is around Rp. 30 million per month. The salary jumped dramatically with an index-based calculation of 1:12,698 between the salaries of the lowest rank civil servants and the highest. The president's income index is simulated to reach Rp. 96,000, so he will earn Rp. 553.4 million per month. Based on calculations circulating on social media, the salaries of state officials also increased, such as vice presidents, to IDR 368.9 million per month from the previous basic salary of IDR 20 million because the income index was IDR 64,000. However, Sri Mulyani reiterated that the government has not yet discussed the plan to  increase the president's salary. "Nowadays a lot of information is produced, and documents that are made similar to the government are then published," said the former Director of the World Bank. "We have no discussion about it at all," said the former Director of the World Bank.
berita_id: Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani membantah bahwa gaji presiden diusulkan untuk meningkat menjadi IDR 553 juta per bulan seperti yang muncul dalam rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) pada gaji dan manfaat pegawai negeri (PNS)."Itu tidak ada dan tidak pernah dibahas, dan menurut pendapat saya, apa yang dikatakan Menpan itu tipuan," kata Sri Mulyani di Istana Bogor, Senin (12/3).Saat ini, gaji dasar presiden adalah sekitar RP.30 juta per bulan.Gaji melonjak secara dramatis dengan perhitungan berbasis indeks 1: 12.698 antara gaji pegawai negeri sipil peringkat terendah dan tertinggi.Indeks pendapatan presiden disimulasikan untuk mencapai RP.96.000, jadi dia akan mendapatkan RP.553,4 juta per bulan.Berdasarkan perhitungan yang beredar di media sosial, gaji pejabat negara juga meningkat, seperti wakil presiden, menjadi IDR 368,9 juta per bulan dari gaji dasar sebelumnya sebesar IDR 20 juta karena indeks pendapatan adalah IDR 64.000.Namun, Sri Mulyani menegaskan kembali bahwa pemerintah belum membahas rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden."Saat ini banyak informasi diproduksi, dan dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan pemerintah kemudian diterbitkan," kata mantan direktur Bank Dunia."Kami tidak berdiskusi sama sekali," kata mantan direktur Bank Dunia.

berita: Head of the Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah, stated that the news about the locking of the mosque so that people could not pray Fajr was a hoax or a lie. According to him, the closure of the mosque is already a regulation or the protocol at Istiqlal. "The news is a thousand percent hoax, please check who wrote the news," said Hurairah, when contacted, Tuesday (21/2). Hurairah explained, outside the month of Ramadan, Istiqlal was closed after the Isha prayer, around 21.30 WIB, and was based on the law. Then it is reopened one hour before Fajr prayer. "On last night's incident, only five buses came from East Java. They entered after Isha, then they were given the opportunity to worship, clean up, talk nicely with the chairman, we gave understanding, and thank God they understood and left Istiqlal voluntarily," he said. In addition, he said, the group did not know that today's action would be as big as last December 2 and 411. Meanwhile, the group that was waiting in line at the mosque this morning because it was raining, was Walisongo's group, who came every grouping day.
berita_id: Kepala bagian Protokol Masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah, menyatakan bahwa berita tentang penguncian masjid sehingga orang tidak bisa berdoa Fajr adalah tipuan atau kebohongan.Menurutnya, penutupan masjid sudah menjadi peraturan atau protokol di ISTIQLAL."Berita itu adalah tipuan seribu persen, silakan periksa siapa yang menulis berita," kata Hurairah, ketika dihubungi, Selasa (21/2).Hurairah menjelaskan, di luar bulan Ramadhan, Istiqlal ditutup setelah doa Isha, sekitar 21.30 WIB, dan didasarkan pada hukum.Kemudian dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa Fajr."Pada insiden tadi malam, hanya lima bus yang datang dari Jawa Timur. Mereka masuk setelah Isha, maka mereka diberi kesempatan untuk beribadah, membersihkan, berbicara dengan baik dengan ketua, kami memberikan pengertian, dan berterima kasih kepada Tuhan mereka mengerti dan meninggalkan Istiqlal secara sukarela," katanya.Selain itu, katanya, kelompok itu tidak tahu bahwa tindakan hari ini akan sebesar 2 dan 411 Desember lalu. Sementara itu, kelompok yang mengantri di masjid pagi ini karena hujan, adalah kelompok Walisongo, yang datang setiap hari pengelompokan.

berita: After a hearing (RDP) meeting with Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives in Senayan, Central Jakarta, Tuesday (17/4/2018), it was rumored that Facebook Indonesia would be closed. It is planned that the closing will be held on April 24, 2018. A few days before the news of the closure occurred, Netizens, especially Facebook users, posted the status "Facebook will be closed", some also uploaded "before Facebook is closed, post a status or photo first." The news that Facebook will be closed is of course a pro and contra among netizens. Even so, the rumors that went viral and circulated widely on social media, especially Facebook, were certainly not true or hoaxes. The government can indeed give strict sanctions to block Facebook, because the data of one million Indonesian users was also leaked in the Cambridge Analytica (CA) scandal. However, there is no certainty that on April 24, Facebook will actually be blocked in Indonesia. Minister of Communication and Information (Menkominfo) Rudiantara on various occasions never mentioned blocking Facebook. In fact, Rudiantara said that the Ministry of Communications and Informatics did not hesitate to block Facebook, but must follow procedures so that the steps are not rash. Rudiantara's only firm statement about blocking Facebook as well is if there is evidence that Facebook is used as a means of inciting or fighting. Rudiantara ensured that if investigators found an element of criminal suspicion in the leak of Facebook user data in Indonesia, the chances of blocking Facebook would be even greater. Meanwhile, these two things have not been proven yet, are still under investigation and awaiting the results of the audit. "If there are indications that Facebook in Indonesia is being used for incitement, like what happened in Myanmar. I have no qualms about blocking it," said Rudiantara, a few days ago. The Minister of Communication and Information has asked Facebook to conduct an audit, and submitted the results of the audit since a week after the announcement that data on Facebook users in Indonesia had been leaked in the CA scandal. The request was included in the first Warning Letter (SP) sent by the Ministry of Communication and Informatics. However, after the specified deadline arrived, Facebook has not yet submitted the results of the audit. Kominfo also issued a second warning letter. "Currently, it is SP II. We are waiting, later after SP II it can be upgraded to a temporary service termination if needed," said Rudiantara again. If the audit results are known later, the government can assess the potential problems that could arise from this data leak and take steps to address them. Meanwhile, Head of Public Policy for Facebook Indonesia, Ruben Hattari, emphasized that the recent data leaks from users were not in the form of breaching the security system of Facebook users. In front of the leadership of the House of Representatives Commission I, Ruben explained that the data leak was caused by the abuse of authority given by Facebook to application providers or so-called third parties.
berita_id: Setelah pertemuan sidang (RDP) dengan Komisi I Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia di Senayan, Jakarta Tengah, Selasa (17/4/2018), dikabarkan bahwa Facebook Indonesia akan ditutup.Direncanakan bahwa penutupan akan diadakan pada 24 April 2018. Beberapa hari sebelum berita penutupan terjadi, netizen, terutama pengguna Facebook, memposting status "Facebook akan ditutup", beberapa juga diunggah "sebelum Facebook ditutup, memposting status atau foto terlebih dahulu."Berita bahwa Facebook akan ditutup tentu saja merupakan pro dan kontra di antara netizen.Meski begitu, rumor yang menjadi viral dan beredar secara luas di media sosial, terutama Facebook, tentu saja tidak benar atau tipuan.Pemerintah memang dapat memberikan sanksi ketat untuk memblokir Facebook, karena data satu juta pengguna Indonesia juga bocor dalam skandal Cambridge Analytica (CA).Namun, tidak ada kepastian bahwa pada 24 April, Facebook sebenarnya akan diblokir di Indonesia.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi (Menkominfo) Rudiantara pada berbagai kesempatan tidak pernah disebutkan memblokir Facebook.Faktanya, Rudiantara mengatakan bahwa Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika tidak ragu untuk memblokir Facebook, tetapi harus mengikuti prosedur sehingga langkah -langkahnya tidak terburu -buru.Satu -satunya pernyataan perusahaan Rudiantara tentang memblokir Facebook juga adalah jika ada bukti bahwa Facebook digunakan sebagai cara menghasut atau berkelahi.Rudiantara memastikan bahwa jika penyelidik menemukan unsur kecurigaan kriminal dalam kebocoran data pengguna Facebook di Indonesia, peluang memblokir Facebook akan lebih besar.Sementara itu, kedua hal ini belum terbukti, masih dalam penyelidikan dan menunggu hasil audit."Jika ada indikasi bahwa Facebook di Indonesia digunakan untuk hasutan, seperti apa yang terjadi di Myanmar. Saya tidak ragu -ragu memblokirnya," kata Rudiiantara, beberapa hari yang lalu.Menteri Komunikasi dan Informasi telah meminta Facebook untuk melakukan audit, dan mengirimkan hasil audit sejak seminggu setelah pengumuman bahwa data di pengguna Facebook di Indonesia telah bocor dalam skandal CA.Permintaan tersebut dimasukkan dalam surat peringatan pertama (SP) yang dikirim oleh Kementerian Komunikasi dan Informatika.Namun, setelah tenggat waktu yang ditentukan tiba, Facebook belum mengirimkan hasil audit.Kominfo juga mengeluarkan surat peringatan kedua."Saat ini, ini adalah SP II. Kami sedang menunggu, nanti setelah SP II dapat ditingkatkan ke penghentian layanan sementara jika diperlukan," kata Rudiantara lagi.Jika hasil audit diketahui kemudian, pemerintah dapat menilai potensi masalah yang dapat timbul dari kebocoran data ini dan mengambil langkah -langkah untuk mengatasinya.Sementara itu, Kepala Kebijakan Publik untuk Facebook Indonesia, Ruben Hattari, menekankan bahwa data baru -baru ini kebocoran dari pengguna tidak dalam bentuk melanggar sistem keamanan pengguna Facebook.Di depan kepemimpinan Komisi Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat I, Ruben menjelaskan bahwa kebocoran data disebabkan oleh penyalahgunaan wewenang yang diberikan oleh Facebook kepada penyedia aplikasi atau yang disebut pihak ketiga.

berita: The rise of the hashtag (hash sign) Uninstall Traveloka made the Management open their voices. Traveloka Public Relations Manager Busyra Oryza explained, Chief Technology Officer (CTO) Derianto Kusuma was not present at the 90th Anniversary of Kanisius College on Saturday night, November 11 2017, because he was on a business trip. "He was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned a few months earlier," said Traveloka Public Relations Manager Busyra Oryza, Tuesday, November 14 2017. The explanation was given by Busyra because the hashtag #UninstallTraveloka became a trending topic on Twitter on Tuesday. On social media, rumors spread that Derianto Kusuma, who is an alumnus of Kanisius High School, congratulated pianist Ananda Sukarlan. The pianist walked out of the room when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th Anniversary of Kanisius College. Ananda did protest against the committee by walking out for inviting Anies. He considers Anies's figure to be contrary to the value of pluralism, which is taught at Canisius College. Spokesman for the Jakarta Kanisius College Alumni Association, Affan Alamudi, clarified that Derianto did not attend the event because he was in America. In the event that took place in Kemayoran, Kanisius College gave awards to alumni who were considered outstanding and contributed to the nation's work. Recipients of the award include Ananda Sukarlan (composer and pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader), and Boenjamin clarify Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). In the award ceremony, Derianto was represented by his mother. "We are quite shocked. These are lies. How could he walk out. Not even in Indonesia," Affan told Tempo, Tuesday, regarding WO Ananda Sukarlan.
berita_id: Bangkitnya tagar (tanda hash) menghapus instalan Traveloka membuat manajemen membuka suara mereka.Manajer Hubungan Masyarakat Traveloka Busyra Oryza menjelaskan, Chief Technology Officer (CTO) DeRianto Kusuma tidak hadir pada peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College pada Sabtu malam, 11 November 2017, karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis."Dia tidak dapat hadir karena dia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," kata manajer hubungan masyarakat Traveloka Busyra Oryza, Selasa, 14 November 2017. Penjelasan itu diberikan oleh Busyra karena tagar #uninstalltraveloka menjadi topik yang sedang tren di Twitter pada hari Selasa.Di media sosial, rumor menyebar bahwa Derianto Kusuma, yang merupakan alumnus Sekolah Menengah Kanisius, memberi selamat kepada pianis Ananda Sukarlan.Pianis itu berjalan keluar dari ruangan ketika Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato di peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College.Ananda melakukan protes terhadap komite dengan berjalan keluar karena mengundang Anies.Dia menganggap sosok Anies bertentangan dengan nilai pluralisme, yang diajarkan di Canisius College.Juru Bicara Asosiasi Alumni Jakarta Kanisius College, Affan Alamudi, mengklarifikasi bahwa DeRianto tidak menghadiri acara tersebut karena ia berada di Amerika.Dalam acara yang terjadi di Kemayoran, Kanisius College memberikan penghargaan kepada alumni yang dianggap luar biasa dan berkontribusi pada pekerjaan negara.Penerima penghargaan termasuk Ananda Sukarlan (komposer dan pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (figur Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (Pemimpin Scout), dan Boenjamin mengklarifikasi Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma).Dalam upacara penghargaan, DeRianto diwakili oleh ibunya."Kami cukup terkejut. Ini adalah kebohongan. Bagaimana dia bisa keluar. Bahkan di Indonesia," kata Affan kepada Tempo, Selasa, mengenai Wo Ananda Sukarlan.

berita: Photos of participants of Action 212 Volume Two circulated on social media who could not enter the Istiqlal Mosque this morning because the mosque doors were closed. According to the mosque management, the rumors circulating are not true. "It's a thousand percent hoax," said the Head of the Protocol Section of the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam to Republika.co.id Tuesday (21/2) morning. He explained, the rules at the Istiqlal Mosque other than the month of Ramadan, the mosque closes at 21.30 WIB. Opened again one hour before Fajr time. In the month of Ramadan, the mosque is open 24 hours. He said, for last night's case, there were indeed five bus participants who came from East Java. They claimed to come from Madura. Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. "After approaching 10 (at night), we met with the head of his entourage, we announced to his entourage that the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be opened again one hour go about before Fajr," he said. Abu explained, the group from East Java understood and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened. Also read, Action 212, the Crowd Has Not Been Seen at Istiqlal-Al Azhar. "And what's in the photo, it looks like people are queuing up to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that in conclusion, the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie.
berita_id: Foto -foto peserta aksi 212 Volume Dua beredar di media sosial yang tidak bisa memasuki masjid Istiqlal pagi ini karena pintu masjid ditutup.Menurut manajemen masjid, rumor yang beredar tidak benar."Ini adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata kepala bagian protokol dari masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam ke Republika.co.id Selasa (21/2) pagi.Dia menjelaskan, aturan di Masjid Istiqlal selain bulan Ramadhan, masjid ditutup pada 21,30 WIB.Dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum waktu Fajr.Di bulan Ramadhan, masjid buka 24 jam.Dia mengatakan, untuk kasus tadi malam, memang ada lima peserta bus yang datang dari Jawa Timur.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan."Setelah mendekati 10 (pada malam hari), kami bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, kami mengumumkan kepada rombongannya bahwa aturan di Istiqlal, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka lagi satu jam berjalan sebelum Fajr," katanya.Abu menjelaskan, kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada 03.40 WIB masjid dibuka kembali.Baca juga, Action 212, kerumunan belum terlihat di Istiqlal-al Azhar."Dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang mengantri untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa sebagai kesimpulan, berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah kebohongan.

berita: The more rampant gamers play Pokemon Go, it turns out to cause pros and cons, especially in Indonesia. Moreover, recently heard the news that the game has an implied meaning that cannot be tolerated, especially for followers of the Islamic religion. From several links spread on social media, it is rearing discussed that Pokemon actually means "I am Jewish" in Syriac, while Pikachu is referred to as "Be Jewish" and Charmander means "God is Weak". That's where this problem started, some people immediately believed and redistributed the link to invite others to avoid Pokemon Go. There are also those who do not believe and think it is something made up. So, are these rumors true or not? It turns out that Nintendo denied it and the LA Times noted it, you could say all this is just a rumor that is not proven at all. Pokemon in English is an abbreviation of two words, namely Pocket Monster which means pocket monster. You could say, these monsters called Pokemon have a small size and can be stored in the trainer's pocket. While Pikachu which is known as the icon of Pokemon is also formed from two words, namely Pika (shining) and Chu (rat). From its shape alone it is clear that Pikachu is a mouse that glows or is armed with electric shocks. Finally, Charmander also has the meaning of burning fire, like the appearance of Charmander himself in the anime and Pokemon games.
berita_id: Gamer yang lebih merajalela memainkan Pokemon Go, ternyata menyebabkan pro dan kontra, terutama di Indonesia.Selain itu, baru -baru ini mendengar berita bahwa permainan memiliki makna tersirat yang tidak dapat ditoleransi, terutama bagi pengikut agama Islam.Dari beberapa tautan yang tersebar di media sosial, dibesarkan dibahas bahwa Pokemon sebenarnya berarti "Saya Yahudi" di Syria, sementara Pikachu disebut sebagai "menjadi Yahudi" dan Charmander berarti "Tuhan itu lemah".Di situlah masalah ini dimulai, beberapa orang segera percaya dan mendistribusikan kembali tautan untuk mengundang orang lain untuk menghindari Pokemon Go.Ada juga orang -orang yang tidak percaya dan berpikir itu adalah sesuatu yang dibuat -buat.Jadi, apakah rumor ini benar atau tidak?Ternyata Nintendo membantahnya dan LA Times mencatatnya, Anda bisa mengatakan semua ini hanyalah rumor yang tidak terbukti sama sekali.Pokemon dalam bahasa Inggris adalah singkatan dari dua kata, yaitu monster saku yang berarti monster saku.Bisa dibilang, monster -monster yang disebut Pokemon ini memiliki ukuran kecil dan dapat disimpan di saku pelatih.Sementara Pikachu yang dikenal sebagai ikon Pokemon juga dibentuk dari dua kata, yaitu pika (bersinar) dan Chu (tikus).Dari bentuknya saja jelas bahwa Pikachu adalah tikus yang bersinar atau dipersenjatai dengan sengatan listrik.Akhirnya, Charmander juga memiliki arti membakar api, seperti penampilan Charmander sendiri di game anime dan pokemon.

berita: In 2012 we were shocked by the emergence of brushes or brushes made from pig bristles to the point that the MUI issued a fatwa against using a pig bristle brush, but recently, information about toothbrushes made from pig bristles has resurfaced. Information for you Muslims to be more careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. Come on, check the toothbrush, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains pig bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! So double check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), it usually says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". “What are your toothbrush bristles made of? Plastic or Pig Hair? How to check: Look at the package, if it's made of bristles, then it's made of sea urchin. Please burn the bristles, if it smells like burning hair, it means it's from sea urchins. But if it melts and becomes hard, it means it is made of plastic and is safe to use. The risk of using what is haram: Worship is rejected, prayer is rejected, and hell is more worthy (hadith). Save ourselves and our loved ones. " In everyday life, we use various kinds of brushes to apply makeup, paint, clean dust, paint the house, grease cake pans, and spread food. Such as grilled chicken, bread, cakes, and various grilled or grilled meats and seafood. While the brush is useful when combing hair, cleaning hair at the salon or barbershop, washing clothes, and scrubbing floors. Do you know what the brushes & brushes you are using come from? Most likely From Sea urchins! Brushes supplied in Indonesia, generally come from China. These imported brushes are produced using sea urchins, especially wild boars which have more hair. Sea urchins are considered more economical than the fur of other animals, such as goats, squirrels, civets, horses, raccoons, camels, and dogs. For Muslims, the use of sea urchins is clearly Haram. No matter how small, the material from pork is forbidden for consumption and for application. (the term is PIG/BOAR/HOG/BRISTLE HAIR BRUSH) which are sold in various places, such as Markets, Painting Supplies Stores, Building Materials Stores, Make Up & Salon Tools Stores, Online Stores, etc. Are you familiar with the various shapes below? There are painting brushes, wall paint brushes, make up brushes, hair brushes, barber/barber brushes, clothes brushes, etc. Beware! Tips to Avoid Using Pig Bristle Brushes and Brushes: 1. Use 100% Synthetic Brushes & Brushes, Such As Nylon. Wall paint brushes and food brushes are available, with slightly more expensive prices. Nylon material has a texture like plastic for a toothbrush. 2. Use Alternatives Other Than Brushes. For example, Roller Paint for Painting, Sponges & Cotton Buds For Makeup, And Knives & Spatula For Smearing Food. 3. Beware of Foods That Process Cooking And Cleaning The Tools exist Using A Pig Brush. 4. Characteristics of Pork Bristle Brush, When Burned Will Cause A Distinctive Odor Like Roasted Meat. 5. Usually Pig Bristle Brushes Are Sold In White & Black. However, Manufacturers Can Process Pig Hair By Bleaching And Coloring It, So It Looks Like Other Animal Hair. (and) Share this info with your family and friends so that more people can read it so you can avoid products that are not halal…hopefully it will be useful…
berita_id: Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang terbuat dari bulu babi hingga MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini, informasi tentang sikat gigi yang terbuat dari bulu babi telah muncul kembali.Informasi untuk Anda Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Ayo, periksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Jadi periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya mengatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% China Bristle".Terbuat dari bulu sikat gigi?Layak (Hadis).Selamatkan diri kita dan orang yang kita cintai. "Seperti ayam panggang, roti, kue, dan berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Sementara sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, mencuci pakaian, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda dari apa kuas & kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar dari landak laut!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia, umumnya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor ini diproduksi menggunakan bulu babi laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, materi dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat, seperti pasar, toko persediaan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko alat make up & salon, toko online, dll. Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk di bawah ini?Ada kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, kuas make up, sikat rambut, kuas tukang cukur/tukang cukur, sikat pakaian, dll. Waspadalah!Tips yang harus dihindari menggunakan sikat bulu babi dan kuas: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Sikat cat dinding dan kuas makanan tersedia, dengan harga yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif selain kuas.Misalnya, cat roller untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, dan pisau & spatula untuk mengolesi makanan.3. Karakteristik sikat bulu babi, ketika dibakar akan menyebabkan bau khas seperti daging panggang.5. Biasanya sikat bulu babi dijual putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses rambut babi dengan memutihkan dan mewarnai, jadi itu terlihat seperti rambut hewan lainnya.(dan) Bagikan info ini dengan keluarga dan teman Anda sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga Anda dapat menghindari produk yang tidak halal ... semoga akan berguna ...

berita: circulating on social media about needling as first aid for stroke patients as shown in the image below. Is this true or just a hoax or a myth? Causes of Stroke Stroke is a neurological emergency characterized by symptoms such as weakness on one side of the body, a tilted face to one side, and difficulty speaking. These symptoms generally appear suddenly. This disorder in general can be caused by a blockage in a blood vessel in the brain (ischemic stroke) or a rupture of a blood vessel in the brain (hemorrhagic stroke). Help for Stroke If you feel or find a relative with symptoms of a stroke, you must immediately be taken to the hospital. As much as possible, the destination hospital at least has CT Scan facilities. With the CT Scan, medical personnel can determine the type of stroke experienced by the patient. This is very important because the treatment for ischemic stroke and hemorrhagic stroke is different. In ischemic stroke, the goal of help is to destroy the blood clot that is blocking the blood vessels of the brain. The method that is commonly done is with drugs, it can also be with endovascular procedures. Meanwhile, in hemorrhagic stroke, the main goal of treatment is to stop the bleeding. There is no official reference that recommends this method for first aid in stroke patients. In ischemic stroke patients, this method is clearly not useful look alike for destroying the blockage in the brain because there is no relationship at all. In the case of hemorrhagic stroke, it is true that patients generally have high blood pressure so that the brain blood vessels burst. However, bleeding through the fingertips cannot lower blood pressure and stop bleeding in the brain. This is because the blood that is removed by inserting the needle in the fingertip is very little so that it does not have a significant effect on blood pressure. In addition, the human brain gets 20% of its blood supply from the heart pump and the body will always try to maintain this amount. So, even though we have removed the patient's blood, the heart will still pump blood to the brain. Dangers of Needling in Stroke Aid In addition to not providing good benefits to patients, it turns out that needling also has a negative impact on patients. The bad impact is that the patient is late in getting the right help because time is wasted on sterilizing the needle and performing the puncture. The stabbing process causes wounds and can cause infection. Conclusion It can be concluded that pricking the finger with a needle in stroke patients is not useful and can actually harm the patient. If you find a patient with symptoms of a stroke, the help we can provide is to take the patient as quickly as possible to the hospital.
berita_id: beredar di media sosial tentang tusuk jarum sebagai pertolongan pertama untuk pasien stroke seperti yang ditunjukkan pada gambar di bawah ini.Apakah ini benar atau hanya tipuan atau mitos?Penyebab stroke stroke adalah keadaan darurat neurologis yang ditandai oleh gejala seperti kelemahan di satu sisi tubuh, wajah miring ke satu sisi, dan kesulitan berbicara.Gejala -gejala ini umumnya muncul tiba -tiba.Gangguan ini secara umum dapat disebabkan oleh penyumbatan pada pembuluh darah di otak (stroke iskemik) atau pecahnya pembuluh darah di otak (stroke hemoragik).Bantuan untuk stroke jika Anda merasakan atau menemukan kerabat dengan gejala stroke, Anda harus segera dibawa ke rumah sakit.Sebisa mungkin, rumah sakit tujuan setidaknya memiliki fasilitas CT scan.Dengan CT scan, tenaga medis dapat menentukan jenis stroke yang dialami oleh pasien.Ini sangat penting karena pengobatan untuk stroke iskemik dan stroke hemoragik berbeda.Dalam stroke iskemik, tujuan bantuan adalah untuk menghancurkan gumpalan darah yang menghalangi pembuluh darah otak.Metode yang biasanya dilakukan adalah dengan obat -obatan, itu juga bisa dengan prosedur endovaskular.Sementara itu, dalam stroke hemoragik, tujuan utama pengobatan adalah untuk menghentikan pendarahan.Tidak ada referensi resmi yang merekomendasikan metode ini untuk pertolongan pertama pada pasien stroke.Pada pasien stroke iskemik, metode ini jelas tidak berguna sama untuk menghancurkan penyumbatan di otak karena tidak ada hubungan sama sekali.Dalam kasus stroke hemoragik, memang benar bahwa pasien umumnya memiliki tekanan darah tinggi sehingga pembuluh darah otak meledak.Namun, pendarahan melalui ujung jari tidak dapat menurunkan tekanan darah dan menghentikan pendarahan di otak.Ini karena darah yang dihilangkan dengan memasukkan jarum di ujung jari sangat sedikit sehingga tidak memiliki efek signifikan pada tekanan darah.Selain itu, otak manusia mendapat 20% dari suplai darahnya dari pompa jantung dan tubuh akan selalu berusaha mempertahankan jumlah ini.Jadi, meskipun kami telah menghilangkan darah pasien, jantung masih akan memompa darah ke otak.Bahaya tusuk jarum dalam bantuan stroke selain tidak memberikan manfaat yang baik bagi pasien, ternyata tusuk jarum juga memiliki dampak negatif pada pasien.Dampaknya yang buruk adalah bahwa pasien terlambat mendapatkan bantuan yang tepat karena waktu terbuang untuk sterilisasi jarum dan melakukan tusukan.Proses penikaman menyebabkan luka dan dapat menyebabkan infeksi.Kesimpulan Dapat disimpulkan bahwa menusuk jari dengan jarum pada pasien stroke tidak berguna dan benar -benar dapat membahayakan pasien.Jika Anda menemukan pasien dengan gejala stroke, bantuan yang dapat kami berikan adalah membawa pasien secepat mungkin ke rumah sakit.

berita: Needle sticks cure stroke, information about this has circulated on the internet. Of course this made a scene online, where if it was true, then not a few people would use this method. But is the method true or is it just a trick? Just news seeking thrills? Let's find the answer now. Mentioned through a video that is widely circulated on the internet with the following steps to cure a stroke: Needles are sterilized using alcohol liquid The tips of the fingers are pierced with a needle to drip blood Is it that easy to overcome a stroke? It is stated in the video that a stroke is an attack that occurs due to disturbances inch and blockages in the blood path. It also mentions why pricking the finger using a sterilized needle, according to the video, the reason is to make the blood vessels in the body not clogged. For a layman it might be a reasonable argument, but it turns out that from a medical point of view, it is just fake news. Nervous health is important. Do not let you neglect the health of your nerves. Tips for you, take Neurotropic vitamins (B12, B6, B1) and exercise regularly. Mentioned if viewed from a medical point of view, then the theory is just a hoax or made up. Indeed, the information on the internet, especially regarding health, should be filtered before use. Moreover, the information is related to health. Blockage of Blood Vessels Causes Stroke The blockage that occurs for a long period of time, where cholesterol and fat deposits have accumulated and accumulated. Therefore, blockages will occur in the blood vessels and capillaries, which is the source of the problem. And the blockage can not be treated just by sticking a needle in the finger. This is not a trivial problem but has accumulated over the years. The dangers of the finger pricking method using a needle for stroke. In fact, if you carry out the method mentioned in the video and spread it can increase the risk to your health. Risk if you get infection. And if someone really has a stroke, the wrong treatment will slow the sufferer to get the right treatment. Even though it is known that stroke should not be treated too late, because the effects can be permanent. Moreover, the scattered procedures are clearly not in accordance with the procedures given by the doctor. How to deal with stroke sufferers The right way is to run the FAST method. F. Face. Face. Look at the patient's face, if it becomes tilted in his expression or turns away, it is a sign that the person has had a stroke. Because a stroke attacks the nerves. A. Arm. Arm. Try to raise the patient's hand, both hands. Then ask the patient to hold his hand in front of him. If the person is unable to hold both, let alone one of them, it is a symptom of a stroke on both sides, while for one hand it means a half stroke. S. Speech. Saying. The third is speech. A stroke patient will become slurred when speaking, because the patient's mouth turns into a slurred. This is a fairly obvious symptom. T. Time. Time. Last is time or time. If you have had a stroke, the sooner you get treatment at the hospital, the better, don't let it be too late. The single best method is to get the stroke patient to the hospital as soon as possible. Don't use any other method, because it doesn't exist. Call an ambulance or use a private car. So many articles about curing strokes with acupuncture are not true, hopefully it will be useful.

berita: JAKARTA, WB - Due to the burning of Reog art equipment in the Philippines, the Reog Jabodetabek community sent a letter to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The letter asked for clarification on the burning of the reog art instrument, which was accused of being carried out by unscrupulous KJRI officials. "We want to get an official and written explanation, because in the previous clarification the Indonesian Consulate General confirmed the news," said Secretary General of the Association of Reog Jabodetabek, Monday (2/11/2015). Agus revealed that the three points of the request for clarification that they submitted to the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines, were to ask for an official and written explanation regarding the case of the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines burning oppugn reog art instruments. The second point, his party also questioned about the dissemination of news of the burning of the reog art instrument in a number of 'online' media (online/network) which stated that the reason for the burning was because it was considered an idol. The last point is a request to the Indonesian Embassy or the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao City, Philippines to publish or broadcast clarifications on the issue of burning reog art objects in a number of national media. "We demand the Indonesian Consulate General or through the Indonesian Embassy in the Philippines to ask for clarification from the media that brought up the news to avoid confusion in the news that developed in the country," he explained.
berita_id: JAKARTA, WB - Karena pembakaran peralatan seni yang dirancang ulang di Filipina, komunitas Reog Jabodetabek mengirim surat kepada Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Surat itu meminta klarifikasi tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog, yang dituduh dilakukan oleh pejabat KJRI yang tidak bermoral."Kami ingin mendapatkan penjelasan resmi dan tertulis, karena dalam klarifikasi sebelumnya Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia mengkonfirmasi berita tersebut," kata Sekretaris Jenderal Asosiasi Reog Jabodetabek, Senin (2/11/2015).Agus mengungkapkan bahwa tiga poin dari permintaan untuk klarifikasi bahwa mereka menyerahkan kepada Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina, akan meminta penjelasan resmi dan tertulis mengenai kasus konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina yang membakar instrumen Seni REOG OPPUGN.Poin kedua, partainya juga mempertanyakan tentang penyebaran berita tentang pembakaran instrumen seni reog di sejumlah media 'online' (online/jaringan) yang menyatakan bahwa alasan pembakaran adalah karena dianggap sebagai idola.Poin terakhir adalah permintaan ke Kedutaan Besar Indonesia atau Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Kota Davao, Filipina untuk menerbitkan atau menyiarkan klarifikasi tentang masalah pembakaran objek seni reog di sejumlah media nasional."Kami menuntut konsulat umum Indonesia atau melalui kedutaan Indonesia di Filipina untuk meminta klarifikasi dari media yang mengemukakan berita untuk menghindari kebingungan dalam berita yang berkembang di negara itu," jelasnya.

berita: Finance Minister Sri Mulyani said that until now there has been no and there has been no discussion about the increase in the President's salary. "It doesn't exist, and it has never been discussed," said Mulyani when answering reporters' questions at a press conference at the Bogor presidential palace, Monday (12/3/2018), as reported by Antara. Previously, news circulated that the president's basic salary, which is only around Rp. 30 million per month, is currently considered very small and is planning to increase it to Rp. 553 million per month. Sri Mulyani emphasized that the news that the Minister for State Apparatus Empowerment and Bureaucratic Reform was a hoax or hoax. "It's a hoax, because there are a lot of social media that produce information, for documents that are made similar to those of the government that are published. So we don't have any discussion about it, absolutely nothing," said Mulyani. Regarding the salaries of civil servants (PNS), Sri Mulyani also conveyed that the 2018 draft government regulation (RPP) and the 2019 Revised State Revenue and Expenditure Budget (RAPBN) would be submitted in the same way as the government submitted to the DPR. "In the financial memorandum of salary increase, the provision of the 13th salary and pensioners will be included by the President in the financial note in August," said Mulyani. The simulation of the change in salary provisions for the president appeared in the RPP on the Salary and Allowances for Civil Servants (PNS) which was circulated recently. In provender the RPP, apart from the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience a salary increase.
berita_id: Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani mengatakan bahwa sampai sekarang tidak ada dan belum ada diskusi tentang peningkatan gaji presiden."Itu tidak ada, dan tidak pernah dibahas," kata Mulyani ketika menjawab pertanyaan wartawan pada konferensi pers di Istana Presiden Bogor, Senin (12/3/2018), seperti dilansir Antara.Sebelumnya, berita beredar bahwa gaji dasar presiden, yang hanya sekitar RP.30 juta per bulan, saat ini dianggap sangat kecil dan berencana untuk meningkatkannya menjadi RP.553 juta per bulan.Sri Mulyani menekankan bahwa berita bahwa Menteri Pemberdayaan Aparat Negara dan reformasi birokrasi adalah tipuan atau tipuan."Ini tipuan, karena ada banyak media sosial yang menghasilkan informasi, untuk dokumen yang dibuat mirip dengan pemerintah yang diterbitkan. Jadi kami tidak berdiskusi tentang hal itu, sama sekali tidak ada," kata Mulyani.Mengenai gaji pegawai negeri (PNS), Sri Mulyani juga menyampaikan bahwa rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) 2018 dan Revisi Pendapatan Negara 2019 dan Anggaran Pengeluaran (RAPBN) akan diajukan dengan cara yang sama seperti pemerintah yang diajukan ke DPR."Dalam nota keuangan kenaikan gaji, penyediaan gaji ke -13 dan pensiunan akan dimasukkan oleh presiden dalam catatan keuangan pada bulan Agustus," kata Mulyani.Simulasi perubahan ketentuan gaji untuk presiden muncul di RPP tentang gaji dan tunjangan untuk pegawai negeri (PNS) yang diedarkan baru -baru ini.Di Provender, RPP, terlepas dari Presiden, wakil presiden dan pejabat negara tinggi lainnya juga akan mengalami kenaikan gaji.

berita: Some time ago, social media was enlivened by a status shared by a netizen about a toothbrush that was allegedly made of sea urchins. What caught the attention of the netizens was the words "bristle" on the toothbrush packaging which in cash made netizens ask whether it is true that the toothbrush cannot be said to be a halal product??? This stems from an article about a previously circulated sea urchin brush, which can be seen on the LPPOM MUI website: The article states that “the handles of boar-bristle brushes often have the words: Bristle, PureBristle, 100% China Bristle, and so on. One of the meanings of the word Bristle is Pig Hair or sea urchins (Webster's Dictionary) which are unclean when wet." The use of the word ONE in the article turned out to be misunderstood by some netizens who generalized the notion of "bristle" with sea urchins. In fact, if we explore further, the notion of "bristle" is much more general than just sea portion out urchins. Bristle is a stiff/strong fiber or fur, either natural derived from plant fibers and animal hair or artificial (synthetic). From this definition, the word "bristle" on the toothbrush packaging does not necessarily make the toothbrush come from sea urchins. This means that the toothbrush could have come from other animal hair, plant fibers or even synthetic bristles. If we look back at the history and development of toothbrushes, the bristles found on toothbrushes originally came from wild boar bristles (Siberian). However, along with the development of technology, in 1938 toothbrushes were produced with nylon bristles which still dominate today. However, it is undeniable that there are still around 10% worldwide of toothbrush products whose bristles come from pig bristles. After we understand the true definition of bristle, then how do we know whether the toothbrush comes from non-halal fibers/bristles? A simple way is to look for information on the official website of the toothbrush manufacturer, or even ask directly to the customer service center. The rapid flow of information on social media makes us have to be more careful in disseminating information. If we have not been able to find valid information, it would be better if the information is asked in a forum that is related to the information. Information about the halalness of a product, of course, not only food/beverage/cosmetic but also lifestyle and thought, becomes a very important part in the life of a Muslim because it has an impact on matters of worship and the hereafter. Indeed, halal and haram matters are not only the responsibility of the MUI or the government but our business as Muslims. Therefore, Halal Corner invites Muslims to join the community of halal fighters. Halal Corner is a community that was established as a forum for active communication / sharing about various halal products, especially in the local area as well as providing halal counseling and education for Muslims in the form of training, halal campaigns, and educational activities that build public awareness of the importance of halal products. .

berita: Cybersecurity expert Doctor Pratama Persadha said that he was not sure the government had blocked Facebook, because the users of this social media in Indonesia reached 130 million users. "If Facebook is still fussing, I think it needs to be blocked. However, it needs to have a replacement solution," said Pratama who is also the Head of the Communication and Information System Security Research Center (CISSReC) in Semarang, Thursday (12/4). /2018). According to Pratama, there are risks if the government blocks Facebook. In fact, the risk could spread to politics and cause instability in the country. The Facebook blocking discourse is related to the alleged data theft by Cambridge Analytica of 87 million FB user data in the world. Of these, 1,096,666 of them are Indonesian netizens. Pratama argues that Indonesia's position is weak because infrastructure does not have an alternative to local social media. Unlike China, which vertebral column blocks Facebook, Google, and WhatsApp, they have prepared alternative applications, such as QQ, Weibo, and WeChat. This is because, he continued, social media has grown to be more than just a place to meet old friends. However, it has further become a place to earn a living for many people. In fact, relatively many micro, small and medium enterprises (MSMEs) use Facebook for their promotional tools. "This should be a lesson so that in the future the government can see this as a priority to build social media platforms and other internet services," said Pratama. According to him, the cases of data leakage of Facebook users also occurred on other platforms with different amounts, could be smaller or more. "Privacy issues in our country also need to get a legal umbrella through the Personal Data Protection Law. This must also be resolved by the government," said Pratama, who was once the Acting Director (Plt.) of the Signal Security Director of the State Crypto Agency (Lemsaneg). Touching back on the Facebook case, he argued that the government's threat to block Facebook on the one hand wanted to show the government's side with the people. However, that's not enough.
berita_id: Pakar cybersecurity, dokter Pratama Persadha mengatakan bahwa dia tidak yakin pemerintah telah memblokir Facebook, karena pengguna media sosial ini di Indonesia mencapai 130 juta pengguna."Jika Facebook masih rewel, saya pikir itu perlu diblokir. Namun, itu perlu memiliki solusi pengganti," kata Pratama yang juga kepala Pusat Penelitian Keamanan Sistem Komunikasi dan Informasi (CISSREC) di Semarang, Kamis (12/4)./2018).Menurut Pratama, ada risiko jika pemerintah memblokir Facebook.Faktanya, risikonya dapat menyebar ke politik dan menyebabkan ketidakstabilan di negara ini.Wacana pemblokiran Facebook terkait dengan dugaan pencurian data oleh Cambridge Analytica dari 87 juta data pengguna FB di dunia.Dari jumlah tersebut, 1.096.666 di antaranya adalah netizen Indonesia.Pratama berpendapat bahwa posisi Indonesia lemah karena infrastruktur tidak memiliki alternatif untuk media sosial lokal.Tidak seperti Cina, kolom vertebral yang memblokir Facebook, Google, dan WhatsApp, mereka telah menyiapkan aplikasi alternatif, seperti QQ, Weibo, dan WeChat.Ini karena, ia melanjutkan, media sosial telah berkembang menjadi lebih dari sekadar tempat untuk bertemu teman lama.Namun, lebih lanjut telah menjadi tempat untuk mencari nafkah bagi banyak orang.Bahkan, relatif banyak usaha mikro, kecil dan menengah (MSMS) menggunakan Facebook untuk alat promosi mereka."Ini harus menjadi pelajaran sehingga di masa depan pemerintah dapat melihat ini sebagai prioritas untuk membangun platform media sosial dan layanan internet lainnya," kata Pratama.Menurutnya, kasus -kasus kebocoran data pengguna Facebook juga terjadi pada platform lain dengan jumlah yang berbeda, bisa lebih kecil atau lebih."Masalah privasi di negara kita juga perlu mendapatkan payung hukum melalui undang -undang perlindungan data pribadi. Ini juga harus diselesaikan oleh pemerintah," kata Pratama, yang pernah menjadi direktur penjabat (PLT) dari Direktur Keamanan Sinyal Badan Crypto Negara (Lemsaneg).Menyentuh kembali pada kasus Facebook, ia berpendapat bahwa ancaman pemerintah untuk memblokir Facebook di satu sisi ingin menunjukkan sisi pemerintah kepada rakyat.Namun, itu tidak cukup.

berita: BEKASI, The rise of pacifier candy which is suspected to contain narcotics in a number of areas, is also circulating in Bekasi Regency. Especially in a number of schools in the Babelan region. In this area, sweets packaged like baby pacifiers were found and sold by a trader at a price of Rp. roll in the hay 1000 per piece. This is acknowledged by a pacifier candy trader named Zainal Arifin (38). According to him, at first he did not know at all if the candy he sold contained drugs. "Yes, at first I didn't know, I just sold it because the candy students liked it a lot," said Zainal Arifin, Wednesday (8/3/2017). Furthermore, said Zainal, later after hearing the news that the candy he sold contained drugs. He also admitted, immediately stopped selling the candy. "Yes, now when I know I'm not selling it, bro. Even though there are still many children who are looking for the candy,” said Zainal. As for the reason Zainal no longer sells the candy pacifiers, Zainal admits, he is afraid that there will be mistakes in selling the pacifiers. In the end, he really didn't sell anymore. So far, said Zainal, each candy sold is Rp. 1000 per candy. During the sale of the candy, in a day sold under 10 candies.
berita_id: Bekasi, kebangkitan permen dot yang diduga mengandung narkotika di sejumlah daerah, juga beredar di Kabupaten Bekasi.Terutama di sejumlah sekolah di wilayah Babelan.Di daerah ini, permen yang dikemas seperti dot bayi ditemukan dan dijual oleh pedagang dengan harga RP.Gulung jerami 1000 per potong.Ini diakui oleh pedagang permen dot bernama Zainal Arifin (38).Menurutnya, pada awalnya dia tidak tahu sama sekali jika permen yang dijualnya berisi obat -obatan."Ya, pada awalnya saya tidak tahu, saya baru saja menjualnya karena para siswa permen sangat menyukainya," kata Zainal Arifin, Rabu (8/3/2017).Selanjutnya, kata Zainal, kemudian setelah mendengar kabar bahwa permen yang dijualnya berisi obat -obatan.Dia juga mengakui, segera berhenti menjual permen."Ya, sekarang ketika saya tahu saya tidak menjualnya, bro. Meskipun masih ada banyak anak yang mencari permen," kata Zainal.Adapun alasan Zainal tidak lagi menjual dot permen, Zainal mengakui, dia takut akan ada kesalahan dalam menjual dot.Pada akhirnya, dia benar -benar tidak menjual lagi.Sejauh ini, kata Zainal, setiap permen yang dijual adalah RP.1000 per permen.Selama penjualan permen, dalam sehari dijual di bawah 10 permen.

One of the participants of Action 212 from Madura named Solihin, we had an interview " We all here as Muslims feel intimidated, prohibited from worshiping in the mosque subtly with the lock on the gate of the mosque, the mosque is the house of Allah so we are As a devout Muslim, you must carry out worship, try to think about the mosque in Indonesia In empty we have to pray in front of the gate, it doesn't make sense," said Solihin to us in a high pitched voice. The 212 Islamic Defense Action Volume 2 will be held at the dawn prayer, estimated at around 50,000 masses or even more. Polda Metro Jaya has given permission for the 212 Action boundary today starting at 07.00 until 18.00.Wib, thousands of Police and TNI personnel were deployed to secure this action.
