USUALLY PIG BRUSH BRUSHS SOLD IN WHITE & BLACK COLORS. However, producers may process sea urchins by bleaching them and then coloring them, so that they look like other animal hairs
berita_id: Sikat gigi adalah hal terpenting dalam kehidupan kita sehari -hari, tanpa kuas, kita semua mungkin mengalami mulut yang tidak menyenangkan atau tidak menyenangkan.Pertama, mari kita lihat informasi ini untuk Anda, terutama "Muslim" untuk lebih berhati-hati dan waspada dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan-bahan dari yang non-halal.Saat Anda membeli sikat gigi, periksa kemasannya, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Ingat ya ... !!!Bulu berarti rambut babi dengan kata lain bulu babi!Sekali lagi, periksa ulang paket sikat gigi Anda saat Anda membelinya, jangan lupa dan menunda -nunda, lihat sebelumnya dan ketika Anda membeli sikat gigi yang akan Anda gunakan.Demikian pula pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya mencatat "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Teman dekat, silakan bagikan bahwa menyikat gigi dilakukan setiap hari, ada banyak jenis sikat gigi yang tersedia di supermarket atau pasar tradisional, dan ada juga banyak bahan yang digunakan dalam membuat sikat gigi ini.Sebagai Muslim, kita harus waspada dan berhati -hati dalam mengetahui beberapa bahan atau membuat sikat gigi yang telah digunakan untuk menyikat gigi.Th.Pada 2012 kami terkejut dengan munculnya kuas atau kuas yang memiliki bulu babi sampai MUI mengeluarkan fatwa untuk tidak menggunakan sikat bulu babi, tetapi baru -baru ini ada informasi tentang sikat gigi yang mengandung bulu babi.Informasi untuk Anda kelompok Muslim untuk lebih berhati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Mari kita semua memeriksa sikat gigi, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti bahwa sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi dengan kata lain bulu babi!Jadi periksa paket sikat gigi Anda lagi saat Anda membelinya.Demikian pula pada sikat (penyebar roti), umumnya mencatat "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Apa bulu sikat gigi Anda terbuat dari? Bulu plastik atau babi? Berikut adalah beberapa langkah untuk memeriksa: menonton bungkus, jika direkam dari bulu, jadi terbuat dari landak laut. Tolong bakar bulu, jika baunya seperti aroma rambut yang terbakar, itu berarti tidak ada yang digunakan oleh plastik.Diterima, doa tidak diterima, dan neraka lebih layak (hadis).Selamatkan diri kita dan orang yang kita cintai.Seperti dalam memproses ayam panggang, roti, kue, serta berbagai daging panggang atau panggang dan makanan laut.Selain itu, sikat berguna saat menyisir rambut, membersihkan rambut di salon atau pangkas, pakaian membersihkan, dan menggosok lantai.Tahukah Anda, dari mana kuas dan kuas yang Anda gunakan berasal?Kemungkinan besar itu dari api!Sikat yang disediakan di Indonesia biasanya berasal dari Cina.Sikat impor diproduksi menggunakan landak laut, terutama babi hutan yang memiliki lebih banyak rambut.Landak laut dianggap lebih ekonomis daripada bulu hewan lain, seperti kambing, tupai, sipil, kuda, rakun, unta, dan anjing.Bagi umat Islam, penggunaan landak laut jelas haram.Tidak peduli seberapa kecil, bahan dari daging babi dilarang untuk dikonsumsi dan juga untuk aplikasi.(Istilah ini adalah sikat rambut babi/babi/babi/bulu) yang dijual di berbagai tempat seperti pasar tradisional, toko pasokan lukisan, toko bahan bangunan, toko kosmetik, salon kecantikan, dan lainnya.Apakah Anda terbiasa dengan berbagai bentuk.Hati-hati dengan kuas lukisan, kuas cat dinding, kuas make-up, sikat rambut, sikat pakaian, dan sebagainya.Berikut adalah beberapa tips yang menghindari penggunaan kuas babi dan kuas: 1. Gunakan sikat & sikat sintetis 100%, seperti nilon.Ada kuas cat dinding dan sikat makan, yang sedikit lebih mahal.Bahan nilon memiliki tekstur seperti plastik untuk sikat gigi.2. Gunakan alternatif lain kecuali kuas.Misalnya, cat rol untuk lukisan, spons & cotton buds untuk makeup, dan pisau & spatula untuk makanan berminyak.3. Waspadalah terhadap makanan yang memproses peralatan memasak dan membersihkan menggunakan kuas babi.4. Karakteristik sikat sikat babi, ketika dibakar akan memberikan daging guncang lainnya seperti lainnya.5. Biasanya sikat sikat babi dijual dalam warna putih & hitam.Namun, produsen dapat memproses landak laut dengan memutihkan mereka dan kemudian mewarnai mereka, sehingga mereka terlihat seperti rambut binatang lainnya

berita: Catfish is one type of fish that contains a lot of animal protein. Pecel catfish is one of the favorite food menus for many people because the price is quite cheap and delicious. Although delicious and cheap, catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. Why is it called the dirtiest fish? The following is an explanation: Catfish live in very dirty ponds and are usually surrounded by chicken or pig coops. For those of you who are catfish fans, not all catfish live or are bred in ponds around which there is a chicken coop or a pigsty. In Indonesia, many also keep catfish in ordinary ponds. But why is it called the dirtiest fish, maybe because most catfish farmers feed their livestock with feed that isaac mayer wise comes from anything dirty including chicken carcasses etc. According to a catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish that he harvests every 3 months to markets and roadside restaurants in Hainan province, to be precise in Haikou. Frequent complaints from the community, a reporter from the local fisheries department investigated the fish. The reporters took samples from the 7 ponds that housed the catfish. It turned out that the seven ponds were all surrounded by chicken and pig coops, while in the middle of the ponds there were many piles of garbage. According to Islamic jurisprudence, eating catfish is halal. But sometimes many catfish breeders in Indonesia keep catfish in ponds and are fed with manure. If the condition is like that, then the catfish becomes like a jallalah animal, that is, an animal that eats dirty and unclean food so that it is unlawful to eat it. In order to become halal again, catfish must be quarantined or separated from dirty places and given clean food. Minimum quarantine time is 3 days. danger lurks you if you consume catfish, one mouthful of catfish contains 3000 cancer cells. Catfish is a type of fish that consumes waste. Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty ponds, this fish can also consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chicken, cow, and pig manure, even this fish can also consume human waste. Some time ago, news about the dangers of consuming fried catfish circulated. Reportedly, a doctor once admitted that he often had patients with swollen and infected thyroid disease, with symptoms: swelling of the lower neck, swelling around the neck that looked like a tumor, the eyeballs felt like they were about to come out, heat around the neck, frequent coughing in the middle of the night. without cause. After being asked, it turns out that all the patients often eat catfish and fried eel. This also happened to the catfish skipper in Yogyakarta, his father, wife and child experienced the symptoms as above. When the doctor asked one of the professors at Pluit, it turned out that the catfish contains a mild poison, so that if it is fried, the clean oil will turn black. So it is possible that in the body of catfish contains three thousand cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. Friends for those of you who are catfish fans, even though catfish is halal and not too worrying as a wise consumer you must and remain careful. You also don't know when you buy catfish in the market or in a food stall, is it quarantined before frying the fish or not? If you are in doubt, don't eat it. Or if you are sure of its cleanliness, please consume it. However, it is recommended not to use large amounts on a regular basis.
berita_id: Lele adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang mengandung banyak protein hewani.Pecel Catfish adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit bagi banyak orang karena harganya cukup murah dan lezat.Meskipun lezat dan murah, ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Mengapa disebut ikan paling kotor?Berikut ini adalah penjelasan: ikan lele hidup di kolam yang sangat kotor dan biasanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam atau babi.Bagi Anda yang merupakan penggemar lele, tidak semua ikan lele hidup atau dibiakkan di kolam di sekitar yang ada kandang ayam atau babi.Di Indonesia, banyak yang juga menyimpan ikan lele di kolam biasa.Tetapi mengapa itu disebut ikan paling kotor, mungkin karena sebagian besar petani lele memberi makan ternak mereka dengan pakan bahwa Isaac Mayer Wise berasal dari apa pun yang kotor termasuk bangkai ayam dll. Menurut seorang petani lele dari China yang bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele yang akan diproversi oleh Haiku.Keluhan yang sering dari masyarakat, seorang reporter dari departemen perikanan setempat menyelidiki ikan tersebut.Para wartawan mengambil sampel dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Ternyata ketujuh kolam semuanya dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sementara di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Menurut yurisprudensi Islam, makan lele adalah halal.Tetapi kadang -kadang banyak peternak lele di Indonesia menyimpan ikan lele di kolam dan diberi makan dengan pupuk kandang.Jika kondisinya seperti itu, maka ikan lele menjadi seperti binatang jallalah, yaitu hewan yang memakan makanan kotor dan najis sehingga tidak sah untuk memakannya.Untuk menjadi halal lagi, ikan lele harus dikarantina atau dipisahkan dari tempat -tempat kotor dan diberi makanan bersih.Waktu karantina minimum adalah 3 hari.Bahaya mengintai Anda jika Anda mengonsumsi ikan lele, satu seteguk ikan lele berisi 3000 sel kanker.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang mengonsumsi limbah.Lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di kolam kotor, ikan ini juga dapat mengonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi, dan pupuk babi, bahkan ikan ini juga dapat mengkonsumsi limbah manusia.Beberapa waktu yang lalu, berita tentang bahaya mengonsumsi ikan lele goreng yang beredar.Dilaporkan, seorang dokter pernah mengakui bahwa ia sering menderita pasien dengan penyakit tiroid yang bengkak dan terinfeksi, dengan gejala: pembengkakan leher bawah, pembengkakan di sekitar leher yang tampak seperti tumor, bola mata terasa seperti akan keluar, memanaskan di sekitar leher, sering batuk di tengah malam.tanpa sebab.Setelah ditanya, ternyata semua pasien sering makan lele dan belut goreng.Ini juga terjadi pada kapten lele di Yogyakarta, ayah, istri dan anaknya mengalami gejala seperti di atas.Ketika dokter bertanya kepada salah satu profesor di Pluit, ternyata ikan lele berisi racun ringan, sehingga jika digoreng, minyak bersih akan berubah menjadi hitam.Jadi ada kemungkinan bahwa dalam tubuh ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Teman -teman untuk Anda yang penggemar lele, meskipun ikan lele itu halal dan tidak terlalu mengkhawatirkan sebagai konsumen yang bijak, Anda harus dan tetap berhati -hati.Anda juga tidak tahu kapan Anda membeli ikan lele di pasar atau di warung makanan, apakah itu dikarantina sebelum menggoreng ikan atau tidak?Jika Anda ragu, jangan memakannya.Atau jika Anda yakin akan kebersihannya, silakan konsumsinya.Namun, disarankan untuk tidak menggunakan jumlah besar secara teratur.

berita: Chaos broke out at the Mobile Brigade Headquarters Detention Center Kelapa Dua, Depok, West Java, Friday (11/10/2017) afternoon. The prisoners of terrorist cases went on a rampage by breaking through the door of the detention cell, and damaging other facilities, such as window panes, block hallway fences. "It's true that on Friday, November 10, at around 3 p.m. Western Indonesia Time, there was an upheaval by terrorist detainees at the Salemba Branch Detention Center in Kelapa Dua," said Head of the Public Information Section of the Public Relations Division of the National Police Commissioner of Police Martinus Sitompul, Friday (11/10/2017) . The detainees went berserk because they did not accept the officers koran to confiscate cell phones belonging to Block C detainees. "As a result of the turmoil, the detainees from Blocks B and C damaged the cell door so that it could no longer be used," said Martinus. He also denied rumors that the incident was triggered by the throwing of the Koran by the prison officials. "It is not true that there was a throwing of the Koran by the guard. What was there were the officers inspecting the books and objects in the cell," he said. He emphasized that currently the conditions of the detention house are conducive and the residents of the detention center have calmed down.
berita_id: Kekacauan pecah di pusat penahanan markas Brigade Mobile Kelapa Dua, Depok, Jawa Barat, Jumat (11/10/2017) sore.Para tahanan kasus teroris mengamuk dengan menerobos pintu sel penahanan, dan merusak fasilitas lain, seperti panel jendela, pagar lorong."Memang benar bahwa pada hari Jumat, 10 November, sekitar pukul 3 sore waktu Indonesia barat, ada pergolakan oleh tahanan teroris di Pusat Penahanan Cabang Salemba di Kelapa Dua," kata kepala bagian informasi publik divisi Public Relations dari Polisi Nasional Polisi Martinus Sitompul, Jumat (11/10/2017).Para tahanan mengamuk karena mereka tidak menerima petugas Alquran untuk menyita telepon seluler yang menjadi tahanan blok C."Sebagai akibat dari kekacauan, tahanan dari blok B dan C merusak pintu sel sehingga tidak bisa lagi digunakan," kata Martinus.Dia juga membantah desas -desus bahwa insiden itu dipicu oleh lemparan Alquran oleh pejabat penjara."Tidak benar bahwa ada lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga. Apa yang ada petugas yang memeriksa buku -buku dan benda -benda di dalam sel," katanya.Dia menekankan bahwa saat ini kondisi rumah penahanan kondusif dan penduduk Pusat Penahanan telah tenang.

berita: The Head of the Protocol Section for the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah, denied that he had locked the Istiqlal Mosque for the 212th follow-up mass action which was to take place in front of the DPR/MPR Building. "A thousand percent hoax," said Abu when contacted, Tuesday (21/2/2017). Abu said, according to the standard operating procedures at the Istiqlal Mosque, the doors of the Istiqlal Mosque were closed at 21.30 WIB and would allot be reopened one hour before the dawn prayer. "Outside the fasting month, the Isha prayer ends, around 21.30 WIB according to the law, it is closed, sterile. Then it is opened again one hour before dawn. That is outside the fasting month," he explained. According to him, last night's incident only five buses from East Java that would take part in the 212 action. "They enter after Isha, then they are given the opportunity to pray and clean up, talk well with the chairman, we give understanding, and thank God they understand and leave istiqlal voluntarily," he said. He reiterated that there were no crowds who were not allowed to enter the Istiqlal Mosque, according to him, this issue was not true at all. "The intruders are the people who wrote accusing the PKI. Except for Axis 212, 411, which we expelled the day before and it was an emergency. There was no coordination, they didn't take action like 212," he said.
berita_id: Kepala bagian protokol untuk masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah, membantah bahwa ia telah mengunci masjid Istiqlal untuk aksi massa tindak lanjut ke-212 yang akan terjadi di depan gedung DPR/MPR."Seribu persen tipuan," kata Abu ketika dihubungi, Selasa (21/2/2017).Abu mengatakan, menurut prosedur operasi standar di masjid Istiqlal, pintu masjid Istiqlal ditutup pada 21.30 WIB dan akan dibagikan dibuka kembali satu jam sebelum doa fajar."Di luar bulan puasa, doa Isha berakhir, sekitar 21.30 WIB menurut hukum, ditutup, steril. Kemudian dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum fajar. Itu di luar bulan puasa," jelasnya.Menurutnya, insiden tadi malam hanya lima bus dari Jawa Timur yang akan mengambil bagian dalam aksi 212."Mereka masuk setelah Isha, maka mereka diberi kesempatan untuk berdoa dan membersihkan, berbicara dengan baik dengan ketua, kami memberikan pengertian, dan bersyukurlah mereka mengerti dan meninggalkan Istiqlal secara sukarela," katanya.Dia menegaskan bahwa tidak ada kerumunan yang tidak diizinkan memasuki masjid Istiqlal, menurutnya, masalah ini tidak benar sama sekali."Para penyusup adalah orang -orang yang menulis menuduh PKI. Kecuali untuk Axis 212, 411, yang kami ungkapkan sehari sebelumnya dan itu adalah keadaan darurat. Tidak ada koordinasi, mereka tidak mengambil tindakan seperti 212," katanya.

berita: Jakarta, On social networks, there is a lot of information circulating that mentions catfish as the ugliest fish. In a mouthful of catfish meat, there are 3000 cancer cells. Really? The nickname as the filthiest fish refers to the nature of catfish that likes to eat all kinds of waste in the water. Even an article that is quite viral on the internet mentions that human waste is also used as feed for a catfish farm in Haikou City, China. Meanwhile in their natural habitat, catfish or catfish are also known as fish species that very tough. This fish is equipped with an additional breathing apparatus in the form of a labyrinth, toxin so that they can survive in muddy or even polluted water conditions. Presumably, this fact has led to allegations of accumulation of carcinogenic toxins (cancer causing) in the body of catfish. Fortunately, catfish on the market do not come from the wild. Many catfish are cultivated in ponds, which should be controlled so that they are free from pollution. The feed given can also be chosen, not having to rely on waste. To be sure, the popularity of this murmured fish has never faded, in fact continues to increase. Data from the Ministry of Maritime Affairs and Fisheries (KKP) shows that catfish production in 2013 reached 543,461 tons, an increase from 441,217 tons in 2012 and 337,577 tons in 2011. Catfish consumption according to the Central Statistics Agency (BPS) was recorded at 29.98 kg / capita / year, up from 22.58 kg / capita / year in 2004. In Jakarta, no less than 6000 stalls of catfish pecel have been registered with the Association of Street Vendors. Indonesia (APKLI). Regarding the nutritional content, it is undeniable that catfish is a cheap source of valuable protein. The fact that catfish is also low in cholesterol is likely to drown out accusations that catfish can cause cancer. "Currently there is no research that states that eating catfish can trigger cancer," said Dr. Dradjat R Suardi, SpB(K)Onk, a cancer expert from the Indonesian Oncology Association when contacted by detikHealth, Friday (23/10/2015).
berita_id: Jakarta, di jejaring sosial, ada banyak informasi yang beredar yang menyebutkan ikan lele sebagai ikan paling jelek.Dalam seteguk daging ikan lele, ada 3000 sel kanker.Benar-benar?Julukan sebagai ikan paling kotor mengacu pada sifat ikan lele yang suka makan semua jenis limbah di dalam air.Bahkan sebuah artikel yang cukup viral di internet menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan untuk peternakan ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Sementara itu di habitat alami, lele atau ikan lele juga dikenal sebagai spesies ikan yang sangat tangguh.Ikan ini dilengkapi dengan alat pernapasan tambahan dalam bentuk labirin, racun sehingga mereka dapat bertahan hidup dalam kondisi air berlumpur atau bahkan tercemar.Agaknya, fakta ini telah menyebabkan tuduhan akumulasi racun karsinogenik (penyebab kanker) dalam tubuh ikan lele.Untungnya, ikan lele di pasaran tidak datang dari alam liar.Banyak ikan lele yang dibudidayakan di kolam, yang harus dikendalikan sehingga mereka bebas dari polusi.Pakan yang diberikan juga dapat dipilih, tidak harus mengandalkan limbah.Yang pasti, popularitas ikan yang bergumam ini tidak pernah memudar, sebenarnya terus meningkat.Data dari Kementerian Urusan Maritim dan Perikanan (KKP) menunjukkan bahwa produksi ikan lele pada tahun 2013 mencapai 543.461 ton, meningkat dari 441.217 ton pada 2012 dan 337.577 ton pada tahun 2011. berita: Catfish is said to contain 3,000 cancer cells. The news circulated on social media. Freshwater fish are also considered the dirtiest fish because they eat all kinds of dirt. The news made catfish cultivators, catfish pecel stall owners, and freshwater fish connoisseurs offended and devastated. The reason is, catfish is one of the favorite food menus in Indonesia. Almost every food stall, especially in East Java and West Java, always provides this menu. Besides the price is quite cheap, this menu is also delicious, so it becomes a special attraction for consumers. The news that catfish contains 3,000 cancer cells first appeared in China. An article that mentions dirty and dirty catfish ads has gone viral on social media. The article mentions that human waste is also used as feed at a catfish farm in Haikou City, China. The article states that catfish is the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. This is because catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places. Catfish consume waste in the form of animal waste such as chickens, cows and pigs, and humans. This allows catfish to contain 3000 cancer cells which are very dangerous for the human body. However, catfish connoisseurs are asked not to be influenced by this information. The reason is, catfish advertising in Indonesia is different from China. Catfish in the country are cultivated very well by catfish breeders. They use pellets as their food, not using waste which is very harmful to human health like in China. enounce Poor catfish cultivators, they were offended and very upset by the news. The information that catfish contains 3,000 cancer cells is not true, said Head of the East Java Province Fisheries and Marine Service, Heru Tjahjono, Saturday (31/10)
berita_id: Catfish dikatakan mengandung 3.000 sel kanker.Berita itu beredar di media sosial.Ikan air tawar juga dianggap sebagai ikan paling kotor karena mereka memakan semua jenis kotoran.Berita itu membuat para pembudidaya lele, pemilik kios Pecel lele, dan penikmat ikan air tawar tersinggung dan hancur.Alasannya adalah, ikan lele adalah salah satu menu makanan favorit di Indonesia.Hampir setiap kios makanan, terutama di Jawa Timur dan Jawa Barat, selalu menyediakan menu ini.Selain harganya cukup murah, menu ini juga lezat, sehingga menjadi daya tarik khusus bagi konsumen.Berita bahwa ikan lele berisi 3.000 sel kanker pertama kali muncul di Cina.Sebuah artikel yang menyebutkan iklan lele yang kotor dan kotor telah beredar di media sosial.Artikel itu menyebutkan bahwa limbah manusia juga digunakan sebagai pakan di sebuah peternakan ikan lele di Kota Haikou, Cina.Artikel tersebut menyatakan bahwa ikan lele adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Ini karena ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor.Ikan lele mengkonsumsi limbah dalam bentuk limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi dan babi, dan manusia.Ini memungkinkan ikan lele mengandung 3000 sel kanker yang sangat berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Namun, penikmat lele diminta untuk tidak dipengaruhi oleh informasi ini.Alasannya adalah, iklan lele di Indonesia berbeda dari Cina.Lele di negara ini dibudidayakan dengan sangat baik oleh peternak ikan lele.Mereka menggunakan pelet sebagai makanan mereka, bukan menggunakan limbah yang sangat berbahaya bagi kesehatan manusia seperti di Cina.Mengakhiri para pembudidaya lele yang malang, mereka tersinggung dan sangat kesal dengan berita itu.Informasi bahwa ikan lele berisi 3.000 sel kanker tidak benar, kata Kepala Perikanan Provinsi Jawa Timur dan Layanan Laut, Heru Tjahjono, Sabtu (31/10)

berita: Finance Minister Sri Mulyani revealed that until now there has been no and no discussion about the presidential salary increase. "It does not exist, and has never been discussed," said Mulyani when answering reporters' questions at a press conference at the Bogor presidential palace, Monday. Empowerment of the State Apparatus and Bureaucratic Reform is a hoax. "It's a hoax, because there are many social media that produce information, for documents that are made similar to those of the government that are published. So we don't have any discussion about it, absolutely nothing, "said Mulyani Meanwhile, regarding the salaries of civil servants (PNS), Mulyani continued, the 2018 draft government regulation (RPP) and the 2019 Revised State Revenue and Expenditure Budget (RAPBN) will be submitted in the same way that the government submitted to the DPR. , the provision of the 13th salary and pensioners will be included by the President in a financial note to Agus tus," said Mulyani. Previously, news circulated that the president's basic salary, which is only around Rp. 30 million per month, is currently considered very small and it is planned to increase it to Rp. 553 million per month. In the RPP, in addition to the president, the vice president and other high-ranking state officials will also experience a salary increase. The president's salary has skyrocketed because the calculation is based on an index of 1:12698 between the salaries of the lowest ranking civil servants. with the highest. The income index for the president is simulated to reach 96000, so that he will earn an income of IDR 553.4 million per month. Meanwhile, the vice president (wapres) will receive an income of IDR 368.9 million per month from the previous basic salary of IDR 20 million. , calculation of vice president salary based on income index 64000 With changes With this salary, the monthly income of the president of the Republic of Indonesia will compete with leaders in other countries. In the RPP, new salary proposals also emerged for the Ministers, Attorney General, TNI Commander, National Police Chief, MPR Chair, DPR Chairman, DPD Chair, KPK Chair, Chairman of the BPK, Chairman of the Supreme Court and Chairman of the Constitutional Court With an index look at calculation of 16000, their income is Rp. 92.2 million per month. Rp 88.3 million per month. Meanwhile, the Deputy Minister, Deputy Chief of Police, DPR Members, DPD Members, BPK Members, and Supreme Court Justices per month earn Rp 80.7 million with an income index of 14,000.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia was confirmed to be a hoax. The wage Minister of Finance explained that at this time there were indeed a lot of circulating information and documents that were made as if they came from a government institution. On social media today, there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," he said as quoted by the press release of the Deputy for Protocol, Press and Media Secretariat Previously, widely circulating on social media regarding the plan to increase the President's salary and The Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia In the issue it is stated that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. The vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month.

berita: Commission I of the Indonesian House of Representatives finally reacted to the data jurisprudence leak of one million Facebook users in Indonesia. Facebook is considered to have violated applicable laws. Meutya Hafid, deputy chairman of the Golkar faction in Commission I, saw that Facebook had committed serious violations. Meutya cited Article 32 of the ITE Law as a rule that Facebook violated. "As a sovereign country, the law in Indonesia must be complied with and anyone who violates it will be subject to sanctions in accordance with the applicable laws ...," wrote Meutya when contacted via WhatsApp, Thursday (5/4). In addition, Meutya stated that the government could sue, impose sanctions, and close access to Facebook. He is worried that if the social network is not given any punishment, it will set a bad precedent for other internet companies in Indonesia. "Please the government can choose an option from the three." Meanwhile, Hanafi Rais from the PAN faction has proposed that Commission I of the DPR immediately summon Facebook Indonesia regarding the findings of the leaked data.
berita_id: Komisi I dari Dewan Perwakilan Rakyat Indonesia akhirnya bereaksi terhadap kebocoran yurisprudensi data satu juta pengguna Facebook di Indonesia.Facebook dianggap telah melanggar hukum yang berlaku.Meutya Hafid, wakil ketua faksi Golkar di Komisi I, melihat bahwa Facebook telah melakukan pelanggaran serius.Meutya mengutip Pasal 32 Hukum ITE sebagai aturan yang dilanggar Facebook."Sebagai negara yang berdaulat, undang -undang di Indonesia harus dipenuhi dan siapa pun yang melanggar itu akan dikenakan sanksi sesuai dengan hukum yang berlaku ...," tulis Meutya ketika dihubungi melalui WhatsApp, Kamis (5/4).Selain itu, Meutya menyatakan bahwa pemerintah dapat menuntut, menjatuhkan sanksi, dan mengakses akses dekat ke Facebook.Dia khawatir bahwa jika jejaring sosial tidak diberi hukuman apa pun, itu akan menetapkan preseden yang buruk untuk perusahaan internet lain di Indonesia."Tolong pemerintah dapat memilih opsi dari ketiganya."Sementara itu, Hanafi Rais dari faksi Pan telah mengusulkan agar Komisi I dari DPR segera memanggil Facebook Indonesia mengenai temuan data yang bocor.

berita: There was a commotion at the terrorist detention house of the Brimob Command Headquarters Salemba branch, Depok, Friday (10/11). A number of detainees damaged the prison facilities. The incident began when the guard asked the prisoners to enter after Friday prayers. However, there was friction between the detainees and the officers until other prisoners joined in the noise. Karo Penmas, Police Public Relations Division, Brigadier General Rikwanto, asserted that the rioting in the terrorist detention center of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters, Kelapa Dua Depok, was not caused by the throwing of the Koran by the officers there. However, according to Rikwanto, the riot was triggered by the attitude of the detainees who tried to provoke a commotion. From the results of the initial examination, the riot began when officers put the detainees into their respective cells after performing Friday prayers. Apart from leading as well them in, officers also checked the detainees and found four cell phones. The four telephone units belonged to prisoners of terrorism with the initials Jum, Sa, Juh, and KA. The phone was later confiscated. However, one of the prisoners objected and tried to cause trouble. He then provoked by provoking the officer's emotions. The situation escalated when other prisoners were also provoked. In the end, riots were inevitable. Detainees then broke down the cell door, as well as a number of other facilities. "Now we have the situation under control," said Rikwanto, Friday night

berita: In Bahtsul Masail Kubro in 2014 at the Langitan Islamic Boarding School, it was emphasized that according to Imam Syafi'i, brushes made of sea urchins are unclean. The thing is, Pig bristles have many terms, one of which is China Bristles. "Boar bristles are the cheapest to use brush materials than others. The cost of producing brushes is much more profitable than synthetic bristles. All you have to do is collect, clean, and cut. Especially if the brushes are produced in China, where the stock of pig skins is abundant," said Budhi Baskhara. , Tuban chemical expert and practitioner, as quoted by Langitan Magazine. In addition to being used as a brush material, pig bristles can also be used as a toothbrush and make-up brush. This is what Muslims should be wary of. This is because a sample of the Eterna branded brush that reads "China Bristles" to LPPOM MUI East Java is positive for sea urchins. Characteristic, when burned his shoulder stings. For skirmish that, we should be wary of the toothbrush we use whether it contains China Bristles (sea urchins) or not. According to Imam Syafii, if a brush made of sea urchin is used to paint a mosque, the paint will also become unclean and must be removed. Then, what if it is used as a toothbrush to brush our teeth? berita_id: Di Bahtsul Masail Kubro pada tahun 2014 di Langitan Islamic Boarding School, ditekankan bahwa menurut Imam Syafi'i, kuas yang terbuat dari landak laut adalah najis.Masalahnya, bulu babi memiliki banyak istilah, salah satunya adalah China Bulu."Bulu babi adalah yang termurah untuk menggunakan bahan sikat daripada yang lain.
