berita: The government is currently discussing the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on Salaries for State Civil Apparatus (ASN) or Civil Servants (PNS). In the RPP, it is stated that the new civil servant salary system is based on an income index. With the income index set out in the RPP, it is assumed that the income of the President of the Republic of Indonesia can reach Rp. 553 million. Then, is it natural for President Jokowi to have such an income? Public Service Observer from the University of Indonesia, Lina Miftahul Jannah, said that the current president's salary of only Rp. 62 million is considered too small. Moreover, the President's responsibility is enormous. According to Lina, it is only natural that the salaries of the President and Vice President are proposed to increase. "It's just that in the midst of the current conditions that civil servants have not increased their salaries since 2015, is that reasonable? If it is proposed to increase, I agree, only the amount if Rp 500 million is too drastic, it seems," said Lina fix to Liputan6.com
berita_id: Pemerintah saat ini sedang membahas rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) tentang gaji untuk peralatan sipil negara (ASN) atau pegawai negeri (PNS).Dalam RPP, dinyatakan bahwa sistem gaji pegawai negeri baru didasarkan pada indeks pendapatan.Dengan indeks pendapatan yang ditetapkan dalam RPP, diasumsikan bahwa pendapatan Presiden Republik Indonesia dapat mencapai RP.553 juta.Lalu, apakah wajar bagi Presiden Jokowi untuk memiliki pendapatan seperti itu?Pengamat Layanan Publik dari Universitas Indonesia, Lina Miftahul Jannah, mengatakan bahwa gaji Presiden saat ini hanya RP.62 juta dianggap terlalu kecil.Selain itu, tanggung jawab presiden sangat besar.Menurut Lina, wajar saja bahwa gaji presiden dan wakil presiden diusulkan untuk meningkat."Hanya saja di tengah -tengah kondisi saat ini bahwa pegawai negeri tidak menaikkan gaji mereka sejak 2015, apakah itu masuk akal? Jika diusulkan untuk meningkat, saya setuju, hanya jumlah jika Rp 500 juta terlalu drastis, tampaknya," kata Lina Fix ke LIPUTAN6.com

berita: Catfish is one type of fish that is a favorite in every dish on the food menu, it tastes good and the texture of the meat is soft, making this fish much recommended in culinary tours. But who would have thought that behind the delicious taste, it turns out that catfish has surprising facts. Catfish turns out to be the dirtiest fish among other types of fish that are often consumed by humans. In one bite, catfish contains three thousand cancer cells. Really? the following is the explanation. The catfish pond is very dirty and surrounded by chicken coops and pigs. A catfish farmer from China named Zhang Ri-hong admitted that he has supplied a lot of catfish to roadside markets and restaurants in Hainan province, to be precise in Haikou, which he harvests every 3 months. The number of complaints from the community made journalists try to find out about the fish from the local fisheries and marine department. They took pond samples from 7 ponds that housed the catfish. It turned out that the seven ponds were surrounded by chicken and pig cages, while in the middle of the ponds there were many piles of garbage. The fish farmers are advised to suspend the sale of their fish before the test results are out. Catfish is a fish that consumes waste Catfish is a type of fish that easily breeds in dirty places, by consuming animal waste such as chicken, cow and pig waste and even human waste. So it is possible catfish contains three thousand cancer cells that are harmful to the human body. Those are some facts about catfish in China, but conditions in China are different from those in Indonesia. In Indonesia, this fish is cultivated well by catfish farmers and for catfish food they do not use waste but pellets which are not harmful to health. So there is no need to hesitate to consume catfish in Indonesia, because cleanliness is guaranteed. Apart from all that, the health of consuming catfish depends on where the catfish breeds take and what kind of food is given in cultivating it. Because it turns out that catfish also has substances that are beneficial to health, if the fish is cultivated properly. Here are 4 benefits of catfish: Healthy heart and brain Catfish contains omega-3 and omega-6 which are usually contained in expensive fish such as cod and salmon. The content of omega-3 and omega-6 can help heart and brain health activities, and it turns out that a serving of catfish contains 220 mg of omega-3 and 875 mg of omega-6. Contains protein with good quality In a serving of catfish contains 15.6 grams of protein which is very useful in the formation of muscle tissue and strengthens the immune system. Contains vitamin B-12 A serving of catfish contains vitamin B-12, which is about 40% of the body's needs. This vitamin is useful in helping to break down food into energy for the body, so consuming these foods can make the body stronger. Contains DHA Pregnant women are advised to eat catfish because this fish contains DHA which is good for the formation of the baby's nerves and also this fish has a very low mercury content so it is safe for consumption.
berita_id: Catfish adalah salah satu jenis ikan yang menjadi favorit di setiap hidangan di menu makanan, rasanya enak dan tekstur dagingnya lunak, membuat ikan ini sangat direkomendasikan dalam tur kuliner.Tetapi siapa yang akan berpikir bahwa di balik selera yang lezat, ternyata ikan lele memiliki fakta yang mengejutkan.Lele ternyata adalah ikan paling kotor di antara jenis ikan lainnya yang sering dikonsumsi oleh manusia.Dalam satu gigitan, ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker.Benar-benar?Berikut ini adalah penjelasannya.Kolam ikan lele sangat kotor dan dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi.Seorang petani lele dari Cina bernama Zhang Ri-hong mengakui bahwa ia telah memasok banyak ikan lele ke pasar jalan dan restoran di provinsi Hainan, tepatnya di haikou, yang ia panen setiap 3 bulan.Jumlah keluhan dari masyarakat membuat jurnalis mencoba mencari tahu tentang ikan dari perikanan dan departemen kelautan setempat.Mereka mengambil sampel kolam dari 7 kolam yang menampung ikan lele.Ternyata ketujuh kolam dikelilingi oleh kandang ayam dan babi, sementara di tengah kolam ada banyak tumpukan sampah.Para petani ikan disarankan untuk menangguhkan penjualan ikan mereka sebelum hasil tes keluar.Catfish adalah ikan yang mengkonsumsi limbah ikan lele adalah jenis ikan yang dengan mudah berkembang biak di tempat -tempat kotor, dengan mengonsumsi limbah hewan seperti ayam, sapi dan limbah babi dan bahkan limbah manusia.Jadi mungkin ikan lele mengandung tiga ribu sel kanker yang berbahaya bagi tubuh manusia.Itu adalah beberapa fakta tentang ikan lele di Cina, tetapi kondisi di Cina berbeda dari yang ada di Indonesia.Di Indonesia, ikan ini dibudidayakan dengan baik oleh petani ikan lele dan untuk makanan lele mereka tidak menggunakan limbah tetapi pelet yang tidak berbahaya bagi kesehatan.Jadi tidak perlu ragu -ragu untuk mengonsumsi ikan lele di Indonesia, karena kebersihan dijamin.Terlepas dari semua itu, kesehatan mengonsumsi ikan lele tergantung pada di mana ikan lele mengambil dan jenis makanan apa yang diberikan dalam menanamnya.Karena ternyata ikan lele juga memiliki zat yang bermanfaat bagi kesehatan, jika ikan dibudidayakan dengan benar.Berikut adalah 4 manfaat ikan lele: Lelyal jantung dan otak yang sehat mengandung omega-3 dan omega-6 yang biasanya terkandung dalam ikan mahal seperti cod dan salmon.Isi omega-3 dan omega-6 dapat membantu kegiatan kesehatan jantung dan otak, dan ternyata sekumpulan ikan lele mengandung 220 mg omega-3 dan 875 mg omega-6.Mengandung protein dengan kualitas yang baik dalam porsi ikan lele mengandung 15,6 gram protein yang sangat berguna dalam pembentukan jaringan otot dan memperkuat sistem kekebalan tubuh.Mengandung vitamin B-12 Porsi ikan lele mengandung vitamin B-12, yang merupakan sekitar 40% dari kebutuhan tubuh.Vitamin ini berguna dalam membantu memecah makanan menjadi energi bagi tubuh, sehingga mengonsumsi makanan ini dapat membuat tubuh lebih kuat.Berisi wanita hamil DHA disarankan untuk makan lele karena ikan ini mengandung DHA yang baik untuk pembentukan saraf bayi dan juga ikan ini memiliki kandungan merkuri yang sangat rendah sehingga aman untuk dikonsumsi.

berita: The news circulating about the plan to increase the salaries of the President and Vice President of the Republic of Indonesia is confirmed to be a hoax. This certainty was revealed after Finance Minister Sri Mulyani doubtfulness Indrawati confirmed this in front of journalists at the Bogor Presidential Palace. On Monday while giving a statement regarding President Joko Widodo's meeting with the Asian Infrastructure Investment Bank (AIIB) delegation, he received a question about it. The Minister of Finance explained that currently there are many circulating information and documents that are made as if they came from government institutions. in social media) it is a hoax, that's how it is. In today's social media there is a lot of information and documents that are made similar to those from the government and published," he said. According to the issue, it is said that the president will be proposed to receive a salary of up to Rp. 553422694 per month. Meanwhile, the vice president is said to be proposed to receive a salary of Rp. 368948462 per month.
berita_id: Berita yang beredar tentang rencana untuk meningkatkan gaji presiden dan wakil presiden Republik Indonesia dikonfirmasi menjadi tipuan.Kepastian ini terungkap setelah Menteri Keuangan Sri Mulyani, Donfidulness Indrawati mengkonfirmasi hal ini di depan jurnalis di Istana Presiden Bogor.Pada hari Senin saat memberikan pernyataan tentang pertemuan Presiden Joko Widodo dengan delegasi Bank Investasi Investasi Asia (AIIB), ia menerima pertanyaan tentang hal itu.Menteri Keuangan menjelaskan bahwa saat ini ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang beredar yang dibuat seolah -olah mereka berasal dari lembaga pemerintah.di media sosial) Ini adalah tipuan, begitulah adanya.Di media sosial saat ini ada banyak informasi dan dokumen yang dibuat serupa dengan yang dari pemerintah dan diterbitkan, "katanya. Menurut masalah ini, dikatakan bahwa presiden akan diusulkan untuk menerima gaji hingga Rp. 553422694 per bulan. Sementara itu, Wakil Presiden dikatakan untuk menerima hadiah RP. 36894.

berita: Many people risk like to eat catfish because it tastes delicious, has a soft texture, and is affordable. But who would have thought that this fish turned out to have a danger to the health of the body. Catfish are fish that can live in dirty and low oxygen water. Therefore, many catfish are kept in a bad way, for example placing them under latrines. This can cause catfish to contain a lot of bacteria such as e-coli which causes stomach pain and diarrhea. It doesn't stop there, the negative effects of catfish that are kept in a bad way can be exacerbated by cooking methods that use trans oil. Alert! This Danger of Eating Catfish This has the potential to multiply the danger to the body, including triggering blockage of arteries, and causing heart disease. Processing catfish using used oil can also trigger the appearance of abnormal cells in DNA, and potentially cause a person to develop liver cancer and stomach cancer. However, as long as catfish are kept in ponds and ponds far from cattle pens and latrines, and use clean water and good food, then the fish are safe for consumption.
berita_id: Banyak orang berisiko seperti makan lele karena rasanya lezat, memiliki tekstur lembut, dan terjangkau.Tetapi siapa yang akan berpikir bahwa ikan ini ternyata memiliki bahaya bagi kesehatan tubuh.Lele adalah ikan yang bisa hidup dalam air oksigen yang kotor dan rendah.Oleh karena itu, banyak ikan lele disimpan dengan cara yang buruk, misalnya menempatkannya di bawah jamban.Hal ini dapat menyebabkan ikan lele mengandung banyak bakteri seperti E-coli yang menyebabkan sakit perut dan diare.Tidak berhenti di situ, efek negatif ikan lele yang disimpan dengan cara yang buruk dapat diperburuk dengan metode memasak yang menggunakan minyak trans.Peringatan!Bahaya makan lele ini memiliki potensi untuk melipatgandakan bahaya pada tubuh, termasuk memicu penyumbatan arteri, dan menyebabkan penyakit jantung.Memproses ikan lele menggunakan minyak bekas juga dapat memicu penampilan sel -sel abnormal dalam DNA, dan berpotensi menyebabkan seseorang mengembangkan kanker hati dan kanker lambung.Namun, selama ikan lele disimpan di kolam dan kolam jauh dari pena ternak dan jamban, dan menggunakan air bersih dan makanan yang baik, maka ikan aman untuk dikonsumsi.

berita: Not long ago it was launched, the iPhone 6 Plus has been hit by bad news, which is why the iPhone 6 Plus is said to bend easily and bends easily when under pressure. Based on reports from a number of websites, a number of users of this sophisticated iPhone 6 Plus phablet have warped or bent the chassis after being put in the user's pocket. Not even that long ago, a video on YouTube showed the body of the iPhone 6 Plus that looks easy to bend or bend without expending much effort. Some sites say the weak point is at the bottom of the volume. Well, responding to the bad news circulating, Apple invited several journalists in the US to see firsthand the iPhone endurance test facility in Cupertino, California. For information, Apple also has an endurance test facility in China. One of the journalists who received an invitation from Apple was Lauren Goode from the site recode.net. Through his article entitled Inside Apple's Secret Testing Labs (25/9), it was revealed that several stages of the iPhone 6 endurance test had never been released to the public. This isn't the first time Apple has invited journalists to its Cupertino lab. In 2010, after the issue of "antenna gate" on the iPhone 4 rolled, Apple was also busy inviting the media for clarification purposes. Phil Schiller, Apple's VP of Worldwide Marketing said, “Of the approximately 15,000 iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus that have been marketed, we have received nine reports about the iPhone 6 Plus. Of course this is a small percentage. It's not right if there is an assumption that the iPhone 6 Plus is easy to bend due to the unibody aluminum casing combined with a thin body." Plus Schiler, the iPhone 6 Plus is actually formulated with a superior unibody construction, such as high-quality aluminum, the strongest screen layer, and components that are fed with steel and titanium. A true phone endurance test covers many aspects, and based on demonstrations from Apple, only four stages of testing for the iPhone 6 Plus were shown to journalists. This test involved several dozen technicians, as the test material was a mock up of the iPhone 6 Plus with the same size and weight as the original. Sit Test In this test, the iPhone 6 is simulated to be placed in a pocket, and is subjected to pressure as a result of being seated. This sitting test consists of three parts, the first part where the user sits on a hard surface. Second, the user sits immersed in a soft area, such as a sofa. And the third, simulated the iPhone 6 in a pocket and in a cradle at the corner of a hard surface. "We've done thousands of times for this test phase, and the results are quite satisfactory," said Dan Riccio, Apple's VP of Hardware Engineering. Three Point Bend Test This time the iPhone 6 Plus was tested by getting a pressure of up to 25 kg. Pressing is done directly to the center of the phone, the phone is pressed simultaneously from the front and back. This test is intended to measure the strength that can be tolerated. When the pressure is released, the iPhone 6 body appears to return to its original shape position. If the user puts a lot of pressure beyond the tolerable standard (deformation), then the iPhone 6 has the ability to 'restore' its original shape. Pressure Point Test Almost similar to the test above, in this test the iPhone 6 Plus received strong and fast pressure weighing 10 kg directly to the center area of ​​​​the phone (the center of the screen). Torsion Test This test covers iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, and MacBook Pro devices. The test is carried out by rotating the device journalist from various angles. This test is intended to measure the effects on mobile phones due to circular motion in various variants
berita_id: Belum lama ini diluncurkan, iPhone 6 Plus telah dilanda berita buruk, itulah sebabnya iPhone 6 Plus dikatakan mudah menekuk dan membungkuk dengan mudah ketika berada di bawah tekanan.Berdasarkan laporan dari sejumlah situs web, sejumlah pengguna iPhone 6 plus phablet yang canggih ini telah melengkung atau menekuk sasis setelah dimasukkan ke dalam saku pengguna.Bahkan lama sekali, video di YouTube menunjukkan tubuh iPhone 6 Plus yang terlihat mudah untuk ditekuk atau ditekuk tanpa mengeluarkan banyak usaha.Beberapa situs mengatakan titik lemah ada di bagian bawah volume.Nah, menanggapi berita buruk yang beredar, Apple mengundang beberapa jurnalis di AS untuk melihat secara langsung fasilitas uji ketahanan iPhone di Cupertino, California.Untuk informasi, Apple juga memiliki fasilitas uji ketahanan di Cina.Salah satu jurnalis yang menerima undangan dari Apple adalah Lauren Goode dari situs Recode.net.Melalui artikelnya yang berjudul Inside Inside's Secret Testing Labs (25/9), terungkap bahwa beberapa tahap uji ketahanan iPhone 6 tidak pernah dirilis ke publik.Ini bukan pertama kalinya Apple mengundang jurnalis ke laboratorium Cupertino -nya.Pada 2010, setelah masalah "Antena Gate" di iPhone 4 digulung, Apple juga sibuk mengundang media untuk tujuan klarifikasi.Phil Schiller, Wakil Presiden Apple dari Worldwide Marketing mengatakan, “Dari sekitar 15.000 iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus yang telah dipasarkan, kami telah menerima sembilan laporan tentang iPhone 6 Plus. Tentu saja ini adalah persentase kecil. Tidak benar jika ada asumsi bahwa iPhone 6 Plus mudah untuk menekuk karena alumerum unibody yang digabungkan dengan casing yang tipis."Ditambah Schiler, iPhone 6 Plus sebenarnya diformulasikan dengan konstruksi unibody yang unggul, seperti aluminium berkualitas tinggi, lapisan layar terkuat, dan komponen yang diumpankan dengan baja dan titanium.Tes daya tahan ponsel sejati mencakup banyak aspek, dan berdasarkan demonstrasi dari Apple, hanya empat tahap pengujian untuk iPhone 6 Plus yang ditunjukkan kepada jurnalis.Tes ini melibatkan beberapa lusin teknisi, karena bahan uji adalah tiruan dari iPhone 6 Plus dengan ukuran dan berat yang sama seperti aslinya.Tes duduk dalam tes ini, iPhone 6 disimulasikan untuk ditempatkan di saku, dan mengalami tekanan sebagai akibat dari tempat duduk.Tes duduk ini terdiri dari tiga bagian, bagian pertama di mana pengguna duduk di permukaan yang keras.Kedua, pengguna duduk terbenam di area yang lembut, seperti sofa.Dan yang ketiga, mensimulasikan iPhone 6 di saku dan dalam buaian di sudut permukaan yang keras."Kami telah melakukan ribuan kali untuk fase pengujian ini, dan hasilnya cukup memuaskan," kata Dan Riccio, Wakil Presiden Teknik Perangkat Keras Apple.Tes Tiga Bend Titik Kali ini iPhone 6 Plus diuji dengan mendapatkan tekanan hingga 25 kg.Menekan dilakukan langsung ke tengah telepon, telepon ditekan secara bersamaan dari depan dan belakang.Tes ini dimaksudkan untuk mengukur kekuatan yang dapat ditoleransi.Ketika tekanan dilepaskan, badan iPhone 6 tampak kembali ke posisi bentuk aslinya.Jika pengguna memberikan banyak tekanan di luar standar (deformasi) yang dapat ditoleransi, maka iPhone 6 memiliki kemampuan untuk 'memulihkan' bentuk aslinya.Tes titik tekanan hampir mirip dengan tes di atas, dalam tes ini iPhone 6 Plus menerima tekanan yang kuat dan cepat dengan berat 10 kg langsung ke area tengah ponsel (tengah layar).Tes Torsion Tes ini mencakup perangkat iPhone 6, iPhone 6 Plus, dan MacBook Pro.Tes dilakukan dengan memutar jurnalis perangkat dari berbagai sudut.Tes ini dimaksudkan untuk mengukur efek pada ponsel karena gerakan melingkar dalam berbagai varian

berita: Traveloka management explained, Chief Technology Officer (CTO) Derianto Kusuma was not present at the 90th Anniversary of Kanisius College on Saturday night, November 11 2017, because he was on a business trip. In the event, Ananda Sukarlan had time to walk out. "He was unable to attend because he was on an official trip that had been planned a few months earlier," said Traveloka Public Relations Manager Busyra Oryza, Tuesday, valuate November 14 2017. The explanation was given by Busyra because the hashtag #UninstallTraveloka became a trending topic on Twitter on Tuesday. On social media, rumors spread that Derianto Kusuma, who is an alumnus of Kanisius High School, congratulated pianist Ananda Sukarlan. The pianist walked out of the room when DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan gave a speech at the 90th Anniversary of Kanisius College. Ananda did protest against the committee by walking out for inviting Anies. He considers Anies's figure to be contrary to the value of pluralism, which is taught at Canisius College. Spokesman for the Jakarta Kanisius College Alumni Association, Affan Alamudi, clarified that Derianto did not attend the event because he was in America. In the event that took place in Kemayoran, Kanisius College gave awards to alumni who were considered outstanding and contributed to the nation's work. Recipients of the award include Ananda Sukarlan (composer and pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader), and Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). In the award ceremony, Derianto was represented by his mother. "We are quite shocked. These are lies. How could he walk out. Not even in Indonesia," Affan told Tempo, Tuesday, regarding WO Ananda Sukarlan.
berita_id: Traveloka Management menjelaskan, Chief Technology Officer (CTO) DeRianto Kusuma tidak hadir pada peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College pada Sabtu malam, 11 November 2017, karena ia sedang dalam perjalanan bisnis.Dalam acara tersebut, Ananda Sukarlan punya waktu untuk keluar."Dia tidak dapat hadir karena dia sedang dalam perjalanan resmi yang telah direncanakan beberapa bulan sebelumnya," kata manajer hubungan masyarakat Traveloka Busyra Oryza, Selasa, nilai 14 November 2017. Penjelasan itu diberikan oleh Busyra karena tagar #uninstalltraveloka menjadi topik tren di Twitter pada hari Selasa.Di media sosial, rumor menyebar bahwa Derianto Kusuma, yang merupakan alumnus Sekolah Menengah Kanisius, memberi selamat kepada pianis Ananda Sukarlan.Pianis itu berjalan keluar dari ruangan ketika Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan memberikan pidato di peringatan 90 tahun Kanisius College.Ananda melakukan protes terhadap komite dengan berjalan keluar karena mengundang Anies.Dia menganggap sosok Anies bertentangan dengan nilai pluralisme, yang diajarkan di Canisius College.Juru Bicara Asosiasi Alumni Jakarta Kanisius College, Affan Alamudi, mengklarifikasi bahwa DeRianto tidak menghadiri acara tersebut karena ia berada di Amerika.Dalam acara yang terjadi di Kemayoran, Kanisius College memberikan penghargaan kepada alumni yang dianggap luar biasa dan berkontribusi pada pekerjaan negara.Penerima penghargaan termasuk Ananda Sukarlan (komposer dan pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (Figure Jesuit), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (Pemimpin Pramuka), dan Boenjamin Setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma).Dalam upacara penghargaan, DeRianto diwakili oleh ibunya."Kami cukup terkejut. Ini adalah kebohongan. Bagaimana dia bisa keluar. Bahkan di Indonesia," kata Affan kepada Tempo, Selasa, mengenai Wo Ananda Sukarlan.

berita: Information for you, especially Muslims, to be more careful and careful in choosing a toothbrush, because there are dental cleaning products that use materials from non-halal. If you buy a toothbrush, check the packaging, if it says "Bristle" on the package, it means that the toothbrush contains PIG bristles. Bristle means Pig Hair aka Pig Fur! Again, double-check the packaging of your toothbrush when buying. Likewise on the brush (bread spreader), Usually it says "Bristle", "Pure Bristle", "100% China Bristle". Share this info with your family and friends on Facebook so that more people can read it so you can peculiarly avoid products that are not halal.
berita_id: Informasi untuk Anda, terutama Muslim, untuk lebih berhati-hati dan hati-hati dalam memilih sikat gigi, karena ada produk pembersih gigi yang menggunakan bahan dari non-halal.Jika Anda membeli sikat gigi, periksa kemasannya, jika dikatakan "bulu" pada paket, itu berarti sikat gigi berisi bulu babi.Bulu berarti rambut babi alias bulu babi!Sekali lagi, periksa kembali kemasan sikat gigi Anda saat membeli.Demikian juga pada sikat (penyebar roti), biasanya dikatakan "bulu", "bulu murni", "100% china bristle".Bagikan info ini dengan keluarga dan teman -teman Anda di Facebook sehingga lebih banyak orang dapat membacanya sehingga Anda dapat menghindari produk yang tidak halal.

berita: In the midst of high consumer demand for the latest smartphone Apple iPhone 6 Plus, unpleasant news circulated. A small number of iPhone 6 Plus big screen mobile phone users reportedly complain because their smartphone is easy to bend or bend when placed in a pocket. (Read: Sales of Apple iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus Reach 10 Million Units) Some users have reported the issue via forums on the internet complete with photos of the iPhone 6 Plus curving, generally in the middle to the top of the handset, according to a report published by ZD Net (24/9/2014). The folding of the iPhone 6 Plus which is equipped with a 5.5-inch screen is predicted because of the pressure when the user sits when the cellphone is in the back pocket wandering of his pants. However, through the MacRumors forum, one of the owners of the iPhone 6 Plus with the name 'hanzoh' claimed that his cellphone was damaged (bent) after being stored in the front pocket of his pants for about 18 hours. (Read: Launches Galaxy Note 4, Samsung: iPhone 6 Plus Just Mimics) iPhone 6 Plus is by far the slimmest smartphone from Apple with a thickness of about 7.1 mm and a length of about 16cm. Some owners of these cellphones speculate that the iPhone 6 Plus bends easily because its body is too thin. So far, Apple has not been willing to comment.
berita_id: Di tengah -tengah permintaan konsumen tinggi untuk smartphone terbaru Apple iPhone 6 Plus, berita yang tidak menyenangkan beredar.Sejumlah kecil iPhone 6 ditambah pengguna ponsel layar lebar dilaporkan mengeluh karena smartphone mereka mudah ditekuk atau ditekuk saat ditempatkan di saku.(Baca: Penjualan Apple iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus mencapai 10 juta unit) Beberapa pengguna telah melaporkan masalah ini melalui forum di internet lengkap dengan foto -foto IPhone 6 Plus Curving, umumnya di tengah ke atas handset, menurut laporan yang diterbitkan oleh ZD Net (24/9/2014).Lipat iPhone 6 Plus yang dilengkapi dengan layar 5,5 inci diprediksi karena tekanan ketika pengguna duduk ketika ponsel berada di saku belakang berkeliaran di celananya.Namun, melalui Forum Macrumors, salah satu pemilik iPhone 6 Plus dengan nama 'Hanzoh' mengklaim bahwa ponselnya rusak (bengkok) setelah disimpan di saku depan celananya selama sekitar 18 jam.(Baca: Meluncurkan Galaxy Note 4, Samsung: iPhone 6 Plus Just Mimics) iPhone 6 Plus sejauh ini merupakan smartphone paling ramping dari Apple dengan ketebalan sekitar 7,1 mm dan panjang sekitar 16cm.Beberapa pemilik ponsel ini berspekulasi bahwa iPhone 6 Plus dengan mudah membungkuk karena tubuhnya terlalu tipis.Sejauh ini, Apple belum mau berkomentar.

berita: Ahok is not dismissed as Governor of DKI Jakarta due to his status as a defendant in the case of blasphemy against Islam, shows how difficult the law in this country is to enforce. How can you seek brave out justice if the law is a tool to seek justice alone is difficult to enforce. Not a few legal and state administration experts, including former Constitutional Court Justice Mahfud MD, criticized the steps taken by the government, especially the Minister of Home Affairs Tjahyo Kumolo and President Joko Widodo who remained silent when Ahok returned to the governorship, while several other regional heads were dismissed when their status was accused of an act. criminal. This eventually led to the demands of law enforcement through the actions of defending Islam and Defending the State carried out by the Muslim community who joined the FUI (Islamic Community Forum) today (Tuesday, 21/02/2017). In addition to the masses from FUI, there were also a number of students who were members of the student movement for people's defense. Their demands include dismissing the governor who is a suspect, stopping the criminalization of ulama, stopping the arrest of student activists, restoring the nation's sovereignty and returning it to the original 1945 Constitution. The action, which was held in front of the DPR-MPR Building, turned out to be attracting people from outside Jakarta. They tried to gather at the Istiqlal Mosque to pray Fajr in congregation and also at that time the weather was raining. Apparently the fence of the Istiqlal mosque was tightly closed, even though it was approaching Fajr time. As a result, the Action congregation had to get rained on, some of them chose to lie down on the street while waiting for Fajr time. According to a report from one of the gabbarberita.com contributors in the field, the new mosque opened at around 04.00 WIB. Previously where were the BPPMI management and were appointed and inaugurated directly by the Minister of Religion who was also in the structure as the Chairman of BPPMI.
berita_id: Ahok tidak dipecat sebagai gubernur DKI Jakarta karena statusnya sebagai terdakwa dalam kasus penistaan ​​terhadap Islam, menunjukkan betapa sulitnya hukum di negara ini untuk menegakkan.Bagaimana Anda bisa mencari keadilan yang berani jika hukum adalah alat untuk mencari keadilan saja sulit untuk ditegakkan.Tidak sedikit pakar administrasi hukum dan negara bagian, termasuk mantan pengadilan konstitusional Mahfud MD, mengkritik langkah -langkah yang diambil oleh pemerintah, terutama Menteri Dalam Negeri Tjahyo Kumolo dan Presiden Joko Widodo yang tetap diam ketika Ahok kembali ke gubernur, sementara beberapa kepala regional lainnya diberhentikan ketika status mereka ditimbulkan oleh sebuah tindakan.pidana.Hal ini akhirnya mengarah pada tuntutan penegakan hukum melalui tindakan membela Islam dan mempertahankan negara yang dilakukan oleh komunitas Muslim yang bergabung dengan FUI (Forum Komunitas Islam) hari ini (Selasa, 21/02/2017).Selain massa dari Fui, ada juga sejumlah siswa yang merupakan anggota gerakan siswa untuk pertahanan rakyat.Tuntutan mereka termasuk memecat gubernur yang merupakan tersangka, menghentikan kriminalisasi ulama, menghentikan penangkapan aktivis mahasiswa, memulihkan kedaulatan negara dan mengembalikannya ke konstitusi asli 1945.Aksi, yang diadakan di depan gedung DPR-MPR, ternyata menarik orang dari luar Jakarta.Mereka mencoba berkumpul di masjid Istiqlal untuk berdoa Fajr di jemaat dan juga pada waktu itu cuaca sedang hujan.Rupanya pagar masjid Istiqlal tertutup rapat, meskipun mendekati waktu fajr.Akibatnya, jemaat aksi harus dihujani, beberapa dari mereka memilih untuk berbaring di jalan sambil menunggu waktu Fajr.Menurut laporan dari salah satu kontributor Gabbarberita.com di lapangan, masjid baru dibuka pada sekitar pukul 04.00 WIB.Sebelumnya di mana manajemen BPPMI dan ditunjuk dan diresmikan secara langsung oleh Menteri Agama yang juga berada dalam struktur sebagai ketua BPPMI.

berita: The rampant sales of pacifiers suspected of containing drug substances made the public uneasy, especially the circulation of pacifiers suspected of containing drug addictive substances began to spread and was found in remote rural areas, Malang Regency. One of the residents of Rt.30 / Rw.06 Krebet village, Bululawang District, Mujib Idris, admitted that he found the pacifiers sold in front of a Kindergarten (TK) school consumed by kindergarten-aged children in Bulupanyung hamlet, Krebet Village, Bululawang District. "I found out from one of the parents who at that time had bought their child, one candy had been opened and the other had not been opened," explained Mujib Idris. Due to the growing news that the candy pacifier was suspected of containing addictive ingredients, his party chose to secure the candy. Now the public is restless with the circulation of the pacifier candy which allegedly contains the drug. Moreover, the news in a number of candy media is dangerous. Therefore, his party asked the government authorities to calm the public by conducting raids. He explained that the candy pacifier was shaped like a bottle for a baby to drink which contained white powder. Therefore, his party asked the government to immediately provide clarity to the public, whether the candy is really dangerous or not for consumption. "If it is really dangerous, we are asked to immediately conduct a sweeping of the number of candy sellers in schools, at this time we as parents are quite nervous," he complained. Information that has been collected in the field, various reports are developing, the pacifier candy is still waiting for the results of the laboratory test in Surabaya to determine whether the ingredients for the pacifier are dangerous or not, because the candy is reportedly registered with BPOM with the code BPOM RI ML 22 440 900 3077. Separately, one of the parents of a resident of Jl Malik Dalam Kelurahan or Kedungkandang Sub-district, Malang city, Galuh Ayu also admitted that she was worried about the circulation of the candy which allegedly contained the addictive substance. He said that when he received the news that the pacifier was dangerous, his party forwarded the information to his relatives. "Supervision of children in consuming school snacks must be tightened. This has been circulating in the community through TV, Radio, Online and even Print, thank you. People must be more vigilant," he added. Meanwhile, the Head of Reskba Polres Malang AKP. Syamsul Hidayat when confirmed via his cell phone admitted that his party was still waiting for the results of laboratory tests from BPOM regarding the alleged presence of take drug additives in the children's candy. "We are still waiting for the results. If it is proven positive (drugs), of course action will be taken," said Syamsul
berita_id: Penjualan dot yang merajalela yang diduga mengandung zat obat membuat publik tidak nyaman, terutama sirkulasi dot yang diduga mengandung zat adiktif narkoba mulai menyebar dan ditemukan di daerah pedesaan terpencil, Kabupaten Malang.Salah satu penghuni Desa Rt.30 / RW.06 Krebet, Distrik Bululawang, Mujib Idris, mengakui bahwa ia menemukan dot yang dijual di depan sekolah TK) yang dikonsumsi oleh anak-anak berusia TK di Dusun Bulupanyung, desa Krebet, distrik Bululawang."Saya mengetahui dari salah satu orang tua yang pada waktu itu telah membeli anak mereka, satu permen telah dibuka dan yang lain belum dibuka," jelas Mujib Idris.Karena berita yang berkembang bahwa dot permen diduga mengandung bahan -bahan adiktif, partainya memilih untuk mengamankan permen.Sekarang publik gelisah dengan sirkulasi permen dot yang diduga mengandung obat.Selain itu, berita di sejumlah media permen berbahaya.Karena itu, partainya meminta otoritas pemerintah untuk menenangkan masyarakat dengan melakukan penggerebekan.Dia menjelaskan bahwa dot permen berbentuk seperti botol untuk minum bayi yang berisi bubuk putih.Oleh karena itu, partainya meminta pemerintah untuk segera memberikan kejelasan kepada publik, apakah permen itu benar -benar berbahaya atau tidak untuk dikonsumsi."Jika itu benar -benar berbahaya, kami diminta untuk segera melakukan menyapu jumlah penjual permen di sekolah, pada saat ini kami sebagai orang tua cukup gugup," keluhnya.Informasi yang telah dikumpulkan di lapangan, berbagai laporan sedang berkembang, permen dot masih menunggu hasil uji laboratorium di Surabaya untuk menentukan apakah bahan -bahan untuk dot itu berbahaya atau tidak, karena permen tersebut dilaporkan terdaftar dengan BPOM dengan Kode Bpom Ri Ml 22 440 900 3077.Sub-District Kedungk-District, Kota Malang, Gang Ayu juga mengakui bahwa dia khawatir tentang sirkulasi permen yang diduga mengandung zat adiktif.Dia mengatakan bahwa ketika dia menerima berita bahwa dot itu berbahaya, partainya meneruskan informasi itu kepada kerabatnya."Pengawasan anak -anak dalam mengonsumsi makanan ringan sekolah harus dikencangkan. Ini telah beredar di komunitas melalui TV, radio, online dan bahkan mencetak, terima kasih. Orang -orang pasti lebih waspada," tambahnya.Sementara itu, kepala Reskba Polres Malang AKP.Syamsul Hididesy ketika dikonfirmasi melalui ponselnya mengakui bahwa partainya masih menunggu hasil tes laboratorium dari BPOM mengenai dugaan keberadaan Take Drug Aditif dalam permen anak -anak."Kami masih menunggu hasilnya. Jika terbukti positif (obat -obatan), tentu saja tindakan akan diambil," kata Syamsul

berita: The iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus were rumored to be easy to bend or bend some time ago, and this has become the subject of ridicule for their competitors, namely BlackBerry and LG. The high sales of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus seem to be bothered by news of their bodies being able to bend easily, especially in the area around the volume buttons. Some iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus users through several forums on the internet have complained that their smartphones are bent or curved when they are put in their pockets. This news is exacerbated by the upload of a video that proves that Apple's latest smartphone is indeed easy to bend, even using only your bare hands. LG recently used the news as a mockery to attack two iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus via its official Twitter account using the hashtag #bendgate. LG also showcased the LG G Flex smartphone which does feature a curved screen in comparison and says our phones were curved before it was a trend. As we know, the LG G Flex is indeed a smartphone equipped with a curved screen and body. Not only that, the LG G Flex also has good flexibility to accommodate pressure when stored in a pocket. The back case of this unique smartphone is also equipped with self-healing technology that is able to remove scratches. BlackBerry, which has just released the Passport sophisticated smartphone, also doesn't want to lose by launching an attack on the case of the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus easy to bend. John Chen, CEO of BlackBerry challenges anyone to bend the BlackBerry Passport which is made of plastic and stainless steel. John Chen added that the Passport will not be easily bent or bent. As reported by Phone Arena (24/09/2014), until now there has been no response or response from Apple regarding the problem of the curved iPhone 6 and iPhone engineering 6 Plus which is currently being discussed.
berita_id: IPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus dikabarkan mudah ditekuk atau ditekuk beberapa waktu yang lalu, dan ini telah menjadi subjek ejekan bagi pesaing mereka, yaitu BlackBerry dan LG.Tingginya penjualan iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus tampaknya diganggu oleh berita tentang tubuh mereka yang dapat menekuk dengan mudah, terutama di area di sekitar tombol volume.Beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus melalui beberapa forum di internet mengeluh bahwa smartphone mereka bengkok atau melengkung ketika mereka dimasukkan ke dalam saku mereka.Berita ini diperburuk oleh unggahan video yang membuktikan bahwa smartphone terbaru Apple memang mudah ditekuk, bahkan hanya menggunakan tangan telanjang Anda.LG baru -baru ini menggunakan berita sebagai ejekan untuk menyerang dua iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus melalui akun Twitter resminya menggunakan tagar #Bendgate.LG juga memamerkan smartphone LG G Flex yang menampilkan layar melengkung sebagai perbandingan dan mengatakan ponsel kami melengkung sebelum menjadi tren.Seperti yang kita ketahui, LG G Flex memang smartphone yang dilengkapi dengan layar dan tubuh melengkung.Tidak hanya itu, LG G Flex juga memiliki fleksibilitas yang baik untuk mengakomodasi tekanan saat disimpan di saku.Kasing belakang smartphone unik ini juga dilengkapi dengan teknologi penyembuhan diri yang mampu menghilangkan goresan.BlackBerry, yang baru saja merilis smartphone canggih paspor, juga tidak ingin kalah dengan meluncurkan serangan terhadap kasus iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus Mudah untuk ditekuk.John Chen, CEO BlackBerry menantang siapa pun untuk menekuk paspor blackberry yang terbuat dari plastik dan stainless steel.John Chen menambahkan bahwa paspor tidak akan mudah ditekuk atau ditekuk.Seperti yang dilaporkan oleh Telepon Arena (24/09/2014), sampai sekarang belum ada respons atau respons dari Apple mengenai masalah iPhone 6 melengkung dan Iphone Engineering 6 Plus yang saat ini sedang dibahas.

berita: The government is currently discussing the Draft Government Regulation (RPP) on Salaries for State Civil Apparatus (ASN) or Civil Servants (PNS). In the RPP, it is stated that the new civil servant salary system is based on an income index. With the income index set out in the RPP, it is assumed that the income of the President of the Republic of Indonesia can reach Rp. 553 million. Then, is it natural for President Jokowi to have such an income? Public Service Observer from the University of Indonesia, Lina Miftahul Jannah, said that the current president's salary of only Rp. 62 million is considered too small. Moreover, the President's responsibility is enormous. According to Lina, it is only natural that the salaries of the President and Vice President are proposed to increase. "It's just that in the midst of the current conditions that civil servants have not increased their salaries since 2015, is that reasonable? If it is proposed to increase, I agree, only the amount if Rp 500 million is too drastic, it seems," said Lina fix to Liputan6.com
berita_id: Pemerintah saat ini sedang membahas rancangan Peraturan Pemerintah (RPP) tentang gaji untuk peralatan sipil negara (ASN) atau pegawai negeri (PNS).Dalam RPP, dinyatakan bahwa sistem gaji pegawai negeri baru didasarkan pada indeks pendapatan.Dengan indeks pendapatan yang ditetapkan dalam RPP, diasumsikan bahwa pendapatan Presiden Republik Indonesia dapat mencapai RP.553 juta.Lalu, apakah wajar bagi Presiden Jokowi untuk memiliki pendapatan seperti itu?Pengamat Layanan Publik dari Universitas Indonesia, Lina Miftahul Jannah, mengatakan bahwa gaji Presiden saat ini hanya RP.62 juta dianggap terlalu kecil.Selain itu, tanggung jawab presiden sangat besar.Menurut Lina, wajar saja bahwa gaji presiden dan wakil presiden diusulkan untuk meningkat."Hanya saja di tengah -tengah kondisi saat ini bahwa pegawai negeri tidak menaikkan gaji mereka sejak 2015, apakah itu masuk akal? Jika diusulkan untuk meningkat, saya setuju, hanya jumlah jika Rp 500 juta terlalu drastis, tampaknya," kata Lina Fix ke LIPUTAN6.com

berita: Mustajab suddenly became talkative, commenting on the fuss over the Pokemon Go game. Frankly, I'm a little surprised, it's not usually my friend who is interested in 'talking' about Android application games. Every time we met, the topic of conversation was always serious; I feel Jokowi, make fun of officials, sometimes talk agomo, occasionally discuss shamanism, if you don't have any material, then talk about bojo problems. "Have you downloaded the Pokemon game? If you haven't, give it a try, just make it fun," as he opened the conversation that night while fiddling with his gadget, then shifted his body to pour ginger milk - not concubine coffee as usual. "I'm not interested, Jab," I replied simply. He chuckled and said, "You should know, because of this Pokemon, it's said that now a lot of people are diligent in going to places of worship. So worship is while hunting Pokemon. That's good, isn't it?" I'm not really interested in responding to the 'provocation'. Tajab instead told his neighbor, Mamat, who was suddenly diligent in exercising in the morning, Pak Harjo who used to play cassava at the security guard post, suddenly diligently went to the mosque, Anwar, who was usually reluctant to go to the fields, suddenly diligently visited the fields. "This Pokemon Go has a positive influence. People who play it become diligent in anything," he said. So the point is this, Mustajab is back to talking, everything that humans make on earth is not value-free. Including matters of technology, application games and the nitty-gritty. Again he provoked, "Come on, instead of having nothing to do, being unemployed, now it's better to just download it, then let's find Pokemon together." "Playing pokemon trains our instincts, trains the sharpness of our eyes, trains the leg muscles, the body becomes healthy because it keeps going, the thumbs become strong. There are many benefits," he continued. "They said Pokemon made in Judaism, what's that like?" I'm just talking. "Says who? Don't swallow the information raw, check it first. Now there is a thin difference between people who understand and don't understand. Today, they still believe in unclear information on social media," Mustajab lectured. He continued, worrying okay, but don't overdo it. Indeed, there are now more people on social media sharing posts that say Pokemon is a covert attempt by the Jews. Pokemon is associated with Syriac or Syriac when translated into Indonesian it means: I am Jewish. "Do they really understand Syriac? It's an ancient language, you know, and even Kromo Inggil doesn't understand why it's alluding to Syriac." Try checking on the internet, Mustajab then look around looking for his smartphone. "There are many articles about Syriac," he said. Then he read it out loud. The Syriac language, he said, was the East Aramaic language that was spoken in most of the Fertile Crescent and Eastern Arabia. But it is widely spoken by various Christian communities in the Middle East. The Syriac language is written with the Syriac Alphabet. The Syriac language is now spoken by minority Syrian Christians living in eastern Turkey, northern Iraq and northeastern Syria. Syriac is also the liturgical language of several Syrian/Syrian churches: the Syrian Orthodox Church, the Syrian Catholic Church, the Maronite Church, the Chaldean Catholic Church, the Assyrian Church of the East and the Old Eastern Church. It is said that the remaining speakers of this language are about three million people. They live in Syria, Iran, Iraq, Lebanon, Turkey. Some became immigrants because of the genocide and persecution, and now they live in the USA, Latin America, Australia and Europe. "But it's not important anyway. The more you think about it the more dizzy," he said, changing his sitting position again. "Here is another article," Mustajab added. The Jordanian newspaper 'ad-Dustur' Monday edition 8 Muharam 1422 H, quoted several doctors of Syriac linguists at Yarmuk University and the Syrian Social Institute in Jordan. They said the words Pokemon, Pikachu and other names in Pokemon cartoons, had absolutely nothing to do with Syriac, even the names were foreign to Syriac. Pokemon is an acronym for Pocket Monster. The explanation, the word (Poke) is an abbreviation of the word (Pocket), which means; Pockets/pockets. And the word (Mon) is an abbreviation of the word (Monster), which means; Monsters. So it means pocket monster. The point is an expression of how small these monsters are to fit in a pocket. Mustajab then shifted his body back, leaning against the wall. Think about it, he said, when someone uses Jewish products, does that mean he automatically becomes a Jew. "If you think so narrowly, it's very dangerous," this time his tone was serious as he shook his head. But, he continued, if the reason you don't play Pokemon mon Go is because of danger considerations, making people wander off the streets when hunting Pokemon, or worrying about your cellphone battery running out quickly and getting hot, worrying about not concentrating on your work, afraid of being scolded by your boss because there is a ban on hunting Pokemon in the office, that's another matter. I'm still pretending to be listening. Then I joked. "So the conclusion is Pokemon wasn't made by this Jew?" "I don't think so," he said simply. Next he went back to browsing. Mustajab then read an article, Pokemon Go was made by Niantic, a software development company splinter from Google. The company was founded by John Hanke in 2010 in San Francisco, California, United States. Last year Niantic left Google. Niantic then worked with the Pokemon Company, the owner of the Pokemon license. One-third of the Pokemon Company's shares are owned by Nintendo, the video game company founded by Fusajiro Yamauchi in Tokyo, Japan, on September 23, 1889. Suddenly Mustajab stopped reading and looked thoughtful. Then he looked at me. "So what makes Pokemon Japanese, how come there are Japanese people who are Jews?" he said briefly. He continued reading, Pokemon Company has been developing a franchise business (franchise). Pokemon has its roots in comics, anime movies, video games, cards, tazos, and other merchandise. Since the 90s until now, there have been six generations of Pokemon. The total number of Pokemon species from the six generations has reached 721 species. "Many also turned out to be a species of monster Pokemon." I immediately interrupted. "By the way, how many Pokemon have you got?" Mustajab just smirked as if baring his bared teeth. I'm guessing he doesn't have time to hunt Pokemon. He's an app game enthusiast, but for the past few weeks he's stopped because his wife scolded him.

A news regarding the commotion at the Head of the Mobile Brigade Headquarters terrorist detention center, Salemba branch, in Depok on Friday (11/10) was spread in messaging application groups. The news said that the commotion was still going on and caused 3 blocks in the prison to catch fire. The news also stated that the trigger for the commotion was the throwing of the Koran by the guard. Responding to the news, the Karo Penmas Public Relations of the National Police Brigadier General Rikwanto spoke up. He confirmed that the news was a hoax. "It's a hoax," explained Rikwanto, Saturday (11/11). Rikwanto explained that currently the condition of the terrorist detention center is conducive. There was no arson or fire in the commotion. "(The commotion) resulted in damage to the prison facilities, such as the door of the prison cell being broken, the gate of the hallway block, broken windows in block C and block B," he explained. Meanwhile, the trigger for the commotion was the presence of a prisoner who did not captive accept it when the officers conducted a search. During the search, officers found 4 cell phones. "One of the prisoners did not accept it and provoked the officers with various words. Then there were members who were provoked by their words and there were prisoners who were takbir loudly so that they provoked prisoners from the block next to them," said Rikwanto. The police then fired warning shots to warn the detainees. Fortunately, the commotion was suppressed by the police. Now, the situation in the terrorist prison is back to normal.
berita_id: Sebuah berita tentang keributan di kepala pusat penahanan teroris Mobile Brigade Mobile Brigade, Cabang Salemba, di Depok pada hari Jumat (11/10) tersebar dalam kelompok aplikasi pesan.Berita itu mengatakan bahwa keributan masih terjadi dan menyebabkan 3 blok di penjara terbakar.Berita itu juga menyatakan bahwa pemicu keributan adalah lemparan Alquran oleh penjaga.Menanggapi berita tersebut, Hubungan Masyarakat Karo Penmas dari Brigadir Jenderal Kepolisian Nasional Rikwanto berbicara.Dia mengkonfirmasi bahwa berita itu adalah tipuan."Ini tipuan," jelas Rikwanto, Sabtu (11/11).Rikwanto menjelaskan bahwa saat ini kondisi pusat penahanan teroris kondusif.Tidak ada pembakaran atau tembakan dalam keributan."(Keributan) mengakibatkan kerusakan pada fasilitas penjara, seperti pintu sel penjara yang rusak, gerbang blok lorong, jendela yang rusak di blok C dan blok B," jelasnya.Sementara itu, pemicu keributan adalah kehadiran seorang tahanan yang tidak menawan menerimanya ketika petugas melakukan pencarian.Selama pencarian, petugas menemukan 4 ponsel."Salah satu tahanan tidak menerimanya dan memicu petugas dengan berbagai kata. Lalu ada anggota yang diprovokasi oleh kata -kata mereka dan ada tahanan yang Takbir keras sehingga mereka memicu tahanan dari blok di sebelah mereka," kata Rikwanto.Polisi kemudian menembakkan tembakan peringatan untuk memperingatkan para tahanan.Untungnya, keributan itu ditekan oleh polisi.Sekarang, situasi di penjara teroris kembali normal.

berita: DKI Jakarta Governor Anies Baswedan attended the 90th anniversary of the establishment of the Kanisius College educational institution, at Hall D JIExpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Saturday (11/11) night. On that occasion Anies was given time to make a speech in front of the invited guests. However, while giving a speech there were some guests who walked out of the room. When confirmed, Anies admitted that he did not know that any guests had left, one of them was Ananda Sukarlan. He even admitted that he was close to the Principal of Kanisius High School, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho. And to attend an invitation from the Canisius School was not the first. "And this is not the first time I've been to Kanisius, so when I heard it this morning, I remembered that someone had come out because I don't remember it, I didn't see it," said Anies at the DKI Jakarta City Hall, Monday (11/13). Even so, Anies admitted to respecting and appreciating all opinions and views from all parties towards him. Because as the governor of Jakarta, he must greet all his citizens without any difference, protecting all parties is the duty of a governor. Because according to Anies, everyone has the right to express their opinion in their own way. Including people who criticize his speech. "If there is a negative reaction then that's a bonus for me," he said. Previously, in a video circulating on social media, pianist Ananda Sukarlan, who is an alumni of the picture Kanisius school, protested the presence of Governor Anies Baswedan. There was also a press release from the Kanisius 86 Alumni Association, which was sent by Ananda Sukarlan, which contained the following: In commemoration of the 90th anniversary of the founding of Kanisius College, this school which has been consistent until now only for boys located in Menteng Raya for the first time gave the Canisius Awards to 5 alumni from various generations. These 5 alumni were screened from the 95 finalists who became candidates. They are Ananda Sukarlan (composer & pianist), Derianto Kusuma (founder of Traveloka), Father Magnis Suseno (Jesuit figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (scout leader) and Dr Boenjamin Setiawan (founder of Kalbe Farma). Present and giving the opening speech at the grand event at JIFest which was attended by thousands of Kanisius alumni yesterday, Saturday, November 11, was the governor of Jakarta, Anies Baswedan. When he gave a speech, Ananda Sukarlan stood up from his VIP seat and walked out showing his disapproval of Anies' speech. This action was followed by hundreds of alumni and other members of the audience. After giving his speech which was greeted coldly by the remaining audience, Anies Baswedan left the venue. The audience who had walked out entered the room again. During the awarding of these 5 figures, Ananda got a turn for a 10-minute speech. In the speech after he said thank you, he also criticized the organizing committee. "You have invited someone with values ​​and integrity that are contrary to what we have been taught. Although you may have to invite him because of his position, but next time we have to look at the person as well. He got his position in ways that are not in accordance with the values -Canisius values. I'm not talking about politics, this is a matter of conscience and human values," he said. After getting off the stage, Ananda was greeted and praised by the nominees for the award, including former minister Ir. Sarwono Kusumaatmaja and Father E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Principal of Kanisius High School.
berita_id: Gubernur DKI Jakarta Anies Baswedan menghadiri peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Lembaga Pendidikan Kanisius College, di Hall D Jiexpo Kemayoran, Jakarta, Sabtu (11/11) malam.Pada kesempatan itu Anies diberi waktu untuk berpidato di depan para tamu yang diundang.Namun, saat memberikan pidato ada beberapa tamu yang keluar dari ruangan.Ketika dikonfirmasi, Anies mengakui bahwa dia tidak tahu bahwa ada tamu yang pergi, salah satunya adalah Ananda Sukarlan.Dia bahkan mengakui bahwa dia dekat dengan kepala sekolah SMA Kanisius, Pater E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho.Dan untuk menghadiri undangan dari sekolah Canisius bukan yang pertama."Dan ini bukan pertama kalinya saya ke Kanisius, jadi ketika saya mendengarnya pagi ini, saya ingat bahwa seseorang telah keluar karena saya tidak mengingatnya, saya tidak melihatnya," kata Anies di Balai Kota DKI Jakarta, Senin (11/13).Meski begitu, Anies mengaku menghormati dan menghargai semua pendapat dan pandangan dari semua pihak kepadanya.Karena sebagai gubernur Jakarta, ia harus menyapa semua warganya tanpa perbedaan, melindungi semua pihak adalah tugas seorang gubernur.Karena menurut ANIES, setiap orang memiliki hak untuk mengekspresikan pendapat mereka dengan cara mereka sendiri.Termasuk orang yang mengkritik pidatonya."Jika ada reaksi negatif maka itu bonus untukku," katanya.Sebelumnya, dalam sebuah video yang beredar di media sosial, pianis Ananda Sukarlan, yang merupakan alumni dari gambar Sekolah Kanisius, memprotes kehadiran Gubernur Anies Baswedan.Ada juga siaran pers dari Asosiasi Alumni Kanisius 86, yang dikirim oleh Ananda Sukarlan, yang berisi yang berikut: dalam peringatan peringatan 90 tahun pendirian Kanisius College, sekolah ini yang konsisten sampai sekarang untuk anak laki -laki yang berlokasi di Menteng Raya untuk pertama kalinya memberi Canisius Awarder dari 5 alumni dari berbagai alumni.5 alumni ini disaring dari 95 finalis yang menjadi kandidat.Mereka adalah Ananda Sukarlan (Komposer & Pianis), DeRianto Kusuma (pendiri Traveloka), Pastor Magnis Suseno (Jesuit Figure), Irwan Ismaun Soenggono (pemimpin pengintai) dan Dr Boenjamin setiawan (pendiri Kalbe Farma).Hadir dan memberikan pidato pembukaan di acara besar di Jifest yang dihadiri oleh ribuan alumni Kanisius kemarin, Sabtu, 11 November, adalah gubernur Jakarta, Anies Baswedan.Ketika dia memberikan pidato, Ananda Sukarlan berdiri dari kursi VIP -nya dan berjalan keluar menunjukkan ketidaksetujuannya terhadap pidato anies.Tindakan ini diikuti oleh ratusan alumni dan anggota audiensi lainnya.Setelah memberikan pidatonya yang disambut dengan dingin oleh penonton yang tersisa, Anies Baswedan meninggalkan tempat itu.Penonton yang berjalan keluar memasuki ruangan lagi.Selama pemberian 5 angka ini, Ananda mendapat giliran untuk pidato 10 menit.Dalam pidatonya setelah dia mengucapkan terima kasih, dia juga mengkritik komite pengorganisasian."Anda telah mengundang seseorang dengan nilai -nilai dan integritas yang bertentangan dengan apa yang telah kami ajarkan. Meskipun Anda mungkin harus mengundangnya karena posisinya, tetapi lain kali kita harus melihat orang itu juga. Dia mendapatkan posisinya dengan cara yang tidak sesuai dengan nilai -nilai -Nilai -nilai Canisius. Saya tidak berbicara tentang politik, ini adalah masalah hati nilainya dan nilai -nilai manusia," katanya.Setelah turun dari panggung, Ananda disambut dan dipuji oleh nominasi untuk penghargaan tersebut, termasuk mantan Menteri IR.Sarwono Kusumaatmaja dan Pastor E. Baskoro Poedjinoegroho S.J., Kepala Sekolah Menengah Kanisius.

berita: The salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia will increase drastically to reach Rp. 500 million per month. Or Rp 6.6 billion per year. This increase occurs if the Draft Government Regulation on the Salaries, Benefits, and Facilities of Civil Servants is actually passed. The amount is stated in the RPP material. With the president's salary index of 96,000 points, it was found that the figure was Rp. 553 million. According to Article 2 of Law number 7 of 1978, the president's salary is 6 times the basic salary of the highest official in Indonesia (Chairman of the DPR, MA, and BPK). Meanwhile, in PP 75/2000, it is stated that the three officials receive a salary of Rp. 5040000 per month. Thus, the president's basic salary is IDR 30240000 per month. Presidential Decree 68/2001 also states that the allowance for the position of the President is Rp. 32500000. So that the total money received by the president each month is Rp. 62740000 or Rp. 752880000 per year. According to the palace, this number has not changed since 2001. The total salary of the President of the Republic of Indonesia is relatively small compared to the leaders of the major countries in the world. Prime Minister (PM) of Singapore, Lee Hsien Loong recorded the highest salary of USD 2.2 million or equivalent to Rp. 30.3 billion per year. After Lee, there is Doris Leuthard, the President of Switzerland, who has a salary of USD 437000 or Rp. 6 billion per year. Australian Prime Minister Malcolm Trunbull followed with a salary of USD 403,700 or Rp. 5.5 billion per year. President Jokowi's salary is only higher than that of PRC President Xi Jinping, who is paid USD 20,500 or IDR 283 million per year. Meanwhile, US President Donald Trump recorded the smallest income, which was USD 1 per year. Of course this is Trump's personal request. The 45th president of the US has a personal fortune of around USD 3 billion. University of Indonesia (UI) public policy observer Lina Miftahul Jannah said it was very natural for the President to have a very large income index. So that the income received by the number one person in Indonesia is very high. "It makes sense too," he explained. He said that as head of state as well as head of government, the duties, responsibilities, and risks of a president are enormous. So, according to him, it is not natural for an official to be paid by the state budget, whose salary is greater than the president's. Instead, he said it would be dangerous if there were other government officials whose salaries were higher than the President. Meanwhile, the palace has not been able to comment further on the salary increase scheme for civil servants, presidents and other state officials. Presidential Spokesman Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo said his party had not received sufficient information about this. "I don't ruff have the information yet. I'll confirm it later," he said when confirmed. The former Acting Officer (Plt) of the KPK leadership has also not been able to confirm the progress of the RPP
berita_id: Gaji Presiden Republik Indonesia akan meningkat secara drastis untuk mencapai RP.500 juta per bulan.Atau Rp 6,6 miliar per tahun.Peningkatan ini terjadi jika rancangan peraturan pemerintah tentang gaji, tunjangan, dan fasilitas pegawai negeri sebenarnya disahkan.Jumlah tersebut dinyatakan dalam bahan RPP.Dengan indeks gaji presiden sebesar 96.000 poin, ditemukan bahwa angkanya adalah RP.553 juta.Menurut Pasal 2 Hukum Nomor 7 tahun 1978, gaji Presiden adalah 6 kali gaji dasar pejabat tertinggi di Indonesia (ketua DPR, MA, dan BPK).Sementara itu, dalam hal 75/2000, dinyatakan bahwa ketiga pejabat menerima gaji RP.5040000 per bulan.Dengan demikian, gaji pokok presiden adalah IDR 30240000 per bulan.Keputusan Presiden 68/2001 juga menyatakan bahwa tunjangan untuk posisi presiden adalah RP.32500000. Sehingga total uang yang diterima oleh presiden setiap bulan adalah RP.62740000 atau RP.752880000 per tahun.Menurut Istana, jumlah ini tidak berubah sejak tahun 2001. Gaji total Presiden Republik Indonesia relatif kecil dibandingkan dengan para pemimpin negara -negara besar di dunia.Perdana Menteri (PM) dari Singapura, Lee Hsien Loong mencatat gaji tertinggi USD 2,2 juta atau setara dengan RP.30,3 miliar per tahun.Setelah Lee, ada Doris Leuthard, presiden Swiss, yang memiliki gaji USD 437000 atau RP.6 miliar per tahun.Perdana Menteri Australia Malcolm Trunbull diikuti dengan gaji USD 403.700 atau RP.5,5 miliar per tahun.Gaji Presiden Jokowi hanya lebih tinggi dari Presiden RRC Xi Jinping, yang dibayar USD 20.500 atau IDR 283 juta per tahun.Sementara itu, Presiden AS Donald Trump mencatat pendapatan terkecil, yaitu USD 1 per tahun.Tentu saja ini adalah permintaan pribadi Trump.Presiden ke -45 AS memiliki kekayaan pribadi sekitar USD 3 miliar.Pengamat Kebijakan Publik University of Indonesia (UI) Lina Miftahul Jannah mengatakan sangat wajar bagi presiden untuk memiliki indeks pendapatan yang sangat besar.Sehingga pendapatan yang diterima oleh orang nomor satu di Indonesia sangat tinggi."Itu juga masuk akal," jelasnya.Dia mengatakan bahwa sebagai kepala negara serta kepala pemerintahan, tugas, tanggung jawab, dan risiko presiden sangat besar.Jadi, menurutnya, tidak wajar bagi seorang pejabat yang harus dibayar dengan anggaran negara, yang gajinya lebih besar dari presiden.Sebaliknya, dia mengatakan akan berbahaya jika ada pejabat pemerintah lain yang gaji yang gaji lebih tinggi dari presiden.Sementara itu, istana belum dapat berkomentar lebih lanjut tentang skema kenaikan gaji untuk pegawai negeri, presiden dan pejabat negara lainnya.Juru bicara presiden Johan Budi Sapto Prabowo mengatakan partainya belum menerima informasi yang cukup tentang hal ini."Aku belum memiliki informasi. Aku akan mengkonfirmasi nanti," katanya ketika dikonfirmasi.Mantan Penjabat Petugas (PLT) kepemimpinan KPK juga tidak dapat mengkonfirmasi kemajuan RPP

berita: Not even a month, two of Apple's newest products, the iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus, are already in doubt. Some iPhone 6 Plus users were beyond surprised when they found their favorite iPhone curved after being placed for a while in the back pocket of their pants. "Bendgate", is the term used by netizens to make fun of the weakness of Apple's latest iPhone. This reminds the tech-savvy public of the "antennagate" scandal that was popular among netizens in 2010. At that time, iPhone 4 users reported an antenna design error that caused frequent phone disconnections. Until this news was revealed, there has been no comment from Apple addition about the iPhone 6 Plus that can bend in the pocket. However, they announced they were investigating reports of problems found in the iOS 8 operating system (OS). In fact, Apple pulled the OS version 8.0.1. Based on observations on social media such as Facebook and Twitter, the problem of the iPhone 6 being curved makes jeans users worried. In fact, the phrase "Your pants are too tight for your phone" became popular and was mentioned over and over again.
berita_id: Bahkan tidak sebulan, dua produk terbaru Apple, iPhone 6 dan iPhone 6 Plus, sudah diragukan.Beberapa pengguna iPhone 6 Plus sangat terkejut ketika mereka menemukan iPhone favorit mereka melengkung setelah ditempatkan untuk sementara waktu di saku belakang celana mereka."Bendgate", adalah istilah yang digunakan oleh netizens untuk mengolok -olok kelemahan iPhone terbaru Apple.Ini mengingatkan publik yang paham teknologi tentang skandal "antena" yang populer di kalangan netizen pada tahun 2010. Pada waktu itu, pengguna iPhone 4 melaporkan kesalahan desain antena yang sering menyebabkan pemutusan telepon.Sampai berita ini terungkap, belum ada komentar dari tambahan Apple tentang iPhone 6 Plus yang dapat menekuk di saku.Namun, mereka mengumumkan bahwa mereka sedang menyelidiki laporan masalah yang ditemukan dalam Sistem Operasi IOS 8 (OS).Faktanya, Apple menarik OS versi 8.0.1.Berdasarkan pengamatan di media sosial seperti Facebook dan Twitter, masalah iPhone 6 yang melengkung membuat pengguna Jeans khawatir.Faktanya, frasa "celana Anda terlalu ketat untuk ponsel Anda" menjadi populer dan disebutkan berulang kali.

berita: Dozens of participants in the action to defend the ulama, led by the Presidium Alumni 212, gathered in the courtyard of the Istiqlal Mosque, Central Jakarta, Friday (9/6/2017) afternoon. Gathered around the door of Al Fattah, the masses listened to the speech using a car with loudspeakers. They chose to sit because there were many congregations who participated in routine activities organized by the Istiqlal Mosque management. As a result, the crowd could only give speeches and chant prayers outside the mosque, which was centered around their command car. In their speech, the masses said they would try to enter the Istiqlal Mosque and carry out their activities until the time for the Tarawih prayer. "Don't criminalize ulama, because they are religious broadcasters who continue the Prophet Muhammad SAW," said the orator of the top action on the command car.
berita_id: Lusinan peserta dalam aksi untuk mempertahankan ulama, yang dipimpin oleh Alumni Presidium 212, berkumpul di halaman Masjid Istiqlal, Jakarta Tengah, Jumat (9/6/2017) sore.Berkumpul di sekitar pintu Al Fattah, massa mendengarkan pidato menggunakan mobil dengan pengeras suara.Mereka memilih untuk duduk karena ada banyak sidang yang berpartisipasi dalam kegiatan rutin yang diselenggarakan oleh Manajemen Masjid ISTIQLAL.Akibatnya, orang banyak hanya bisa memberikan pidato dan doa nyanyian di luar masjid, yang berpusat di sekitar mobil komando mereka.Dalam pidato mereka, massa mengatakan mereka akan mencoba memasuki masjid Istiqlal dan melaksanakan kegiatan mereka sampai waktu untuk doa Tarawih."Jangan mengkriminalisasi Ulama, karena mereka adalah penyiar agama yang melanjutkan nabi Muhammad melihat," kata orator aksi tertinggi pada mobil komando.

berita: The Pokemon Go game, which is rife in several countries, including Indonesia, received a special response from the Mayor of Banda Aceh, Illiza Sa'aduddin Djamal, who confirmed that the Pokemon Go game was haram. "And the pokemon have all been spread in electronic media, it turns out that it means I am a Jew," said Illiza at a halal bi halal event with all officials and staff in the Banda Aceh City Government, Wednesday (20/7). According to crippled Illiza, if every child says that word every day then the law is haram. "Imagine now children who say they are Jews and this game is on our children's cellphones, then this is haram, and please parents, to provide supervision to our children, qu anfusakum wa expertkum naara," said Illiza was reported in mediaaceh. With the pervasiveness of the misdirection, said Illiza, she hopes that parents can continue to provide supervision and be more open to their children. "Age 0 to 7 years make them kings, 7-14 years old them with religion, 14-22 years make them friends. When children make us friends, then they will open up with us at that time they will tell us anything , and we will know what they are doing and we can give them advice," said Illiza.
berita_id: Game Pokemon Go, yang marak di beberapa negara, termasuk Indonesia, menerima tanggapan khusus dari walikota Banda Aceh, Illiza Sa'aduddin Djamal, yang mengkonfirmasi bahwa permainan Pokemon Go adalah Haram."Dan semua Pokemon telah tersebar di media elektronik, ternyata itu berarti saya seorang Yahudi," kata Illiza di acara halal halal halal dengan semua pejabat dan staf di pemerintah kota Banda Aceh, Rabu (20/7).Menurut Illiza yang lumpuh, jika setiap anak mengatakan kata itu setiap hari maka hukumnya adalah Haram."Bayangkan sekarang anak -anak yang mengatakan bahwa mereka adalah orang Yahudi dan permainan ini ada di ponsel anak -anak kita, maka ini adalah Haram, dan menyenangkan orang tua, untuk memberikan pengawasan kepada anak -anak kita, Qu anfusakum wa pakar naara," kata Illiza dilaporkan di Mediaaceh.Dengan meluasnya penyesatan, kata Illiza, dia berharap orang tua dapat terus memberikan pengawasan dan lebih terbuka untuk anak -anak mereka."Usia 0 hingga 7 tahun menjadikannya raja, 7-14 tahun mereka dengan agama, 14-22 tahun berteman. Ketika anak-anak berteman, maka mereka akan membuka diri dengan kami pada waktu itu mereka akan memberi tahu kami apa pun, dan kami akan tahu apa yang mereka lakukan dan kami dapat memberi mereka nasihat," kata Illiza.

berita: The Head of the Protocol Section for the Istiqlal Mosque, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam, stated that the news circulating idolize on social media that the participants of the 212th Volume Two Action could not enter the Istiqlal Mosque early this morning because the mosque doors were closed was not true. "It's a thousand percent hoax," said Abdul Salam to Republika.co.id, Tuesday (21/2) morning. Abdul Salam explained that the rules at the Istiqlal Mosque in addition to the month of Ramadan, the mosque closed at 21.30 WIB. Opened again one hour before Fajr time. "In the month of Ramadan, the mosque is open 24 hours," he explained. For last night's case, Abdul Salam said, there were indeed five bus participants who came from East Java. They claimed to come from Madura. Participants enter the mosque after Isha time. The mosque provides opportunities for worship and cleaning. "After approaching 10 (evening), we met with the head of his entourage, we announced to his entourage that the rules at Istiqlal, this mosque will be closed and will be opened again one hour before Fajr," he explained. Abdul Salam emphasized that the group from East Java understood and understood. The mosque management waited for them to leave the Istiqlal Mosque voluntarily. Then at 03.40 WIB the mosque was reopened. "And what's in the photo, it looks like people are queuing up to enter, it's the Wali Songo pilgrimage group and school children, that's normal, they go to Istiqlal every day," he explained. He emphasized that the conclusion was that the news circulating on Instagram, Twitter and other social media was a lie
berita_id: Kepala bagian protokol untuk masjid Istiqlal, Abu Hurairah Abdul Salam, menyatakan bahwa berita yang beredar mengidolakan di media sosial bahwa para peserta aksi volume ke -212 tidak dapat memasuki masjid Istiqlal pagi ini karena pintu -pintu masjid ditutup tidak benar."Ini adalah tipuan seribu persen," kata Abdul Salam kepada Republika.co.id, Selasa (21/2) pagi.Abdul Salam menjelaskan bahwa aturan di masjid Istiqlal selain bulan Ramadhan, masjid ditutup pada 21,30 WIB.Dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum waktu Fajr."Di bulan Ramadhan, masjid buka 24 jam," jelasnya.Untuk kasus tadi malam, Abdul Salam mengatakan, memang ada lima peserta bus yang datang dari Jawa Timur.Mereka mengaku datang dari Madura.Peserta memasuki masjid setelah waktu Isha.Masjid ini memberikan kesempatan untuk beribadah dan membersihkan."Setelah mendekati 10 (malam), kami bertemu dengan kepala rombongannya, kami mengumumkan kepada rombongannya bahwa aturan di Istiqlal, masjid ini akan ditutup dan akan dibuka lagi satu jam sebelum Fajr," jelasnya.Abdul Salam menekankan bahwa kelompok dari Jawa Timur memahami dan memahami.Manajemen masjid menunggu mereka meninggalkan masjid Istiqlal secara sukarela.Kemudian pada 03.40 WIB masjid dibuka kembali."Dan apa yang ada di foto, sepertinya orang -orang mengantri untuk masuk, itu adalah kelompok ziarah Wali Songo dan anak -anak sekolah, itu normal, mereka pergi ke Istiqlal setiap hari," jelasnya.Dia menekankan bahwa kesimpulannya adalah bahwa berita yang beredar di Instagram, Twitter dan media sosial lainnya adalah kebohongan

berita_id: Permen yang dikemas dengan dot tidak terduga, ternyata permen yang lucu dan menarik itu adalah camilan yang sangat berbahaya.Dia menerima informasi dari kepala polisi nasional sore ini, bahwa dot permen berisi bubuk tipe narkoba.Itu telah diuji di laboratorium untuk beberapa sampel dan ada hasil yang mengatakan itu berisi obat -obatan.Karena dicurigai, ketika kita makan permen itu membuat kita mengantuk.Tidak hanya dicurigai ada obat -obatan di dalamnya.Ada sebuah artikel yang menyatakan bahwa ada formaldehida berbahaya yang dapat menyebabkan kanker saat dikonsumsi.Memang, tidak semua permen ini mengandung formalin, bahkan obat -obatan!Kami tidak pernah tahu mana yang sehat dan mana yang tidak.Anda harus menyadari putra dan putri Anda agar tidak membeli makanan ringan dengan ceroboh, memperingatkan teman-teman Anda untuk tidak mengonsumsi permen berbentuk dat.The!

berita: Barong Reog Ponorogo and Hisan Naga on gamelan are burned general at the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao, Philippines. The arson incident reportedly occurred on October 20 last. The information circulated among journalists from the Ministry of Foreign Affairs (Kemenlu). "The Ministry of Foreign Affairs has contacted the Indonesian Consulate General in Davao and is being handled according to procedures," said Public Relations staff of the Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Opi Sudarma, when asked about the truth of the news, Friday (10/30). This news is very surprising considering that the object is Indonesian culture. In fact, a neighboring country, Malaysia, claims it as their culture. Reportedly, the reason for the burning is related to idols and demons. It is not clear whether the perpetrators are Indonesian Nationals (WNI) or Filipinos.
berita_id: Barong Reog Ponorogo dan Hisan Naga di Gamelan dibakar Jenderal di Konsulat Jenderal Indonesia di Davao, Filipina.Insiden pembakaran dilaporkan terjadi pada 20 Oktober lalu.Informasi yang diedarkan di antara jurnalis dari Kementerian Luar Negeri (Kemenlu)."Kementerian Luar Negeri telah menghubungi Jenderal Konsulat Indonesia di Davao dan sedang ditangani sesuai dengan prosedur," kata staf Hubungan Masyarakat dari Kementerian Luar Negeri, OPI Sudarma, ketika ditanya tentang kebenaran berita, Jumat (10/30).Berita ini sangat mengejutkan mengingat objeknya adalah budaya Indonesia.Bahkan, negara tetangga, Malaysia, mengklaimnya sebagai budaya mereka.Dilaporkan, alasan pembakaran terkait dengan berhala dan setan.Tidak jelas apakah pelaku adalah warga negara Indonesia (WNI) atau orang Filipina.
